This is the camera for anyone who loves taking pictures but can't spend a lot of money on on a bigger named product, My best friend has a Fuji that looks identical to mine but black, i bought the white one it looks cooler I think,that she paid Around $55.00 more dollars than I did And for less than 148.00 I got my camera, a very nice Bag that also fits my handy-cam in and a 16GB card for my GE.. NOT BAD IF I SAY SO MYSELF... OH and free shipping on all.... Need i say more.....

Reviews.Title: Worth more  than the dollar spent.
Reviews.Author: Songhai
Reviews.Content: I bought this camera as an emergency budget camera as I had less than 12 hours to attend an event. I did not want to spend a lot of money on a camera, since I did not have enough time for a full scale research on cameras. I narrowed my search to cameras less than $200.00. I settled for this camera based on several reviews by both professional photographers and amateur users. The camera is a very good camera. The initial pictures were not as crisp as my previous camera but the more I got to understand this camera, the better did the quality of the pictures improve. The three things I quickly learnt were:1.This is a slow camera, if you are very patient with it, your picture qualities will improve. 2. When you focus on an object and you press on the shutter release button gently half way down, be patient for the broken square to turn green before fully depressing the shutter release button. 3.If you understand when to use the different scene modes, then you have close to a professional grade camera in your hands. The camera is excellent for low light scenes. I have not yet used the flash to snap any picture and all the pictures I have taken at night have been superb! I like the panorama and pencil sketch modes. Did I forget to mention the zoom lens of x15 for this price. The color reproduction is impressive. This camera could have easily been sold for between $200 to $300 by GE. Hurry and buy one,before GE makes one minor modification on this model and sell it for $300.00 as their newest model. My wife who bought a more expensive brand that was on sale, plans to use the 14 days grace period to return her camera after comparing her camera pictures with the ones taken by this camera.I recommend the following for this camera:1.Transcend SD HC 16GB Class 10 memory card.2.Sony camera case.3.Sony BCG-34HRE NI-MH Battery charger.4.SANYO enelope AA rechargeable batteries or the Sony cycle energy rechargeable AA batteries that come with the Sony charger.5.JOBY gorillapod.

Reviews.Title: Excellent camera for price.
Reviews.Author: S3venth angel
Reviews.Content: I bought this after looking at many, many other cameras of equal and much greater cost. My brother is a photographer and said this is a great starter camera with a suprising amount of features. I took 5 mins to look over the users manual and am very happy with it. Bad reviews are garbage, and the people probably don't know how to work the camera. I was a rookie at taking pics but now feel like a pro.

Reviews.Title: Works with linux systems
Reviews.Author: djf
Reviews.Content: Just received the GE Power Pro X500 with white trim - but forgot to ask for the free 4gb memory - thought Amazon would send if I ordered the camera. So now I am begging Amazon to send me the free memory in another shipment.CAUTION I am a Cannon power shot photographer [s.i.c] - and have been around the world with one in my pocket - just pulled it out and took the picture I wanted. But now I have a granddaughter - and she will not stay still !!  1. VERY GOOD: the shutter is almost instant - and I do not have to say 1, 2, 3 and snap on 2. Works fine for most - but 1.5 year olds are bored at the count of 1. This camera gets the shot off on the snap - and they look good..  2. VERY GOOD: I like close ups - and I held it 5 inches from my nose and to a great picture of every pore, wrinkle, whisp of grey hair and bald spots, not to mention age spots on my face. But it looks good and is more detailed I guess because the 16 megapixl vs 12 on my cannon.  3. VERY GOOD: the camera looks nice.. 4. LINUX VERY GOOD : just pulled the pdf owners manual off the cd and displayed perfectly in ubuntu 12.04 and fedora 16. Also had no problem uploading pictures from the camera to Linux with the default apps on both distro's. And could easily delete pictures on the camera from both linux's.I paid less for this GE than I did for the Cannon - but it looks like a much better camera. Time will tell.

Reviews.Title: Great camera for decent price!
Reviews.Author: Tyuli
Reviews.Content: I have to say, I did not expect this camera to be that good. But it is.It is very easy to use, and you`ll be able to quickly navigate it.It takes great pictures ones you set it up for proper function.By that, I mean, don`t blame the camera if you are trying to take pictures of flowers, having "Indoors" set up and etc. It will still take a picture, but the best results come when you use it properly and set the picture themes accordingly.The flash is just amazing. You can be in  a night club in peach darkness and take a clear picture with NO red eyes effect! All the color are right and good.I would definitely recommend this camera for every-day use for those who can`t or don`t want to buy HD Professional camera, like  Nikon or Canon EOS, but want their camera to be a little more professional than regular slim DSLR.Use it properly and it will provide you with great images!

Reviews.Title: GE Power Pro
Reviews.Author: thelook1
Reviews.Content: Very good little camera for the price. Has some noise issues but it is small, powerful and works for me in a lot of pro-studio situations shooting people. I use it quite a bit instead of my main very expensive camera.

Reviews.Title: There are problems with this unit!
Reviews.Author: P. Wee "esotericon"
Reviews.Content: I have several other cameras, including a high-end Canon DSLR.  I wanted something I could carry in my car and not worry about it being stolen or beat-up. This camera, although it says General Imaging (GE), is a Chinese-made generic camera that several companies sell under their own brand.  When it works, it's fine.  Unfortunately, it doesn't always work.  The design is a poor one.  You have to turn it upside-down to take the SDHC card out.  When you do, the 4AA batteries will fall out.  Battery life tends to be very poor.  This unit soaks up energy quickly.  Optically, it's not bad.  Look around.  You should be able to find this new for under $100, but I would go for the Casio Exilim, a much better camera at about the same price.

Reviews.Title: An Amateur's Review
Reviews.Author: Vanessa Rutherford "van the book bandit"
Reviews.Content: I had no idea GE made cameras until I spotted this one on Amazon a couple weeks ago and to be honest, the price appealed to me more than anything. I'm not a professional photographer, but I like to take pictures & want them to have quality when I do. So I knew I wanted my next camera to be a bridge camera. It's that healthy combonation of being able to take wonderful pictures without breaking the bank! I looked around for about a week at Nikon, Sony, Canon, Fujifilm, etc. None of these big name camera distributors make a bridge camera with this much of a bargain. So I'm glad I found it!Here are my points of interest-Shipping was pretty prompt (I ordered Sunday, it arrived today, Friday).-Unboxing & setting up was fairly easy. I had no problem loading batteries & a memory card.-I chose white. I was worried it might be a little tacky, but it in actuality has a very sleek, clean, professional look. Seems very well put together.-Like others have reviewed, it has a healthy amount of weight to it, so it feels like you're holding on to something.-I love the button placement & overall anatomy. Easy to grip & take the actual picture. Zoom is located around the capture button, which I LIKE! The LCD display has a sharp & clear quality. A fair size as well, in my opinion.-Very impressed with shutter speed & image stablelization. I have bad nerves, so I'm a bit shaky and need a camera that will help me get a straight, clear shot. So yeah, on the mark with that one.-Nice amount of features & perks like panoramic, scene selection, smile detection, etc.-Easy navigation through settings & preferences like language, time, memory format, etc.I've only used the cam for a day, but as I said before, I'm very impressed. You can NOT beat the specs for the price. If you're on the fence about buying, BUY & TRY.

Reviews.Title: Man do I love this camera!
Reviews.Author: Dawn Gagnon "dawnella"
Reviews.Content: This camera is wonderful. I write articles for a living and I need a good quality camera to take my photos for my articles. If you are a novice at photography, simply turn the dial to "Auto mode" and most of your pics will come out wonderful! For those with a little more experience you'll find all the cool extra features a fun way to explore possibilities with your photos. Most of my pictures come out crystal clear and some are darn near professional quality.You should get the rechargeable batteries as suggested by other reviewers especially if you take a lot of photos. The camera is a little chunky compared to some digital cameras out there, but the strap that is included with this camera is a big help. As far as the lens cap, well it isn't an issue for me at all. It stays on fairly well. It has a looped string attached to it so I just ran that through the camera's strap metal hinges and when I am ready to take a picture, it pops off and I don't have to worry  about losing it. All in all a good camera for the money.

Reviews.Title: This camera is amazing, and worth every penny
Reviews.Author: SMFP
Reviews.Content: I just got my camera today, and i absolutely love it. The picture quality is amazing, and the zoom feature is out of this world. In my opinion it is worth every penny.

Reviews.Title: Perfect
Reviews.Author: Katy
Reviews.Content: My camera came in perfect condition, with all of the amenities in the description. The only reason I could tell it was used was because it came already set up and with batteries, which was nice because it saved me some time.

Reviews.Title: Excellent Camera
Reviews.Author: Robert Kay
Reviews.Content: This camera is a great buy. I particularly like how easy it is to hold, point, and shoot your picture. It is not like all the mini cameras that I find difficult to hold onto. The GE camera has a grip that fits my hand perfectly. The button to shoot the picture is at the end of the grip right where your finger is. The lens is very very good, and I am amazed at the quality of the digital picture. It has great color and real depth. It is an extremely easy camera to use. I love it. I didn't even know that GE made cameras.

Reviews.Title: Great Camera!
Reviews.Author: Aimee T
Reviews.Content: I've just recently got into photography and I wanted a camera that would allow me to really learn how to compose and shoot great shots. This camera is easy to use and allows complete control over a shot, but also has a very comprehensive and easy-to-use auto mode. It allows you to adjust just about every aspect of how the picture is shot or for beginners like me it does it for you by selecting which mode you want to use. The LCD screen is a bit grainy but once the picture is shot, it clears up and makes a beautiful picture. The shake control is sort of hit and miss but did help alot once I learned the correct way to hold the camera. The zoom is fantastic! I was able to get some great moon shots. I've been using it pretty much constantly since I got it and over all I'm very pleased with it. Only complaint....battery life kinda sucks. I've gone threw 3, 4 packs of batteries since I got it at the beginning of Feburary. If you buy this camera...which btw is very competivly price, other camera's with these specifications cost sometimes 3x as much...I definately suggest buying rechargable batteries, or you'll spend a fortune in them. A fun camera to use, I definately recommend it to beginners!

Reviews.Title: Smile!!!  or not...
Reviews.Author: thegoma
Reviews.Content: This is an absolutely awesome camera.  I learn something new about it everyday.  If you don't know photography take your time and you will learn, if you do know photography this is definitely for you.  The best picture quality I have ever seen.  Love it!! Recommend it to everyone.

Reviews.Title: GE PRO X500
Reviews.Author: Lori M from MO
Reviews.Content: This was awesome! It was purchased for a beginner photographer, and its perfect. The clarity is wonderful. Love the color. Has a variety of settings. For the price, was a wonderful buy. Works better than some DSLR Ive dealt with.

Reviews.Title: Amazing Camera
Reviews.Author: Trivikram Rao Molugu
Reviews.Content: This cam is amazing. Picture clarity is really great.I tried all the options in this Camera.Panorama mode is also great.

Reviews.Title: Happy
Reviews.Author: T. Poole "Boat Doc"
Reviews.Content: I bought this camera for my wife for Christmas.  Was more than surprised when looking at the images after capture.  The zoom is a lot better than anticipated.  With the 8gb card holds about 2k + pictures.  I do believe it is a good product for the price.  On a side note, I had to threaten to take the batteries and the card away from my wife the first 2 hours after giving it to her to stop her from taking pictures.

Reviews.Title: Awesome camera!
Reviews.Author: Mary  H.
Reviews.Content: Believe it or not, this is my first digital camera, and I didn't want to invest a lot on fancy technology that I wasn't sure I'd be able to use.  I wanted it  mainly to take good pictures of the birds at our feeders, so getting a 15X zoom for this price seemed like a good deal.  Wow!  Between the image stabilization and the zoom and being able to load a couple of hundred pictures into my PC without paying for  processing - this is Awesome!  Getting wonderful pics of our shy red-bellied woodpecker from 25 feet.  I do not have steady hands but the image stabilization and auto focus gets almost every shot perfectly. As other reviewers have said, read the manual but even an older non-techie like me has been able to find the relevant settings without too much trouble.  Haven't used any of the fancy scene modes on indoor shots, just auto-focus, but they're very clear.  (A little too clear, if you haven't dusted lately.)  For the price, this should please any amateur photographer.

Reviews.Title: Excellent camera.
Reviews.Author: Sly Justice
Reviews.Content: The GE Power Pro is an excellent bridge camera for the amateur photographer and for its super economical price at Amazon.com (I have seen it selling for over $260 at other websites). It has numerous automatic but limited manual features to generate vivid, fine photographs. So far, I have been very pleased, amazed, and even surprised by its performance and features. I took off a star only because I have not taken videos with it yet.I bought this camera especially for use in a digital photography class that I am attending; the class has really helped. Please read the complete instructions on all cameras to really be able to use them effectively.

Reviews.Title: Great camera & awesome pictures
Reviews.Author: Kayla
Reviews.Content: I just recieved this camera today. Takes awesome pictures, Far away and in the house. I'm very please with this camera. Well worth it for the price. Came with SD Card and a camera bag.

Reviews.Title: Boy o Boy
Reviews.Author: spiddey910
Reviews.Content: When I saw this camera on amazon I was thinking that it had to be one of those cool looking pictures that when you get the package and open it it would be a piece of junk but i was surprised. I got this Camera because im deployed in afghanistan and my wife said I needed to take pictures didnt want anything cheap or anything to exspensive and lucked up

Reviews.Title: Good Cost.......not so good Pictures
Reviews.Author: Jeremy
Reviews.Content: Ok I thought this camera was a good deal and it does have alot of really cool features....but I didnt like the quality of the pictures at all. I am a professional photographer so maybe im just to picky but the pictures were really shaky and blurry. I was not very impressed.

Reviews.Title: Aaaaamaaaazing Camera!!!
Reviews.Author: Matt A.
Reviews.Content: This camera is simply amazing. I was first amazed that GE even made cameras and then to have one of such quality as this simply blew my mind. I take it everywhere and have no trouble with image clarity and as a bonus, to have so many different options, the menu is very user friendly. Great buy!

Reviews.Title: Ge Power Pro Camers
Reviews.Author: Beth - Australia
Reviews.Content: I just love myGE Power Pro X500-WH 16 MP with 15 x Optical Zoom Digital Camera, White.  Took only a few days to get to Australia.  It is smaller than I expected and takes great photo's although I am still learning all the different things it can do.  Very very happy with it.  Wasn't sure about using normal batteries again but have bought some lithium batteries so it should be ok.  Hadn't heard about GE cameras so did some research and glad I bought it.  Zoom is great also.

Reviews.Title: GE camera
Reviews.Author: Pat of Louisiana
Reviews.Content: This camera was purchased as a gift.  The recipient is very pleased with it.  It is easy to use, the pictures are of a great quality and best of all it has a view finder which most cameras in this price range do not.  The AA batteries have not been a problem and have lasted a good period of time.  I would definitely recommend it.

Reviews.Title: alsome camera
Reviews.Author: gr8love4u2
Reviews.Content: This was bougth for my son's baby shower,i have only a limted knowledge of the camera but i purchase the camera  for it's features,my son says it the best digital camera he has ever owned

Reviews.Title: awsome and affordible
Reviews.Author: reaper00012
Reviews.Content: this camera is by far the best camera i have ever seen or used. everything works great and the pictures are amazing. the only con is sometimes the pictures turn out blury but the pros outway the cons heavily on this camera. if you are looking for a camera that is about the equivelt of the more expensive cameras but it is more in your price range i highly recomened this

Reviews.Title: Nice camera
Reviews.Author: Memon
Reviews.Content: I purchased this camera after reading many reviews on different products. I am a grandparent who loves to take pictures. For me this camera seemed to have more of the point and shoot features that I needed to capture the cute moments. I have used it alot now but mainly in the auto mode and I am very happy with it. I have not explored all the different modes yet, but it is a very easy camera to use and it feels nice in the hand and my pictures have come out clear and colorful. The battery power does seem to hold well, which was one thing that was important to me. I did get the NiMH batterys and charger and over all I am very happy with this camera. The price was right too, except I watched it for a while and when it started to go up I purchased it, thinking it would go up more. But the next day it went way back down. So I was a little disappointed with that.

Reviews.Title: Just love this camera
Reviews.Author: Paul Allen
Reviews.Content: This camera is one of the best cameras I have purchased yet. It's easy to understand and use and takes great pics and video.

Reviews.Title: Great Camera for the price
Reviews.Author: Saabir Saifee
Reviews.Content: I was overwhelmed with the number of features it has. But slowly I am learning with all the modes. This guys stands out on performance with the price tag it has attached to it. Picture quality is excellent, night pictures are clear and zooming is fabulous. All for this price. You couldn't have asked for more!!5 stars.Cheez.

Reviews.Title: AWESOME quality, AWESOME price
Reviews.Author: Meagan
Reviews.Content: I told my boyfriend that I wanted to get into photography, so he got me this camera for my birthday. I was using a regular ol' Kodak digital camera before, but I wanted more professional looking photos. I didn't even realize GE made cameras, so I was a bit skeptical at first. However, I am beyond pleased with this gift. The quality is awesome! I took a casual picture with my friend and it looked like a professional did it. And the PRICE... most professional cameras run around 400 bucks, but this one is well under $200. It's got a great zoom as well as many other settings, and it even has a smile detector. I would recommend this camera to anyone.

Reviews.Title: Great Camera!!!!!!!
Reviews.Author: calcia clarke
Reviews.Content: I needed a camera very badly that wasnt expensive and i manage to find the GE Power Pro. This camera is very good for a first time user. I went to wwe raw wrestling and it took wonderful pics inside, and pics outside are awesome. i will post a pic afterwards.i will recommend this camera to anyone.

Reviews.Title: Outstanding New Cam
Reviews.Author: Razorback1
Reviews.Content: This GE cam is outstanding! great shots, good clear pic's, except at very close range which is no biggy....can't wait to use it on vacation and football season. Stop motion is perfect. Shot 200 or more rapid flash shots on 1 set of batteries.If your new at this like me, jump in, with this cam.

Reviews.Title: Surprising Quality
Reviews.Author: Mz Write
Reviews.Content: I'm a freelance photojournalist who carries around a ton of equipment. After realizing that I have few to no vacation photos, I decided to get an inexpensive camera to take on a recent trip that I could easily pack and carry around without needing a sherpa.Really surprised at how well this camera worked and the quality of the photos. It's been fun experimenting with the settings, I like that it has a little more heft than point and shoot variety. I've even had a couple of photos published from this camera.As long as I don't spend a lot of time reviewing shots, the batteries last. I'm not in love with the macro settings and I need to experiment more with the manual settings. I don't work with video, so I haven't even tried that setting, but I'm glad to have the option.There's a lot of quality here for the price.

Reviews.Title: disatisfied customer
Reviews.Author: dcl
Reviews.Content: i purchased this camera thru amazon to replace a very expensive kodak i have been using for about 7 years, hoping with technology there would be even a better pic and things you can do with the camera. I have had this new ge camera for about 3 months and have used it on several events and it took awsome pics and really good vidio. now after 3 months i was going to use it for my oldest sons wedding and the camera keeps freezing up like a computer with a virus, it would take 2 pics then freeze up for about 10 min. I will never be able to replace the pics i missed on my sons wedding because the camera fried after only 3 months. My son is a navy doc. and my new daughter is a navy corman/nurse/ they were in there dress whites and travelled from the other side of the worl for this event and now the majotity of the memories for myself are only in memories not pics. very unsatisfied and unsatisfied with amazon for not lettinf me return this product for a refund

Reviews.Title: Nice camera
Reviews.Author: GunSmith
Reviews.Content: Great features, small and compact,easily fits in a glove compartment, quick zoom, I didn't even have to read the directions. Hey, it's a guy thing.

Reviews.Title: Excellent camera for price
Reviews.Author: LoveMyGirls1203
Reviews.Content: My husband bought me this camera On August 22 2011 as well as a 8gig SD card and a camera bag, they were promised on August 25-26 by August 24th they had not shipped them out so I called and the guy promised it would be at my house by August 26th, they were just waiting for something to arrive there I guess. Late afternoon August 25Th it was sent out and we received it early August 26th so shipping was 4.5 stars :) OK about the camera now I love it. I have over 5000 pictures between my phone and my husbands phone so I definitely needed a camera bad. I saw this one and the reviews were all good so I decided to go for it and I told my husband I wanted it for my birthday he ordered it and I don't regret it at all its an awesome camera. Takes awesome pictures. I haven't really messed with any of the setting but portrait mode works awesome and the flash is nice too. The only thing that's not to great is the quality of the pics during the night time or inside but I use the flash and they come out better! All in all for the price this is a great camera!

Reviews.Title: bad batteries
Reviews.Author: kgb4u
Reviews.Content: When I finally figured out the problem, the camera worked well and I now like the camera. The problem was the crummy batteries provided with the camera. They were not powerful enough to work the memory chip. I thought the memory chip was bad. The batteries provided with the camera only let me take 9 pictures and then the camera said the memory was full. The memory could handle 9,999 pictures, not the 9 the poor batteries would allow.

Reviews.Title: Even better than expected
Reviews.Author: BookNymph
Reviews.Content: I was torn when I decided to try this camera.  On one hand the price was so great and the specs so much better than cameras that were more expensive, on the other there were enough negative reviews to make me wonder.  But I thought, what the heck?  The price is so good, it's worth a shot.  If it's a piece of crap I'll return it.  And so far I'm glad I did try it.  I've had it for several months now and even took a photography class with it.  To my great surprise it stood up very well to the far more expensive, larger, bulkier and harder to use DSLRs that the other participants had, particularly in the numbers listed for the zoom feature.  The lens is marked as 15x wide aspheric ED lens 4.9-73.5 mm 1:3.0-5.2 and 27 - 405 mm.  When I read that off in class even the instructor's jaw dropped.  None of the DSLRs with their huge removable lenses got close to that 405 mm.  It also had a lot more settings in SCN mode, like fireworks or sunsets or behind glass or a fisheye effect.  Now regarding the problem other reviews listed, the file that comes out blank.  In fact it's not blank.  It happened to me on the manual setting only.  When I looked in the owner's manual for whether I might be doing something wrong, I found instructions for adjusting the white balance in manual.  After following the instructions the white balance decreased and the image came out fine.Now for a few cons.  The image stabilization/hand shake feature doesn't solve all problems.  Some of my pics came out blurry when I thought I was keeping the camera fairly still.  I did recently acquire a tripod so I'm hoping to solve that issue.  Also it doesn't seem to automatically engage the image stabilization.  The images also can start to get a little blurry toward the edges.  Maybe that's user error, who knows?  I was disappointed in the night feature, pics come out very blurry and the color distorts.  However, using manual or program and adjusting the settings myself seemed to solve some of that.  Making adjustments to exposure value, ISO, shutter speeds is easy and the range is surprisingly good for a product so cheap.  F-stops go from 3.0 to 6.6 or higher, depending on your other settings, EV is 2.0 to-2.0, on shutter priority you can go from 30 (has a snowflake) to 1/2000 (has a bird flying).  ISO goes from 80 to 3200, or leave it on automatic.  Sometimes the image will become increasingly grainy the further I zoom in, but that could be again the stabilization not being on.In the photo class our instructor was joking about the best camera you can get actually is your phone, especially if it has HDR capabilities because the colors are truer to what you are seeing with your eyes. Imagine my surprise at finding a HDR setting on this camera!  Though apparently only after you've taken the shot, since it's on the playback menu.  It does seem to correct the exposure, though not always as much as I wish.  Also a good feature that it took some time to discover is the color setting.  You can change it from auto to vivid color, which gets much closer to what your eyes are looking at.It does go through batteries like crazy, but that can be reduced dramatically by turning off the LCD screen and the flash which are the biggest drains on power.  One thing that had me stumped is the two files it produces for every pic.  There's one JPEG, and one THM which my computer doesn't know what to do with.  But the JPG comes out fine, sends over email fine, and holds clarity pretty well even when enlarged.  According to GE's site, the THM file is thumbnail, to allow it to be displayed on the camera's LCD.  Once the JPEG is downloaded to your computer, you don't need the other file. (SEE MY UPDATE!!)  Another annoying thing is that if you haven't used it for a few days, it can take forever to take a pic, because it's trying to recharge the flash. If that's the case you'll see a flashing red lightning bolt on your screen.  Just hold the shutter down halfway till it stops flashing, then everything should go back to normal.One thing I am still stumped on is the megapixels.  It is supposed to be 16 meg, which should give you really good clarity.  While the clarity is far better than my old point-and-shoot, I expected better at 16 meg.  Again, could be user error or need of a tripod to reduce blurriness.I had a 16x20 print made from one of my pics and framed.  The pro photographer who made the print thought the resolution was high enough that I could possibly even sell prints at that size.All in all, I am very happy with this camera, still experimenting with all the things you can do.  Awesome product for the price and amazing options for not being a true DSLR.  Would recommend it highly as a step up from a simple point and shoot.UPDATE: I have since discovered that deleting the THM file cuts down my jpeg file size by about half, for whatever bizarre reason.  So, DO NOT delete the THM, even though it's irritating to have all those extra files cluttering up your hard drive.  Also, I really wish they would make it possible to shoot in raw format, since jpeg does lose a lot to compression.  Still a great camera though, I've had it about a year now.

Reviews.Title: The GE 500
Reviews.Author: bettyboops
Reviews.Content: My husband bought this to replace my older camera, It was on time and getting the camera out it was well packaged, Loaded the batteries in the camera, Its a nice camera, It's a little heavier than my last camera which was a Kodak When it was drop it is totally broken, :-(, So My husband got online and started searching and he was very happy with the views on the camera, When it showed up I was excited to see just how good this camera would be, Because I had stood up for Kodak for years, Well I am loving this new camera and I really like the grip of it, The photos seem sharp and clear, I feel happy he choose this camera, It comes with a nice strap So you can carry around your neck and maybe this one will not be dropped, Because we was out of alot more money with the one from Kodak,This camera is worth the price and I would buy another one just like this one, Thank you Amazon, Betty

Reviews.Title: Best Camera I ever had for the price
Reviews.Author: Elian
Reviews.Content: I have always been a good amateur photographer,  and I owned many cameras from professional Reflex with interchangeable lenses to small fast ones, all makes Canon, Nikon, Sony etc.I received this order 2 days before expected ( Thank you Amazon) in perfect condition,I was not really convinced it would be a good camera and mostly I bought it for the 15x optical, very difficult to find in a low priced camera. I started using it, and not only the quality of the picture is good, but focus is excellent also, the antishake is excellent. Has a very nice set of programs more than enough for an amateur. And the features are more than enough.Bottom Line, do not expect anything better at this price, and not even double.Thank you

Reviews.Title: I love it
Reviews.Author: Marlo "njgirl"
Reviews.Content: This camera is great and the price is even better.. I am extremely happy with my purchase. I was on my way to buying a Nokia and at the last minute I saw this camera. The price defiantly swayed me but when I received it and started taking pictures I fell in love with it....

Reviews.Title: AWESOME
Reviews.Author: K. Huckey
Reviews.Content: I have been looking for a good camera for quite some time. Researching the best value for the most options. I found everything I wanted in the GE Power Pro X500.  I am not a professional photographer.  But someone whom likes to take allot of pictures and travels.  Size, Clarity, & Options are all Perfect.  I like the way the camera feels in my hands and easy to use.  Zoom is fantastic. Thank you GE for making a novice photographer feel like a pro.  LOVE IT!!

Reviews.Title: Fun Camera covers macro to landscapes!
Reviews.Author: photopiatx
Reviews.Content: I purchased this camera for my 20 yr old college daughter. She has not called with any problems. In fact she seemed to learn all the special effects in a day and loves using it to take photos at her sorority, college and R.O.T.C. events. I think it's the perfect camera for a novice and a real plus is the large viewing display and the digital eyepiece which helps when you are shooting in bright sunlight. It's a baby 35mm camera! I'm a pro photographer and researched this brand/model to fit the photographic needs of my daughter. Wonderful little camera and easy to use.

Reviews.Title: MY SON, MR. CAMERA, APPROVES OF THIS ONE!
Reviews.Author: Jo
Reviews.Content: I WANTED A REALLY GOOD CAMERA FOR OUR RECENT TRIP TO EUROPE BUT DID NOT WANT TO SPEND A FORTUNE. I ASKED MY SON, MR. TECHNOLOGY, WHAT HE RECOMMENDED AND HE TOLD ME WHAT HE HAD JUST PURCHASED. I STARTED LOOKING AROUND, BUT COULD NOT AFFORD HIS PRICE RANGE. WHEN I CAME ACROSS THIS GE, I REALIZED IT WAS A STEP UP FROM WHAT HE RECOMMENDED FOR LESS THAN 1/2 WHAT HE HAD PAID OUT. WHEN HE SAW IT, HE SAID, WOW MOM! THIS IS A BETTER CAMERA THAN MY NEW FUGI. WHAT DID YOU HAVE TO PAY FOR THIS BABY? I TOLD HIM AND HIS JAW JUST DROPPED. HE TOOK SEVERAL PICTURES WITH IT AND WAS VERY IMPRESSED.SEE, OLD DOGS CAN LEARN NEW TRICKS;-)

Reviews.Title: Easy to get used to.
Reviews.Author: N. Glenn "Glenn."
Reviews.Content: I originally bought this to replace my standard point and shoot camera, I wasn't ready to take the plunge into a DSLR camera but I wanted more than what most point and shoot cameras offered. I had ready many reviews on this camera and through all the pros and cons I still felt it was a good buy for me.This camera is a bit on the heavy side but once I used it a time or two I got used to it and now I don't even notice the weight. It took me a minute to get my settings how I wanted them, and when I am taking photos in a different environment I take a few test shots before getting started. I really enjoy the zoom, I have snapped some amazing photos using the full zoom and they turned out great. The flash is nice, but I don't find myself using it all that much, many other reviews stated that this is not a great camera for low light areas but I haven't had an issue with it.Overall I don't have any real Cons to share, I would definitely recommend it to anyone looking for something more without going over the top.

Reviews.Title: Great Camera
Reviews.Author: L.L.
Reviews.Content: I recently purchased this for a vacation, pictures are very clear and all the feature it has makes professional quaility photos for a resonably priced camera, really pleased with zoom clarity!

Reviews.Title: GREAT!
Reviews.Author: Butch 1
Reviews.Content: I was totally lost as at the time i wanted to buy a camera that won't leave a hole in my pocket.I more or less took a gamble on this one and I am happy "i didn't back the wrong horse". Good pictures! Bystanders look at it with admiration thinking it is a very hi-tech professional camera. LOL

Reviews.Title: Just OK
Reviews.Author: Spokensoftly "JCG"
Reviews.Content: I bought this camera to take on vacation in Europe and was disapointed that the panoramic feature would not function after the first use. Missed a lot of great opportunities for awesome 360 degree shots in Rome. It's not much more than a point and shoot quality-wise.:(

Reviews.Title: WOW
Reviews.Author: Jim DeWilde
Reviews.Content: I have to say that this product exceeded all my expectations with regard to a digital camera.  I have only ever used an analog 35mm camera.  This was my first experience with a digital camera device.  The photo quality was every bit as good as what I am used to with 35mm camera, if not better.  The zoom lens feature is out of this world.  I could not have been happier with the crystal clear photos using the zoom feature.  I have posted examples of these photos on my Facebook page if anyone would like to view them:  Jim DeWilde/ Lapeer, MI, Yellowstone 2012, final edit.  Again, I cannot say enough about the excellent quality of this digital camera.

Reviews.Title: GE Power Pro X500
Reviews.Author: Sam
Reviews.Content: I purchased this GE camera for myself. The Power Pro X500 takes very good, clear pictures. It is not too big as I read from previous reviews. I have large hands but the controls are really accessible. Battery life is pretty decent and keeping an extra four on hand is not a bad idea. Personally, I like dealing with a "normal sized" sd card. It is a lot easier to load and unload as opposed to the micro sd cards. It is a good camera, or "bridge" camera as is the term. I did not by it for that purpose. I made the purchase just to shoot a few nice pictures without shelling out a lot of hard earned cash. I think some will appreciate this camera.

Reviews.Title: GE Power Pro 16 MP Camera
Reviews.Author: Rusty
Reviews.Content: Have only had this camera a little over 24 hours and can say I am really impressed and happy! Resolution is awesome! Can enlarge photos to small poster size without graininess. Speed is decent with the right settings (still playing with learning those). Zoom is amazing! Took daughter to the zoo today. Took a zoom shot of a polar bear at over 40 ft and every hair is well defined! Battery life is best I have had with any digital camera. Changing settings is fast and simple. Complex enough for difficult shots for me and simple enough to point and shoot for my 9 y/o daughter. I love being able to switch between LCD or viewfinder with one button! Nice! Have not tried dark shots but love that it goes all the way up to 3200 ISO. (Done lots of existing light shots in the past.) I do wish they had made the lens cover built in on this but no huge complaint. May add to this review later, after more experience with this camera. Really happy so far!

Reviews.Title: Great, versatile camera
Reviews.Author: JOTS - USA
Reviews.Content: I have 40+ years in photography, originating in the US Air Force.  I bought this camera for my wife who is reluctantly making the digital transition from 35mm film cameras.  With that in mind, the camera I purchased for my wife had to have simple & advanced features with the feel of a 35mm camera at an affordable price.  The weight & handling is superb with easy access to function buttons & dials, with a right-hand wrap-around grip.  A big plus is the electronic viewfinder, especially for using in bright sunlight or if you have a tremor.  The lens works smoothly & the flash has a fill range up to 20+ feet.  These features are rare on cameras this size & for this low price ($115).After I became familiar with its operation, I took my wife & the camera on a training expedition a couple weeks after receiving it.  She had a blast with it just using the basic features with great pictures (some were manipulated using the software that comes with the camera).  I can't wait until she learns & experiences all the potential this camera has ... wow factor!You will read some reviews that complain about poor picture quality but that may be due to their own inexperience in photography or using this camera.  To counter that perceived issue, when I received the camera, I simply set the camera at 12MP or 8MP & set the ISO limit to 400; thereby, allowing greater latitude for pictures regardless of lighting.  In addition, you want to take note not to push the zoom lens into the "digital zoom" range, unless using a tripod.  An optical zoom is more refined & stable.  By observing these tweaks, you can improve overall picture quality by improving resolution.  My wife & found that this camera takes superb pictures ... & you can too with a little practice & some tweaks.So I would recommend this camera to novice & professional photo enthusiasts alike.  I had a blast using this camera also when my wife would allow me to hold it.

Reviews.Title: digital Cameras
Reviews.Author: Woods Writer "mountainman"
Reviews.Content: You can buy almost any camera with big buks attached to it. But this little camera has just about all the functions you ever really need in a nice priced camera. There are still a few functions that I have not fully mastered with this camera, but at this point in the game I am totally satisfied with this camera and I would recommend it to the better than average picture person. As it is with most multifunction cameras one has to learn how to use all the bells and whistles. I say folks for the money and at 16 mp you just can't beat it.  KW

Reviews.Title: Love it so far
Reviews.Author: pj
Reviews.Content: So far I really love my GE camera.  Have had it for about 6 weeks.  It is taking very good picturesand the videos are quality also.Battery life seems pretty good but always like to have some back-ups with me.  So far I have justused new batteries and have not gone to rechargeable ones.  I have enjoyed the process of getting toknow my new camera but still have more to learn.  I just had a point and shoot before this but thisseems to offer so much more.

Reviews.Title: Great little camera!
Reviews.Author: Catherine Antener
Reviews.Content: I was looking for an inexpensive digital SLR to replace my old camera, a Kodak that had many problems . The GE Power Pro X500 isn't really classified as such, but it sure performs like one! It has loads of features that much pricier cameras have, and a few surprises of its own, such as the panorama mode (although I recommend a tripod for this unless you have a steady hand),several specialty settings, including one for shooting through glass, landscapes, sunsets, plants, night, indoors, and several others that I used with good results. My prints were true-to-color and sharp, even after considerable cropping.I purchased this camera because it had an optical view finder as well as LCD display, the 16MP, and the 15X optical zoom. I was hesitant about the battery life, but have been very satisfied. It's much easier to pop in fresh batteries than to wait for one to recharge, and battery life was longer than I expected. Aside from the occasional focusing problem, which a "reboot" seemed to cure, this camera met my expectations for the price and then some. I do recommend reading the manual-on-CD and practicing with the various settings before taking important photos. I did so, and once comfortable with this camera's abilities and limitations, I was thrilled with the results!

Reviews.Title: GE power pro x500-bk 16 mp
Reviews.Author: RMGII
Reviews.Content: This is the third digital camera I have purchased for my family to use, the first being a kodak 810 pixel nightmare, and the second a fujifilm 12 megapixel, which took great pictures, but was stolen. This replacement is more than adequate to my present needs, at a great price. It takes good photos indoors and out on the automatic settings if you wait long enough for the sensor to analyze and set up the shot you selected. I'm sure as I get more familiar with the camera I'll like it even more. So far, I think I made a great purchase.

Reviews.Title: A amazing camera for the price!
Reviews.Author: Victor L. Green "licorice lover"
Reviews.Content: I got my wife this camera for Mother's Day. I had just dropped and broken her camera, so I felt the need to replace it. This camera has everything you could imagine or hope for in a camera. My wife is really enjoying it. It almost makes breaking her other camera a good thing.

Reviews.Title: A good value with fairly limited potential
Reviews.Author: Sam Underwood
Reviews.Content: I was looking for a cheap zoom camera and I saw that this sweet little zoom from GE had gotten good reviews with people saying that it took great pictures. After initially buying and using this camera, I've done more research about digital photography.  What I've discovered is that almost any camera can take "great" pictures ---that is, if you're not taking pictures of a moving object, and you set it up right and use tripod or hold it perfectly still.I had naively thought that technology had advanced more, but it turns out that the laws of physics and economics don't change much. You see, lens quality is the real bottleneck on picture quality for most cameras and quality lenses are a scarce resource that continue to be hand-made from high quality glass that is extremely expensive. Lens prices aren't helped much from Moore's law.Zoom lenses necessarily require more light because the aperture of the camera shrinks as you zoom out. Thus to get the same exposure at higher zooms you need to use a longer shutter time or a higher ISO, both of which make it harder to take good pictures. The more useful and impressive features like fast-autofocus, good ISO performance, and quick operation generally require the larger bodies of DSLR's. Even high-end compacts are relatively slow. There are always tradeoffs in camera design so it's often difficult or impossible to have your cake and eat it too.This is a slow camera, so you can't just whip it out and catch the action. The zoom is much less useful that I thought it would be because it is so difficult to hold still and even with image-stabilization and a tripod there usually isn't enough light so you have to use a long shutter time but means you can't get moving objects which defeats the whole purpose for me. Also don't expect the photo at 100% resolution to look good at all. It's blurry and littered with huge jpeg artifacts. If you back out on the resolution it can look quite good but then what's the point of having all these megapixels?That being said this is still a pretty good value. The zoom is long. The camera as a whole is good for landscape and still life and occasionally you can get a decent picture of a moving object if you do it in bright, bright sunlight and take into account how slow this thing is. There are a bunch of scene modes for beginners as well as aperture priority, shutter priority, a manual mode so this a decent camera to learn on.But don't expect too much, like I did.

Reviews.Title: Awesome for the price
Reviews.Author: huizengagirl08
Reviews.Content: This camera is an awesome camera for the price! It has many settings and isn't too complicated to use! Worth the money & best deal out there!!!

Reviews.Title: Excellent camera for the money
Reviews.Author: Chris
Reviews.Content: I've been playing with this camera for the past few days and at first is very disappointing when you take night pics or' pic of the moon. but once you get to learn how to use the Manual Mode and adjust the Aperture and the shutter speed and you can take some great shots I was even able to take a nice shot of the Big Dipper an it came out clear no distortion at all. I love this camera, I just wish I could remove the lens to adapt it to my scope, but other than that it's a great camera for the money. Also another thing that I like which I thought was a thing of the past is that I can use regular AA batteries in case of emergency,I got this camera as a combo and it came with rechargebles batteries and a charger. I would recommend this camera to friends an families.

Reviews.Title: Great camera!
Reviews.Author: Tera
Reviews.Content: I love this camera..it takes great pictures..my only issue is the "media impressions" software for editing photos that came with it, if you dont use the "auto enhance" button to adjust contrast and lighting and try to manually do it yourself, the picture looks great on the screen, but when you have them printed, it creates black splotches all over the photo, so be aware. Otherwise, this camera does everything i wanted and was a great deal, i would definitely recommend it.

Reviews.Title: Love this camera! Perfect bridge camera!
Reviews.Author: Kimba
Reviews.Content: I got this camera on sale ($121) 2 WEEKS ago, I am in love with it! Prior to this, I had spent over 200 for a Kodak camera that crapped out after less than a year, and had been using my old Nikon coolpix from 2004. I am extremely happy with my purchase! I am still learning the settings, but am totally impressed with the zoom of this camera at it's price range. It took beautiful pictures of my daughter at the park, even on a less than sunny day in winter. Only complaint I have is I am having a heck of a time finding the right bag for this camera, it's kind of an in between size. But I still love it!

Reviews.Title: Love it, just wish it had the SD card
Reviews.Author: Robbins
Reviews.Content: Don't forget to buy the SD card to go with this camera.  It would be nice if consumers didn't have to buy so much seperate, makes gift giving a chore at times.  However, this camera takes AWESOME pics.

Reviews.Title: GE Power Camera
Reviews.Author: martha
Reviews.Content: I have used this camera very little. However, from what I have used it I love it. I have photographed turkeys, deer, and my grandchildren and thanksgiving pictures. I am still learning about this camera but I think it is going to be perfict for what I need.

Reviews.Title: Awesome camera
Reviews.Author: lj
Reviews.Content: This camera is great.  The quality of the pictures is amazing.  I am an amateur photographer and this camera is easy to use.  My husband is jealous because I now take better pictures than he does. I would recommend this camera for any novice user.  I take my camera with me everywhere I go so I don't miss any cool shots.

Reviews.Title: Great Camera for a Great Price!
Reviews.Author: B. A. Miller
Reviews.Content: I have had this camera for about 2 weeks and I LOVE IT so far.  Its pretty simple to figure out (although I am still messing around with it a little, just for fun  The zoom is great and when I took pictures of my son swinging I didnt even get a blurred image!  I also like the fun features such as the one that you can change the picture to look like a drawing.  It was actually pretty cool.  Like I said I am still playing around with it, but so far I cannot find a negative.  I highly recommend you buy a camera bag for it though, as it is kind of bulky.  This has been my favorite camera so far and I cannot say enough good things about it!

Reviews.Title: Amazing Camera for the price!
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: I ordered this camera on Friday, 23 Sep. 2011 at 4:30PM and received it on Saturday, 24 Sep. 2011 at 9:40AM using Amazon prime and paying the 3.99 for overnight shipping.  That is amazing!Now to the camera review:This camera takes beautiful pictures!  I took it out of the box and without reading anything about it started using it and took 145 photographs in about 3 hours, I'm sure it would take them faster but I was hiking and had to have the right subject material to take a photo.  I never once felt it was to heavy or had any issues with it banging around while the strap was around my neck.  I do have a camera bag as well, so it was protected while not in use.I must have turned the camera on and off about 50 times, btw you don't need to do that after a minute of not being used it goes into a power saving mode.The Pros: Great pictures! Picks out the contrast between lights and darks wonderfully! Light Weight!Wonderful Zoom! Button placement easy to use!The Cons: Noisy, which doesn't bother me; Strap could use some padding;I have not used the video recording mode, but I have a HD Video recorder for that.I love this camera, I would recommend even to my enemies, if I had any.

Reviews.Title: Great camera for the price!
Reviews.Author: Jannine Allen-Walker "Giddy up go"
Reviews.Content: This camera is exactly what I was looking for. I ride my horse in the mountains and wanted a camera better than my Panasonic and sony. This is the one. The stabilization is great. Pictures are clear. Video is excellent quality. Especially while trotting down a trail. The features are great with easy to understand instructions.Highly recommend this camera for those who want quality without spending alot.

Reviews.Title: Happy !
Reviews.Author: Kristine
Reviews.Content: Dirt Cheap ! Originally I was looking for an "adventure" type waterproof etc. camera . They all have awful reviews. Actually most cameras in my price range have pretty bad customer reviews . This one did not and for good reason it feels high quality in the hand ,is loaded with features and takes awesome pictures all while being low priced . I don't know how it will fare with the motorcycle touring life it has in store but I purchased the extended warranty (bought at Sears) so we're good for 2 years at least.

Reviews.Title: Lightweight, and easy to use
Reviews.Author: Patricia Brouillette
Reviews.Content: This is a great little camera. It is very easy to use. If you are looking for a camera that you can control more of the photo taking, yet don't want the full fledged expensive one that the pros use, this is a good choice. It is Auto focus, yet you can set it to a manual setting, aperture or shutter priority. Along with Program (where it makes all the choices for you) and even a movie setting for when you want to film those moments where only a video will work. As a parent, taking still photos is not enough, it is what is said and actions that need to be captured. The only con that I could see is when you look through the view finder, it is the same thing as the back lcd, and not actually looking through the lens; as a photographer, I am use to looking through the view finder and actually looking through the lens.

Reviews.Title: Great camera for $$!!
Reviews.Author: Msforte2010
Reviews.Content: This is a great camera for the $$. Easy to use and comes with numerous capabilities. It has been 6 months and I still love it. Beach Camera is a great shipper. So far so good! I would recommend to anyone. And where else would you get a great deal like this for 16mp??!

Reviews.Title: gave as a gift
Reviews.Author: Dobielover4ever
Reviews.Content: The cost of this camera is well worth it. I bought this as a gift for my fiance. He took the camera out to take some shots of flowers and things within nature. uploading went well on to he PC , a few of the pics he took were blurry. Not sure if it was because of the wind was blowing or what. He is wondering how long it will hold out in the long run ... I guess we won't know that until it dies.  I order one for myself since the price was so good.. When that comes in I will check it out for myself.

Reviews.Title: GE Power Pro X500-BK 16 MP with 15 x Opitical Zoom Digital Camera, Black
Reviews.Author: Halima
Reviews.Content: I love this camera. I love everything about this camera including the awesome fatures! Very easy to work and the manual is very easy to understand and read.

Reviews.Title: My Third Camera
Reviews.Author: saty
Reviews.Content: This is an good camera if you are not too serious about picture quality. It has a amazing 15x zoom. I found this feature more useful while taking pictures of birds without disturbing them. Picture quality is good in sunlight but poor indoors and at low light. Flash is average. I rate this 4 stars having optical zoom in mind. if I had picture quality in my mind, I would give 3 stars. Also battery charge stands more time.

Reviews.Title: Seriously in love with my camera!
Reviews.Author: LuluBee3
Reviews.Content: The X500 is generally easy to use and offers AMAZING picture quality. The zoom is almost like that of an Ultra-zoom camera, yet 1/3 of the price. I recommend this Bridge camera for new photographers venturing out into the world of DSLR cameras for the first time.

Reviews.Title: A pretty good camera, not a great one
Reviews.Author: Waialae Will
Reviews.Content: I recently received the GE X500 camera that I ordered and I tried it out for the first time today. It has some neat features like Panorama mode, which allows you to create a panoramic picture with only a few steps. First you set the mode with mode dial on the camera top, then you set whether the shot moves from right to left or left to right, take the first shot, then align the focus marks up and the camera does the rest. This model allows you to choose whether to use the LCD screen or the viewfinder for focusing by pressing a button on the camera back. Sometimes it is easier to focus when using the viewfinder (particularly on long zoom shots). When using the LCD screen on long zoom shots the view is fuzzy, but the picture that is taken comes out sharp. I find that to be annoying because I don't know if the shot is good until it is actually taken. However the camera's 15X zoom allows it a long reach. I can take a picture of a building one mile away and make out details I can't see with the naked eye. The wide angle setting allows me to capture the full width of a nearby hill and then use the zoom feature to show just the peak. It has many other modes that I have yet to explore. This camera is a pretty good value for its price.

Reviews.Title: Great product
Reviews.Author: Marlee
Reviews.Content: This is a fantastic camera! I'm not sure why people complain about inside photos with it. I've had no troubles and have taken fantastic indoors photos.  You really just need to learn to use it before you complain about it.Best camera I've ever had, I love it!

Reviews.Title: I like the camera for the most part
Reviews.Author: MJratesU
