} } } Length:: 0:35 MinsSo I got this today and was able to check it out. I'm an amateur photographer, but am all right with most cameras that don't have 534853234 functions. Unfortunately, this camera has 4567485645 functions. My photo quality isn't consistent is the only thing that is bothering me. I got some GREAT photos, and then I got some totally out of focus, blurry photos. It seems more random than anything else. As I'll snap a photo, and it'll look great, but then the very next photo will be blurry. I didn't move the camera, I did nothing but take another photo.I can say this, I used the batteries that came with the camera, spent all evening playing with the camera (mostly indoors with flash) and still getting a "battery full" icon so it seems great on batteries. Most of the macro shots were pretty darn good, but a few came out with terrible quality. I paid only $94 for this camera (free shipping) so I'm pretty much happy regardless. I might be able to figure out how to get more consistent photo quality, but if not... oh, well. I'll still get lots of great shots, will also get lots of bad shots. I can deal with it.PROS:Great battery lifePotential to get some really nice shotsEasy to holdGreat priceCONS:Kinda heavy around the neckLens cap is rubbish, just falls off. May as well be slated for trash, as it'll fall off while around your neck one day and get lost anyway.Inconsistent photo qualityComplicated for beginnersOverall:Recommended. I like the camera and am going to spend some time trying to get more consistent quality images. If I can do this, will upgrade the rating to 5 stars because this camera has such a great price. Here is a quick video of some of the better shots I got yesterday. Those are INDOOR, macro shots using a FLASH. They have great detail (quite a bit better in the real photo, as well.. downgraded in video, but still quite good), NO annoying "pet eye" and are pretty darn good for a camera of this price I'd say. The last photo is a full sunlight, macro shot of a flower (that white stuff is actually on the petals) and is pretty good, as well. These photos were all taken on AUTO setting as I have not totally figured the camera out yet.

Reviews.Title: Interesting
Reviews.Author: krishna chaitanya
Reviews.Content: It's a good one to have at your disposal. I have been using this from last 4 months and I have no complaints. It takes some time to get used to. But, I have taken some wonderful pictures with this and I love them all. Low light images are not that great. I don't understand some modes doesn't allow flash and focusing on objects is real hard. And zooming is pretty good. I was able to capture some memorable pictures with this little guy. I was actually planing to buy an SLR, but I wanted to have more experience with these kind of cams. So I went with GE X500. Honestly, I was not disappointed. I would recommend for some one who wants to start with camera's and photography.

Reviews.Title: Dissapointed
Reviews.Author: Kristen Steinberg
Reviews.Content: In the pictures it makes it look way better than it is. This camera takes spotty images. I bought this exact camera from this seller and I do not recommend it at all. I'd rather you get a canon camera that has better quality. Even my canon powershot takes better pictures than this. Don't waste your money.

Reviews.Title: Not for any near professional useage
Reviews.Author: Jarwrat "Jamdowner"
Reviews.Content: bought this to be used as a back up camera, however this camera lacks stability and the zoom is very poor.  I gave my son it and he now uses it as his back up, back up camera.

Reviews.Title: It's not for me
Reviews.Author: Michael K. Hummel
Reviews.Content: I have owned similar cameras from Fuji Film before that have the same housing. This one seemed cheaper and did not have as many options. I ended up selling it and bought another Fuji Film. Just not the camera for me.

Reviews.Title: This camera is nice
Reviews.Author: katmom11
Reviews.Content: I am getting use to it.. I so far think it is a really good camera. I wish I can make a little longer videos though!

Reviews.Title: Dealing with it!!!
Reviews.Author: Anthony Harris
Reviews.Content: It was pretty hard to try and operate without any instructions. Right before a vacation with my family. Trial and error!

Reviews.Title: Occasionalloy you get more than you pay for
Reviews.Author: David H. Scott "Dave"
Reviews.Content: One of the best cameras I have ever had the pleasure of using.  For once, a digital camera with intuitive menus.  Takes the best digital pictures and videos of any digital camera I have ever used.  I have used this camera indoors and outdoors with the same excellent results.  The panoramic mode is very easy to use and the resulting picture is suburb.  I'm so happy that I did not spend an additional $200 for a camera that I most likely would have been disappointed in.  Thank You GE for a design well done!

Reviews.Title: Excelent
Reviews.Author: Jhonny Hernandez
Reviews.Content: The product is in excellent conditionSharp photos even with zoom, face detection and more.Manufacturing rigid, slip surface, uses 4 AA batteries (included), and then you can put rechargeable batteries.And the best price.100% recommended.

Reviews.Title: This is a good.
Reviews.Author: XxdeathnoteloverxX
Reviews.Content: I really like this camera and enjoy it. I needed a new camera for photography since my cat got a hold of the other one. I bought mine at Radio Shack for $102.99 I didn't buy it on here, but I figured I might as well right and say that its a good camera.

Reviews.Title: Just so-so
Reviews.Author: Charles Vasut
Reviews.Content: A little disappointed.  The pictures are not as sharp as those taken by older, lower priced cameras.  Paid attention to focus but most pictures appear a little too fuzzy.

Reviews.Title: Best Ever
Reviews.Author: rob
Reviews.Content: This is by far the best camera I have ever owned. Nice HD pics and easy to use. just point and shoot.Cons: none.Would I buy it again. YES

Reviews.Title: digital camera
Reviews.Author: BC Owner
Reviews.Content: not a bad camera but I thought it would take photos faster between shots. Not as good as my old one for that. Also, it is supposed to be easier to keep photos from being blurry but I have more trouble with this one than the old one. Especially when doing close ups, like flowers. Seems real good on landscape shots and photos of people and groups. But just not all I wanted.

Reviews.Title: Great Camera
Reviews.Author: Nonnie
Reviews.Content: A professional photographer recommended this camera to me.  I was concerned about the GE brand - not well known for cameras of course.  But it is a great little camera that is easy to use and takes professional quality photos!

Reviews.Title: Good product for what you pay
Reviews.Author: OnlyMe
Reviews.Content: I bought this camera few days ago.  I am experienced user of such equipment but I bought this to check out the features mainly because of the price.  Let me say this at the start.  If you have never used any such equipment before then this is a very nice product.  You get a lot of features for a reasonable price.  So far the camera is operating properly.  I can't speak for the longevity of the product yet.  Here are some of the pros and cons:PROS:.  Lots of features for a small price..  Reasonable looks..  Good optical zoom..  Picture quality is reasonable.  Many picture settings are available..  Nice panorama picture taking.  Decent software provided with the camera..  The use of the camera and the controls are intuitive and easy.  Electronic view finder for the eye is nice..  Battery life is decent.CONS:.  Optical zoom is smooth, digital zoom is jerky.  At extreme zoom, the view finder shows mis-focused picture but the saved picture is OK..  The sound recording quality is not good.  The sound recorded with the movies is most pathetic.  Movie without sound is OK.during movie playback on the camera, the sound is not good..  For a 16 MP camera the picture quality is not at par with other manufacturers but then you get what you paid for!Result:I would say that if you are looking for a camera with lots of features at a very reasonable price then this is not a bad product.  Don't try to compare with higher priced cameras.Good luck.

Reviews.Title: GE Power Pro Camera
Reviews.Author: Jeff Parnell
Reviews.Content: This is a great camera. It takes perfect pictures. Even if your hand is a bit shakey, the picture is perfectly sharp. I used Energizer batteries in the camera and they lasted well. The only problem I've encountered is that the battery compartment door is a bit hard to open and close. After a few uses, the hinge on mine broke. Maybe I wasn't careful enough with it. To get it replaced, the camera must be mailed to GE in California for replacement. The charge is $30. Otherwise, this is a great camera.

Reviews.Title: Stopped working after 6 months
Reviews.Author: Amber
Reviews.Content: This camera took really good pictures for the price I paid for it, and I took amazing care of it. However, after 6 months of having the camera, IT WOULDN'T TURN ON. I did absolutely nothing for this to happen. One day I went to turn it on, and it would get stuck and would just turn off. I don't know if mine was just defective or what, but I wouldn't recommend this camera to anyone.

Reviews.Title: Nice camera
Reviews.Author: Shelley Way
Reviews.Content: For such a low price this is a very nice camera. It is easy to use and takes great photos.

Reviews.Title: Very sharp looking
Reviews.Author: Jamie Litch
Reviews.Content: I haven't really played around with any of the settings yet, but am very pleased with the outward appearance and heft of the camera.  I purchased a black one as well as a gift and it is getting much use as well!

Reviews.Title: The best camera I have ever bought
Reviews.Author: Monica Mims
Reviews.Content: This camera is awesome. I like the differnce of it. It takes awesome pictures. I have not had it long so I am still learning the features. Taking it to the mountains and all the captures I did this camera is AWESOME.Great purchase.

Reviews.Title: Great camera
Reviews.Author: Sandra J.
Reviews.Content: This was better than I could hope for.  Easy to operate. A little thick for small hands but it workslike a charm.  The flash was the one thing I found that works best with all indoor pictures.  Irecommend  you try and see if your not has happy with it as I am.

Reviews.Title: GE Power Pro X500 Digital Camera
Reviews.Author: Joan Phelps
Reviews.Content: This camera has many features than one would expect in a more expensive camera. The drawback I perceive is that if one wishes to use these features the menus are relatively complicated and the printed out owners manual is very large to wade through. Automatic takes fine photos and is easy to use in automatic.

Reviews.Title: Love it
Reviews.Author: Kristen Walsh
Reviews.Content: I bought this camera for an event. The quality is amazing. My pictures look terrific. Just make sure you buy a 8g memory card that same  day you order the camera!

Reviews.Title: GE Power Pro X500 Review:
Reviews.Author: Marvin Freedman
Reviews.Content: It is my first digital camera. I had a 35mm for many years. So far it has met all of my expectations. Excellent quality and price. Some have expressed  disappointment of the CD instead of a manual. I called the number on the yellow card and spoke to customer relations. There is a PAPER MANUAL for this camera and they will mail it to you. This is what I did. Also, the warranty covers CANADIAN purchases from the U.S. for this camera.  Hope all have many happy memories.

Reviews.Title: Great camera, if not a bit awkward to handle
Reviews.Author: Robert J. Behler
Reviews.Content: Please Note:  I am reviewing this product only, not Amazon or the sellers service as it was received as a gift and purchased elsewhere.  Also, I am not a professional photographer or shutterbug, and this camera is reviewed based off the use as a casual user.  As such I am not totally familiar with what other products or features are available in the market.Overall this is a great camera.  I have the metallic green finish which does not seem to be offered on Amazon (there are about 6 colors this camera comes in), and it looks amazing.  This is a very simple camera to use for just point and shoot activity and has some great "hidden" features as well.  By hidden I mean they are menu-accessible and you dont have to learn what 75 different hard buttons do to operate your camera.First off I absolutely LOVE that it has a true optical lens with actual optical zoom.  The hidden flash is great for keeping the profile of the camera sleek until the flash is actually needed.  The included (and VERY necessary) lens cap is great and well engineered.  It reminds me of my grandmother's Canon (film) camera with the push button sides to release the cap.  All the hardware aspects of the camera are great and feel well-made.  The lens assemly is all glass (I think!) and metal, giving it the look and feel of a higher-end camera.  The upper thumbwheel is reminiscent of older cameras and really makes switching modes easy, as well as protecting the power slider to prevent accidental turn ons/offs.  The zoom toggle is perfectly placed for your finger and the shutter button (doubling as a focus) is flush-mounted so you dont accidentally change the zoom on your shot while taking the picture.There is no wrist strap for this camera, but rather it comes with a full neck strap which is great as it allows you to actually let go of the camera should you need both hands to do something between shots.  I wish there was some sort of screen protection though, since I'm afraid of letting the large screen rest against my chest if I have a jacket with buttons on or a metal zipper.  The strap and lens cover (attached via lanyard) do tend to get in the way if you're shooting down (say, to get a picture of your dog) as they will fall into the shot if you're not wearing them around your neck.  In that respect its a bit of extra work to just simply snap a photo with the straps attached.  It would have been nice to have a quick release for the straps since you have to thread them through the hard mounts on the camera...not a big deal though and I wouldnt expect it from a camera in this price range.As far as photos and videos go this camera is great!  I have had "good" digital cameras and this camera beats them hands down.  I like the large screen on the back of the camera as it gives a great view of your shot and a great playback to see if your previous shot came out well.  Having said that this camera also allows you to bypass the normal "wait period" between shots as its preparing a preview.  You can snap pictures one after the other without waiting for the image to appear on the screen.  Essentially you're shooting blind after the first shot but it's still a nice feature.  I find it very useful since the shots seem to be VERY sensitive to movement (of the subject not shaking photographer hands) so when taking photos of something organic (again, my dog), I take about 6 shots all at once and between 1 and 3 usually come out with little to no blur from movement.  Videos come out great with equally crisp audio, and the audio playback off the camera is also pretty good (sounds much better when played off a TV or computer though).  Video mode is very easy to access with its own hard button on the back, rather than having to switch modes in a menu like some cameras.The only thing keeping this item from getting 5 stars is the total lack of a left hand grip.  There is no comfortable place to grab the camera on the left as the case is pretty seamlessly blended in with the lens housing on that side.  The right side has one of the best and most secure grips I have used in any digital camera, but this is really a two-hander (it's much bigger and heavier than a little slimline camera).  I would also like to view my pictures without having to have the lens cap off but to operate any function of the camera it has to be fully "on", which means the lens is popped out a bit.  It is a great feature that the camera wont turn on with the cap on, thereby eliminating the risk of damaging the lens telescoping mechanism.Please be aware that this is NOT a pocket camera.  You will need a camera bag like you used to have before tiny digital cameras were everywhere!  I would take the extra heft of this camera for just for the zoom capabilities alone...getting excellent pictures out of it is an added bonus.  So far, power consumption is far less than I expected for something with large moving parts and such a large screen.  With close to 200 pictures (about 25 with flash) and about 15 minutes of video I have yet to notice a change in the on-screen battery meter with the same set of batteries (uses 4 AAs)If you are looking for a small tag-along camera this is probably not a good choice, but if you'd like a camera that can take some real nice or far-away shots this is a great choice.  Just remember you're trading some convenience for added performance

Reviews.Title: Having fun learning to use this camera!
Reviews.Author: Elle Belle
Reviews.Content: I wanted to finally upgrade from my point-and-shoot, super old Sony Cybershot and this camera has been so much fun so far. It has some features of a point-and-shoot, but a lot of the features of a more sophisticated camera. I'm still learning how to best use the different settings, but so far it's well-worth the price point.

Reviews.Title: GE Power Pro X500 Digital Camera
Reviews.Author: Donald Owens
Reviews.Content: I have taken several pictures and this digital cameral is absolutely great for the price. I am very satified and will probably buy other products related to GE from your company.

Reviews.Title: I'm not impressed thus far
Reviews.Author: K. Wilson
Reviews.Content: I have an OLD Nikon 5mp which takes clearer pics. I have a hard time getting any good shots with the GE. I photograph my 6 children 2x's a year. Then menu is a jumbled nightmare and I'm a huge tech geek. If your subject has days to get one good pic then this cam is for you. The battery life is good on reg duracells. the lens cover pops off when lens extends. I'm trying to mention good things. I think my kids will enjoy playing with this one.

Reviews.Title: Maybe 5?
Reviews.Author: curmudgeon
Reviews.Content: So far, it is everything I could want. But I haven't had it long enough to fairly rate it. I only held back from awarding it 5 because I may still find some feature that is not perfect - such as short battery life or flash failure - but as it stands right now, I think it gets a 5.

Reviews.Title: good camera
Reviews.Author: Alex-poet
Reviews.Content: I bought this camera as an alternative to a mirror. Because I did not want to carry a huge camera and its lenses. And I do not regret my purchase.This camera is made durable, very good menu, compact and very easy to use. There are many modes and settings, very much what is in the manual mode, many cameras at this price it is not.This is certainly not DSLR, but not inferior to it as images.But there is one drawback. Its screen is not exactly conveys quality, on-screen image is always worse than it actually turns out the photo.But even so the camera is good. I recommend buying.

Reviews.Title: Shop around-this is a great dea!
Reviews.Author: Roger Curry "SRC"
Reviews.Content: After my 14MP camera met with a very mysterious accident, I began shopping for a new digital camera, and found this. It just arrived this morning, amazingly fast. I am still learning all the settings, but so far I am LOVING this! I did a lot of research before buying this, including the offerings at the store where I work and get a discount, and the prices were not even close. They were charging more for the 14MP version by about $50 dollars. I love the SLR style shape as I get a better grip, and the zoom switch is a dial surrounding the SHOOT button, which is very convenient. I didn't check the MSRP on this camera, but I feel like I got a great deal. Granted, I am a hobbyist when it comes to photography but this camera looks like a steal!

Reviews.Title: Disappointing camera
Reviews.Author: Maureen Dawson
Reviews.Content: I considered buying the Nikon that same day and regret not choosing it over this GE.  There is a problem with the auto focus.  By the time you take the picture after the auto focus zooms in and out the subject is changed.  When using it for still photos, the photo always comes out blurry no matter how you try to adjust the settings.  The settings are burdensome to adjust in most settings.  The only good photos are taken in daylight or outside.  I cannot recommend this camera.

Reviews.Title: G.E. power zoom
Reviews.Author: Howard Ginsberg
Reviews.Content: Takes excellent photos in daylight.Has a problem focusing at full 15 times optical zoom.Like the size and feel of it.

Reviews.Title: Great gift for a teen
Reviews.Author: sherri garr
Reviews.Content: This camera was bought for my nieces 16th birthday. I'm giving fives stars because she loves it and it does everything she wants it to do.

Reviews.Title: Love love love it!
Reviews.Author: Tiffany
Reviews.Content: I wanted a good quality camera without the huge price tag. I am a amateur when it comes to taking pictures but after taking it to a local photographer, I've become more comfortable using this camera. Plus I love the zoom capability on this baby! I can get shots of my little darling when she is performing on stage and I don't have to be "that" person walking down in front of everyone! Awesome! Couldn't be happier. Ecstatic about this purchase. Would definitely recommend!

Reviews.Title: GREAT CAMERA
Reviews.Author: Henriette Wiese Sanchez
Reviews.Content: I LOVE THE DESIGN AND THE FEATURES! TAKES GREAT PICS! THE ZOOM IS EXCELENT. LIGHT AND VERY EASY TO USE.

Reviews.Title: Not very good for long distance shots
Reviews.Author: Courtney A. McKenzie
Reviews.Content: When I read the reviews on this camera I thought I had done enough research, but I did not. The camera is fine if you take shots in a lot of light and the objects are not moving at all. Other than that if you try and use the zoom the shots are grainy and if you are in a dim place again they are grainy. It could have gotten a much cheaper point and shot rather than this. I have to purchase another camera for my needs and this one does not do it at all.

Reviews.Title: I love it
Reviews.Author: Gilbert
Reviews.Content: This camera really works well and simple to operate. It's a great value. Get clear pictures even at full zoom.

Reviews.Title: Good Camera, even better price.
Reviews.Author: Sarah
Reviews.Content: I chose this camera mostly because of the price. Amazon has it marked down 34%, what a steal! I was worried about the the quality of the camera though, since it is being marked down so much but I was pleasantly surprised.Before this purchase, I had been looking at expensive DSLRs. Seeing the price, I knew I could never afford one on my tight college student budget, and was really discouraged to the point that I thought I would never be able to upgrade from my 8 MP, Nikon Coolpix. The power pro X500 was the perfect compromise and fit into my budget.Pros:-Great hand grip. I don't have to worry about dropping my camera anymore, and get a much a steadier shot.-High Megapixel: Gives my photos great clarity.-Panorama tool: I love making panoramas, and this camera makes it very easy.-Fish eye tool: Sometimes I just like making fun, unusual photos.-Battery life: So far my battery life seems pretty good.- Manual settings: This camera gives full manual setting and gives cute picture guides on recommended aperture and shutter speed for different subjects which makes learning easier.-Shoulder strap: I've never owned a camera with a shoulder strap before and to my surprise I love it. I don't ever worry about dropping my camera since it now hangs around my neck at most times.-Auto-settings: The auto- settings (both scene mode and full on auto) seems to be decent and are good when in a rush, although I recommend using the manual settings to get the most out of your camera.-Zoom: The zoom is incredible. I can see the caps of the mountains that run close to my city easily with the zoom. I suppose shooting wild animals from afar would be made easier with this zoom as well.-Price: Seriously, what can beat $99?-Hand Stabilization: I have shaky hands, so I often times get blurry photo's but not on this camera. Every one of my pictures have come out crystal clear.Cons:-Batteries: I would prefer a rechargeable battery over AA batteries any day.-User Manual: The user manual was given on a CD rather than a paper. Going paperless is cool and green and all but it's a hassle to have to read the user manual from a computer. A paper manual would be nice to have to pack a way in my camera bag just, in case I am away from my computer and would like to refresh myself on some the camera's settings.-Picture storage: The camera it's self only has enough space on it to hold 3 pictures, which forces you to invest into a memory card.-Flash: The flash settings are not very customizable.- .jpg: This camera only gives the option to shot in JPGs rather than in .RAW which all the professionals use.All in all, I'm glad I discovered this camera and made a purchase. My hobby is flourishing and I have learned a lot using this camera. I now take my camera everywhere, and have captured some really great photos. I would definitely recommend this camera to anyone who wants to take pictures like a pro but doesn't have the money to purchase a DSLR.

Reviews.Title: Very disappointed
Reviews.Author: Alexandra A. Munroe "donaleka"
Reviews.Content: I do not own this camera; rather I used a brand new one at the volunteer organization where I work. As I was to use it for an early evening, December Christmas Parade, I took it home and got to know its functions. It looked very impressive with many functionalities. What I discovered was very disappointing.Firstly, if you ever plan to use this camera in below 35 degree weather, don't buy it. I noticed in another review that it didn't function in the heat either. At first it shut down after three or four minutes in that temperature.  Even after putting it under three layers next to my skin it shut down, and would not turn back on. Typically I would have shoot 60-90 photos hoping for 5 very good photos. I was only able to take 16. Out of 16, the worst quality went from blank to just blurry lights to unrecognizable faces. Of the nine remaining the only useable photos were those when I'd used the flash. By the way, you must remember to click the flash open for it to work, no matter what the setting. All photos taken using the night or low light feature were too blurry to be of use. The only way I got the one good shot was close up, with a flash and then fixing it up in Photoshop Elements.I brought it home and used it after a few hours, giving it time to warm up, and then again the next morning both times inside. The quality was still bad all around. The macro function didn't work. Without flash the "Steady" shot feature to reduce blur was about 30% better than without it, both at a low light setting. Also the "steady shot" feature must be clicked on with every next click of the shutter, slowing down your ability to shoot consecutively. Neither were great. As a comparison my iPhone 4 at low light and no setting takes less blurry photos.The camera is noisy when zooming--not good for taking photos at a performance, or on the QT, for example. It is very slow to complete the process of taking a shot, even with the flash, which means you must hold it steady for much longer than an iPhone or my SONY point and shoot. This may contribute to the blurriness. What you see on the video display is not the composition you get. Even using the view finder it was off. For the advertised zoom and pixels it should take much sharper photos.The lens cap doesn't stay on well but that is the smallest complaint I have. I wrote to the executive that purchased the camera for our office that it should be returned because it is not useful in the conditions where it will be used primarily.The only positive comment I can share is that the camera's bells and whistles look impressive. They do not function close to impressively. Your camera phone is probably better than this GE camera.

Reviews.Title: Great camera!
Reviews.Author: S. Babcock
Reviews.Content: So far I love this camera. Many features combined with an overall ease of use make this a great camera for those of us who are not professionals.

Reviews.Title: GE X500 compact camera
Reviews.Author: Armando
Reviews.Content: Good upgrade camera if you are upgrading from a simple point and shoot. Loaded with features, will keep you entertained for a long time. Easy to use with easy to understand menus and controls. Optical zoom is very good. Very good value for its cost!GE Power Pro X500-BK 16 MP with 15 x Optical Zoom Digital Camera, Black

Reviews.Title: The Best Camera Ever!
Reviews.Author: Mir
Reviews.Content: The GE X500 is the best camera ever! First of all, the 15x Optical Zoom is awesome much better than any other point & shoot camera. The design is sort of like a DSLR, but much cheaper than a DSLR. The picture taking is good. This is a great camera for new photographers, like me : )

Reviews.Title: Great once you get the hang of it!
Reviews.Author: W. K. Joyner "Kevin"
Reviews.Content: For what it is and the price I couldn't ask for more.  It can be tricky with action shots unless you are in a highly lit area, like outside or under some very bright lights.  But otherwise this camera takes pictures that are comparable to my old Pentax P3N 35mm SLR for still shots.  I never moved into the DSLR realm simply because of cost and I wasn't doing much photographing anymore!  The video is impressive as well.  My girlfriend was performing the day that I received this camera so I took it along.  The pictures were not coming out because they had the stage lights set to point directly at the audience (poor planning on their part) so I switched to video and it came out a lot nicer than I thought it would under the conditions.

Reviews.Title: Great Deal
Reviews.Author: Kirby
Reviews.Content: I read a lot of the reviews, both good and bad. I wanted a cheap inexpensive camera with good zoom capacity. This camera has worked great. The zoom is amazing. I paid $119 and you can't touch it's zooming performance without jumping up in price. I've taken 100+ pictures and have had not one problem. I still haven't figured out all that this camera can do but it's relatively simple and fun to use. It's a good buy!

Reviews.Title: digital camera
Reviews.Author: happyazz
Reviews.Content: its a great little camera it has everything you would want in it .it is also great for people just starting out in taking pictures.

Reviews.Title: Excellent buy
Reviews.Author: SuperBoomer
Reviews.Content: This is a great camera for an excellent price!  It surpassed all my expectations with many features and ease of use.  My vacation pictures and videos were  awesome.  I highly recommend this camera.

Reviews.Title: wonderful shots
Reviews.Author: lcoleman0364
Reviews.Content: I purchased this camera for a trip going back home where there are trees, mountains, and wildlife. On the road you have to be ready for any fast moving photo opportunities. This camera provided everything it said it would and then some more. Very happy with the purchase and would recommend to friends and family. L coleman Nevada

Reviews.Title: Great product
Reviews.Author: Cevyn7vii
Reviews.Content: Really great camera perfect for starting a photography hobby equipped with all the features needed for great pictures...I love it

Reviews.Title: Excellent Camera For Unbeatable Price
Reviews.Author: Oscar Das
Reviews.Content: I JUST PURCHASED THIS CAMERA. WHEN I GOT IT THE PACKAGE WAS BRAND NEW.I OPENED IT THE CAMERA WAS PACKED VERY GENTLY AND CAREFULLY BY THE MANUFACTURER NO SCRATCH OR EVEN DIRT. COMES WITH CORD TO CONNECT WITH PC, LENS ARE VERY CLEAR, ALSO COMES WITH BATTERY. ( SD CARD YOU HAVE TO PURCHASE SEPARATE ) ANYWAY WHEN I TOOK MY FIRST PIC IT CAME OUT AWESOME. 16 MP CAMERA BUT TAKES PIC LIKE A REAL PRO. AUTOMATICALLY FIX THE SETTINGS AND COLOR AND BACKGROUND. I AM VERY SATISFIED WITH THIS CAMERA AND WOULD RECOMMEND TO ANYONE WHO IS LOOKING TO BUY THIS CAMERA IN FUTURE.

Reviews.Title: Great Camera
Reviews.Author: Cher "Cher"
Reviews.Content: This camera takes very clear photos and I love the focus.  It has many features.  So which I have not even tried yet.  I recommend this camera.  I have 2 other digital cameras also, but this one works the best and the 16MP w/15 x Optical Zoom is wonderful.  If you're considering getting a camera, this is the one I recommend.

Reviews.Title: Enjoying my camera!
Reviews.Author: lisa
Reviews.Content: This camera is very comfortable to hold and an excellent choice for someone learning to use a digital SLR style. I like that it has the view finder and what I was looking for taking photos outdoors in the sun. However, surprisingly, I am not finding that I need too often, because the lcd screen is easy to use too. It has very good zooming, but one draw back so far is the ability to perform very close focusing so you have to play with it for close shots. Overall, very pleased with my purchase.

Reviews.Title: GE X500 Ok.
Reviews.Author: KBurli
Reviews.Content: This camera is ok.  As someone who is perusing photography as a hobby, this camera is eh.  I like the features such as the shutter priority, aperture and Manual modes.  Having a view finder in addition to the LDC screen is very nice.  Especially when you are trying to stabilize your camera a little more without using a tripod.  It has 16 megapixels and the 15X zoom is nice also.That said, There are some major issues I have with this camera.  The first is the lens cap.  You can't keep the darn thing on which if extremely frustrating when you are out and about and are like me and ALWAYS have your camera on you.  You can't adjust your image size on the camera, so it takes pictures in 72ppi with extremely large dimensions (i.e. 64x36 inches) which is incredibly frustrating.  I would much rather have pictures at 300ppi and re-size it to a smaller resolution rather than the other way around.  As other reviews have said, it isn't that great in low light settings.  Grain is a MAJOR issue with this camera. Even in manual mode, adjusted properly, it still is a problem. That said, it is possible to take decent pictures indoors, but you need A LOT of light.Overall, its an ok camera. It's Good if you would like to learn on it (which I am doing. However, if you are purchasing this to upgrade before you get a DSLR, I would recommend just buying the DSLR.  If you are looking for something a little fancier than your point-and-shoot, spend the extra money.

Reviews.Title: Amazing Camera for the low price
Reviews.Author: Michaela "CountryFairy"
Reviews.Content: I just got the camera yesterday and I am absolutely thrilled onhow easy it is to use. The camera is excellent for beginners.In comparison to other professional digital cameras, this a greatvalue for the price paid and produces high quality picturesonce you get the hang of the zoom and some of the other greatfeatures.GE Power Pro X500-WH 16 MP with 15 x Optical Zoom Digital Camera, White

Reviews.Title: GE Camera
Reviews.Author: LQQKNatU
Reviews.Content: Love this camera! Easy to use and small enough to carry. Fast service and great quality ! Thanks ! *****

Reviews.Title: ge camera
Reviews.Author: sal j cabibbo
Reviews.Content: great camera for the money battery life is good great pictures some what easy to use many features built in GE X5 Power Pro Series 14.1 MP Digital Camera with 15X Optical Zoom

Reviews.Title: Nice Camera...
Reviews.Author: ramiksar
Reviews.Content: Nice Camera for the price. My wife loves it but its microphone is not very powerful when making Videos. Just get close to it :)

Reviews.Title: love it!
Reviews.Author: erin t.
Reviews.Content: I just got it today! I started taking pics right out of the box! I love the clarity of the images! I'm not a pro, I'm just a mom who wanted to take pics of her baby while her husbands overseas so he will be able to look back at the stuff he missed! This camera works great. My only complaint is that the user guide is on a cd! i have a mini 10.1 inch screen netbook so i have no disk drive so i'm gonna have to see if i can find tis and tricks on google to get the most out of this camera. but thats not a deal breaker, i'd still recomend this camera to any one who wants better quality than you get with a standard point and shoot but maybe doesn't have the money to throw down on a DSLR camera. I am very happy with this camera, I have been inlove with the camera my husband took with him overseas (i've had it for 5 years) but its got compitition for sure! I love that its actually smaller than it looks on here, I didn't want something to big, having a 2 month old baby I have enough stuff I have to lug around I didnt want something t bulky.

Reviews.Title: GE Power Pro X500-Bk 16 Mp is a great camera
Reviews.Author: Angel
Reviews.Content: I love this camera. It's the best one I have ever used. I read some of the one star reviews on this and wonder what happened in shipping, the only reason i say this is because mine was in a larger box with only one packing bubble to cushion it. By the time it arrived the bubble was popped so i know the camera was banging around in there during shipping. Luckily it was not damaged and i have had no problems with it. I had a little trouble at first with blurry pictures but if you try all the different settings you will find the right one to use for different lighting conditions or anything. The macro function and portrait setting are my favorites. I did not like the smile detector, it didnt work very well and a few times it took pics when my kids were screaming their heads off, which its safe to say they werent smiling. Overall for us average joes who are not majoring in photgraphy its a good buy and a great camera.

Reviews.Title: A good camera for the money
Reviews.Author: Shawn N. Flynn "Just a consumer"
Reviews.Content: This camera has all the bells and whistles I wanted. Viewfinder, 16MP, great optical/digital zoom, panorama with easy stitch, video all kinds of modes and options. A wonderful starter digital camera. But I was disappointed with the photographic results. It just does not produce the kind of picture I expect from a 16MP camera. For me, in the end its all about the bang of the picture. I want a bright, sharp, crisp photo. This camera just didn't do it for me. But for the money, it cannot be beat!

Reviews.Title: G.E. PRO X500
Reviews.Author: Richard H. Tarbox
Reviews.Content: Still trying to get use to the settings. Like the telephoto lens and ease of operation. Only annoying thing is the lens cap.

Reviews.Title: Amazing Camera
Reviews.Author: Le Inc
Reviews.Content: we are so inlove with this Camera it works amazing and it has the best features a really good item for the price =)

Reviews.Title: GE Power Pro X500-BK 16 MP with 15 x optical Zoom Digital Camera, Black.
Reviews.Author: Vivienne
Reviews.Content: The camera was exactly what I wanted. It is so good. I will recommend it to friends. T he price was so cheap compared to other ones I saw.

Reviews.Title: Just saying, WOW WHAT A CAMERA!
Reviews.Author: mist
Reviews.Content: If you are familiar with Fugi S series, this is pretty much a replica without the huge price tag. I am totally in love. No, it is not a SRL so don't purchase thinking it will compensate. This camera is pretty much fool proof on auto scene select. I just can't believe it. Beautiful clean pictures for the fraction of a big costly set up.

Reviews.Title: reliably the best for the price
Reviews.Author: legend_inmy_own_mind
Reviews.Content: this camera is well built easy to put together and has a great warranty it shipped quick and came ready to work GE did a great job on this camera and i hope everyone else enjoys theres as much as i havew mine so far thanks GE for doin outstanding work

Reviews.Title: great digital camera
Reviews.Author: aldwin
Reviews.Content: You will not go wrong if you buy this camera because its cheap than any high end cannon camera with lots of feature & it has 15x optical zoom with audio video recording. I would recommend this to anyone because I'm satisfied with the performance of this cheap camera.

Reviews.Title: solid camera at good price
Reviews.Author: P. B. Evans
Reviews.Content: I am not a camera person; I bought this as a gift for my 12 y/o daughter who was looking for more than point and shoot, but lacked the budget to support an SLR. This camera has the look and heft of a much pricier camera, and it was easy for her to use right out of the box. Heaven forbid she has to read a manual or insert the cd. So far, she likes it! I also purchased the accessory kit, which makes her look very professional. I wish the GE insignia was not so prominent. It takes away from the high end look of the camera. My own personal preference would be for something smaller to toss in a bag, but this seems to fit the bill for her.She rarely prints out photos, they may never go beyond her hard drive, so I can't comment on the photo quality. SHe loves to manually adjust the lens and zoom in on closeups. The camera seems to make her happy. If photography becomes more than a passing fancy, she may opt for a high end camera, but this is just right for her needs today.

Reviews.Title: GE Power Pro X500-BK 16 MP, 15 x Optical Zoom
Reviews.Author: Seth Halbert
Reviews.Content: After a little more than a month of use, this is the best camera that I have owned. Great stills and great motion pictures (with sound) from one camera are wonderful.  The zoom will allow me to reach out and get a good picture without physically being that close.  The use of 4 AA batteries is very economical as far as getting many pictures & replacing the batteries.  There are many photographic options available on the camera, but it is easy to operate once you familiarize yourself with the control knob & menu selections.

Reviews.Title: Excellent product
Reviews.Author: Muhhuh
Reviews.Content: Absolutely amazing. This camera was bought as a Christmas gift. I ordered it, selected the ground shipping, and expected a four day wait. It showed up the next day!  After putting batteries in it and playing with it a bit, I found the controls user-friendly and quite accessible.  It takes incredible pictures and even comes with a lens cap, cords, manual, and softwareI recommend this product to anyone that needs a new camera. It looks really cool in white!

Reviews.Title: Great Camera if you know how to use it
Reviews.Author: S. Barry
Reviews.Content: I purchased this camera recently (from a different site) based on the reviews here at Amazon.  The reason I took a risk is because one of the reviews stated that it worked great as long as you choose the right settings.  I agree 100% that you cannot take this camera out of the box and expect it to take a good picture.  You must know when to use the flash and what setting to choose (indoor, outdoor, motion, etc).  You must also change the size of the pictures and buy a memory card if you want more than 4 pictures . If the thought of this is too much, then don't buy the camera.  However the picture quality is great once you get the hang of it. Because it's not the most user friendly camera available, I can only give it 4 stars.

Reviews.Title: great camera
Reviews.Author: t
Reviews.Content: i recieved this camera right before christmas 2011. it is wonderful. i took a bunch of pictures. not a professional with picture taking but other than me not holding my hand steady i had no problems, yet.

Reviews.Title: GE X500
Reviews.Author: connole
Reviews.Content: The camera is a pleasant surprise of value and performance.  Easy to setup, easy to operate and easy to compose pictures and movies.  When comparing the Agfaphoto model to this one I was surprised to find the GE is the exact same camera save the Agfa cosmetics.  I loved the Agfa look but it wasn't worth nearly $40 more than the GE.  My son has had it out and was able to shoot pictures and get good results.  This is a great starter camera that lets you do automatic mode and learn manual modes at your leisure.  A good buy

Reviews.Title: very good camera
Reviews.Author: matt
Reviews.Content: review update: I've used this camera for almost a month and can safely say it is a very good camera indoors and out. the best option for indoors is the (program ae) which is the big "P" on the knob. outdoor pics come out really clear with really good color, video isn't HD but is really good quality. Couldn't ask for a better camera at the moment and I own a few cameras. p.s the white camera looks really good, I've got a lot of compliments on it (doesn't look like a $120 camera)

Reviews.Title: Nice for the price.
Reviews.Author: van
Reviews.Content: Takes good pictures and videos. The only bad thing so far is the battery life. The batteries that came with it lasted about a week.

Reviews.Title: Amazing Camera
Reviews.Author: Chelsie Kozlowski
Reviews.Content: I bought this camera cause i was looking to upgrade from a cheap digital camera to a DSLR camera but I can't afford to spend hundreds on camera right now. I got this camera about 2 weeks ago and i LOVE it. It is a awesome bridge camera, its a great value for the price, and it takes great pictures. Its small so its easy to carry around.

Reviews.Title: Love it!
Reviews.Author: KN Creative Events
Reviews.Content: I'm still learning to use this camera, but so far i love it as a starter camera.  i haven't had any problems using the camera indoors...and with enough natural light, pictures come out very clear and beautiful.  I am adding a picture i took of my daughter to show how great this camera is.  Only complaint i have so far is the digital instruction manual.  I wish they included a hard copy of it.

Reviews.Title: Merry Christmas Ben & Chelli!
Reviews.Author: Jennifer L. Groves
Reviews.Content: I purchased this camera for my nephew and his wife for Christmas.  When it came I opened it to check it out.  WOW... I wanted to keep it for me.... but I won't.  They will be getting it for Christmas.

Reviews.Title: Good beginner's Camera
Reviews.Author: SanjeevP "Bottom Line"
Reviews.Content: I think this is a very good camera for a beginner photographer.  It is very simple and easy to use and does a good  job.  Some of the modes are not clear but my favorite all purpose mode is scene mode.  It has various situations for you to choose from, for example, you are taking a picture of a car going by then it has a mode for that in which it will focus on the car.  Also it has mode for plants that brings out the color and a mode that draws out your picture in pencil, and many more.  The camera is medium size which was a little strange for me because I have large hands so it was difficult to keep my fingers off the lens.  The video shooting is poor, not any better than a phone camera video. I would recommend this camera to anyone that is not looking for a great video camera but does enjoy taking pictures and needs decent quality.

Reviews.Title: Great Camera for the price
Reviews.Author: Jessica Baumgartner "ladibug love"
Reviews.Content: This camera is wonderful. I love the quality of the images. The buttons are so simple to use and are excellent for the advanced technology impaired. There's a view-finder in addition to a view-screen. There are neat features like smile capture and panoramic picture stitching. For the price this camera is well worth it. It seems very durable too. I hope it lasts a long time.

Reviews.Title: GE Power Pro Digital Camera
Reviews.Author: Basil MacDougal
Reviews.Content: I have to say that this is an impressive looking camera.  It's inexpensive, yet doesn't look like a cheapy.  I'm no photographer, but I have owned a few cameras.  I like some of the features of this camera and it does a good job of snapping a few portraits.  Where I have to downgrade this camera is with taking action shots and especially action shots from a distance.  I used it at my son's school play (I was in the back of the audience).  It zoomed in well, but most of the shots came out blurry.  It could be me, though.I'm going to research a little, experiment some more, and then come back and update my review.One thing that I do want to note is that if you buy this camera, be sure to buy a memory card.  I only got 3 photos with the built in memory.  Kind of a bummer.  I was really wanting to try it out.  So, I had to order a memory card and wait to take any more photos.

Reviews.Title: This is a good basic camera.  My only two troubles were the flimsy lens cap and the problems with close up shots.
Reviews.Author: Steph "booklover"
Reviews.Content: This a great general use camera.  The instructions for set up are easy and I loved the clarity of the pictures.  The camera use is also pretty intuitive -just fooling around you can figure out most features.  The secure gripping on the camera is perfect and it wasn't too big for my smaller (female) hand.  It also seems durable unlike my Lumix which totally broke down when if fell once.  Plus I absolutely love the stabilization feature which makes taking photos really straight forward.  The only big problem I had with this camera is that I take very close up shots of jewelry and I thought the 15x optical zoom on this camera would be better.  I had difficulty getting any shots up close so the details of the jewelry were apparent (and believe me I tried everything) and had to settle using my 8 year old Nikon (a 4x zoom) instead.  This camera also did not have has many scenes/options to choose from such as Lumix - pretty basic.  The other thing I found slightly annoying is that the lens cap is a little cheap and kept falling into the view of the lens when I was taking `down' shots.  This forced me to use two hands, one to take the shot and the other to hold the cap out of the way of the lens.  This felt awkward and if you are trying to take difficult shots with one hand the lens cap will annoy you.  Plus the lens cap doesn't have a very tight fit on the lens, so I worry it may come off and the lens may scratch.Overall, I am pleased with this camera.  This is a good basic camera.  My only two troubles were the flimsy lens cap and the problems with close up shots.  Also people who love to fool around with different options/scenes will be disappointed by the lack of extra features.

Reviews.Title: camera
Reviews.Author: Jerry L. Pulliam
Reviews.Content: Quick and easy transaction , unit works as design with great quility pictures compared to point and shot cameras, easy use an great zoom

Reviews.Title: THe best camera I have ever had
Reviews.Author: American Boy "Mainci"
Reviews.Content: Hey guys! I want to tell you that this camera is the best camera I have ever had. It's fantastic! quality of pictures are very good!

Reviews.Title: Mejor que otras marcas por ese precio
Reviews.Author: Gustavo Jordan R
Reviews.Content: Exelente camara, muy buena calidad para ese precio, con muchos modos de fotografia, incluso tiene un modo manual para aquellas personas como yo que desean aprender un poco mas de la fotografia, otras camaras de otras marcas con las mismas caracteristicas pueden llegar a costar hasta $400, me alegro de haberla comprado

Reviews.Title: Great Camera for the Price
Reviews.Author: Murl Jackson
Reviews.Content: I wanted a camera with high power optical zoom, but not needing too many bells and whistles, because they usually add a lot to the price and convenience of picture taking for a pure amateur.  I am pleasantly surprized at getting a 15X zoom for the price of the GE Power Pro X500.  The flexibility of scene functions will take some familiarization in order to select the best settings.  The many features add functionality of much more expensive cameras.  So far I would really love it if the lens cap would stay on!

Reviews.Title: great Camera for $128
Reviews.Author: cappy KTT
Reviews.Content: for 128 this is a great Camera and I love it. good picture quality and a lot of features that i totally love, the best part is the price ill be honest for this price its an amazing camera def a must buy

Reviews.Title: Question about batteries?
Reviews.Author: Savanah Rae
Reviews.Content: I just received this camera for my birthday a few days ago and I was wondering if anybody could tell me what type of rechargeable batteries I could use?I own Duracell 1800 mAH rechargeable batteries and I'm not sure if those are safe to use in my camera?  If someone could tell me what type they are using that would be a great help!

Reviews.Title: CASUAL USER
Reviews.Author: Aric Lechuga "lechuga"
Reviews.Content: The camera is very easy to use.  You will need to buy a memory stick for the camera.  The one negative for this camera is the lens cap.  The lens cap does not clip on, to stay in place.

Reviews.Title: Great Deal
Reviews.Author: qhunter1
Reviews.Content: This camera is a great product and for the price, it is even better. I enjoy using this camera and continue to discover all the new settings that it has.

Reviews.Title: GE X500
Reviews.Author: MrsQut
Reviews.Content: It was more camera than I expected, it's really great. For the price I was worried it would be low quality, it's not.It's only fault is that there are lots of features to learn about.I payed over 800$ for my film camera and this one has many more features to play with.

Reviews.Title: awesome!!
Reviews.Author: ianuno
Reviews.Content: first of all i am not a professional photographer, this is my first camera, since the first day i received this camera i was very pleased, the zoom is great, the quality of photos, the aperture, and everything... i would recommend this to anyone who would want a camera that is having a great zoom, as far as i know point and shoot camera has only 7 times zoom,(that's what i know). this one, 15 times optical zoom, and even if you used that 15 times optical zoom, it's still captured a great photos.ps: forgive me for my bad english.

Reviews.Title: Liking it so far
Reviews.Author: skybmonkey
Reviews.Content: Okay, I am not a professional nor amateur photographer and the last time I bought a camera was in 2004, so i will write my review based on a regular consumer's perspective.I just recieved the camera today, and thus have not really had a chance to take many pictures or go through every feature in extent.I read the owners manual, and what I like about this camera is that you have the option to do all auto mode, or once you start getting the hang of taking pics do manual mode and do your own adjustments.Also, the quality of the pictures is really good for a non SLR camera.  My last camera was a digital point and shoot 12MP luminix panasonic and at that time I just wanted a digital camera to capture pictures to my trip to Egypt.  It was more expensive than the GE Pro X500 16MP, lol, so I am really excited that I paid less money for this one and get more than just a point and shoot.  I love it that I can take black and white, sepia, and vivid colors.  I can also remove red eye, rotate, and crop all from the camera. i tried the panorama but I kept getting an error that the picture was not aligned properly even though it was because I followed the instructions, but maybe I just need to play with it more.  The result from my intent of using the panorama was very good actually, so i am happy with that feature as well. Will be even more happier when I get it right thought. lol.Okay let's see, the package comes with the software, the shoulder strap, the lens cap, and the warranty card.  I love the way my hands grip around the camera, it makes me feel secure.  The regular point and shoot I was always worried of dropping them or not getting a steady shot, but because of the way the GE Pro X500 is designed, I can have a nice and steady grip.  There is a feature on the camera to use for unsteady/shaky hands and I tried it out but really didn't see much difference.  I tried the zooming to the max and the image was just not the best it can be and again that is due to my shaky hands, i am sure with a tripod the picture would have been really nice.  I still need to try it out on people though, because from my little tiny experiments on my 4year old who moves around a lot I can see a difference there than from the pictures of inanimate objects or pets. lol...but who knows I still got a lot of time to play with it.  I think once I learn how to properly use all the features of the camera and familiarize myself with the camera I will be able to make the best of it and get the best pics possible.  But so far I am really happy with it.The price was excellent, HSN is selling the same cam with some muble jumble software package, for like 175.00 and so glad I found this one at amazon, and got it for the price of 130. As I write this review I believe the price is 124.99.  I got the black one, although I really wanted the white one, but whatever if both cameras do the same thing the less I pay the better.  I am not dissapointed because the black is not bad at all.Okay well that is all for my review, if run into major damage or awesome discoveries I will update.  I'll upload (if I find a way to) some of the pics i took, like fruits/veggies/ apple tree, my dogs, and a hammock pic for you all to see.  Again I am no pro at this.  If you are looking to upgrade from a point and shoot, this camera is just right.  It will give you the opportunity to play around with the pictures before you throw 500 bucks or more on those SLR cameras that might be overwhelming.I gave it 4 stars out of five because nothing is every perfect and gotta leave a little room for error :)

Reviews.Title: Amazing quality and features for the money
Reviews.Author: Homersky
Reviews.Content: You wouldn't believe me if I write a good reccomendation about this camera. Just buy it and try it yourself. I Have had a Canon S line before, but the price of this article for the features you've gotten is ridiculous. The Image Quality is average compared to panasonic or Canon, but believe me, you don't need anything more expensive to enjoy photography. This is a Swiss army Camera for the half even the third of the price of a similar product.

Reviews.Title: GE cuts through the chase
Reviews.Author: J. Teye-kofi
Reviews.Content: I love the camera just based on its solid, heavy build. I have come to realize GE is the company that simplifies even complex functions for the consumer and prices its product with the consumer in mind. Took a few pictures, loved it. All indoors. I have decided to read the manual bcos i believe this camera is worth reading a manual for. I normally dont read manuals.

Reviews.Title: very pleased
Reviews.Author: S. Arnold
Reviews.Content: I bought this camera for my boyfriend for his birthday. He's only had it a few days, but so far, he really likes it. It has great features, love that it's a camera and does videos. The picture quality is really good, and the price was great! I looked through a lot of cameras and for the quality of this one, the others were more expensive.

Reviews.Title: GE POWER PRO X500-BK 16 MP  WITH 15X OPTICAL ZOOM DIGITAL CAMERA , BLACK
Reviews.Author: STALIN
Reviews.Content: I STRONGLY RECOMMEND THIS CAMERA FOR QUALITY , BEAUTIFUL DESIGN AND PRICE  IS NOT EASY TO  FIND ALL THOSE  FEATURES TOGETHER .............

Reviews.Title: Problems focusing
Reviews.Author: Heather
Reviews.Content: I have used digital cameras a great deal (about 60-100 pics per day) for my profession.  This is absolutely the worst camera I have purchased to date.  Macro is virtually non-existant and the camera tends to focus and then go out of focus and soon as you press the button to actually take the photo.  (yes I tried all the various settings)

Reviews.Title: Great camera, great price!
Reviews.Author: Beth
Reviews.Content: I purchased this camera after reading the reviews.  I have a trip in September I wanted it for.  I wanted a more sturdy camera than some of the petite (yet hefty price tag) point and shoot cameras out there.  This is a great camera with many options to be able to take great pictures.  It is a more advanced camera than your traditional point and shoot (although it will do that too) but the features and options are almost overwhelming.  I had a friend of mine who is a professional photographer go through the options with me to make sure I was prepared for my trip.  She was really impressed with the camera and was ready to go out and get one for herself just because of some of the lens features and the quality of pictures it took.  I would recommend playing with the camera before needing it for important events.

Reviews.Title: photos are not sharp
Reviews.Author: Shrink
Reviews.Content: I just got off the phone with Amazon to return the camera. Unfortunately I am past the return date and will only receive 50% of the value. I bought the camera after reading the rave reviews and believed it would be good for my African safari. I took 450 pictures and a few videos. I was excited to see them when I got home but was greatly disappointed. None of the pictures were sharp. They were almost sharp but I became increasingly annoyed at the quality. Shutter speed is very slow and I missed animal pictures if they moved. The flash sometimes doesn't work. You need to close and open it to get it to work at times. The zoom definitely needs a tripod. My old Canon point and shoot camera made sharper pictures by far. I gave the review a second star for the video is decent. Due to the quality, I would never use the camera again so I am returning it at a loss.

Reviews.Title: Nice for Price
Reviews.Author: Tandy
Reviews.Content: While I am still learning all the camera features, I have been pleased with the quality of the GE X500 thus far.Some good points: batteries last a long time, switching from photo mode to viewing photo mode is very easy.  Telephoto works well.Problems: being internationally correct, the instruction booklet is printed in many different languages, yet it is very basic in that it doesn't go into good detail on the features. I have had problems with the macro mode working but can't figure out how to correct it.  As other reviewers mentioned, the lens cap does not fit well.  Also, the placement of the camera strap is a problem in that it obstructs the lens very easily. If I were redesigning this camera, I would place the strap attachments towards the bottom or back of the camera and develop an internal lens cap that automatically slid over the lens when the camera was turned off. The cap is very useless as it is. Overall, the camera is very nice for the price.

Reviews.Title: broke when received
Reviews.Author: ron
Reviews.Content: camera did not work. power light on with battery installed. nothing else. sent to manufacture. They are investigating what caused problem. instructions inpackage said do not send to store where purchased call 1-800-730-6597. They told me I pay for shipping and insurence and send to them. If and when I hear someting I will be happy to let you know.

Reviews.Title: WOW hell of a deal!
Reviews.Author: W.a.R.
Reviews.Content: $140 !!! ... 16MP w/ 15x zoom...... this is a steal! The camera is great quality, easy to take out, power on, and take pictures. Perfect for what I needed!

Reviews.Title: 1 of GE Power Pro X500-WH 16 MP with 15 x Optical Zoom Digital Camera, White
Reviews.Author: Lori
Reviews.Content: This is the worst camera I have ever owned.  I bought it in April and it took fair pictures although when you downloaded them you got a picture and a shadow picture.  Chalked that up to user error- it's possible.  Then it started telling me the card wasn't formatted.  Lost lots of pictures.  Bought three cards since April.  The guy at Wolf Camera told me there was nothing wrong with the cards.  If you try to format it, it tells you there's a card error.  Can't get it to work at all now. I'm not wasting anymore money on this junk camera and I don't recommend it to anyone.GE Power Pro X500-WH 16 MP with 15 x Optical Zoom Digital Camera, White

Reviews.Title: Horrible Camera
Reviews.Author: Jonathan C. Goodpasture
Reviews.Content: I bought this back in May 2011 for pretty much the same reasons you are here checking it out now ... it is super cheap for the great zoom and awesome features. Believe me it is a horrible camera with great features. Most of our shots are blurry unless you don't move at all and have near perfect lighting at all times. Animals walking some in the zoo forget about it. Pretty much anything under these new light bulbs the government is about to subject us to ... forget about it. Do yourself a favor and forget about this one folks. On top of this it it always saying it can't read the memory even though we turn it off and back on and it is OK. Plus it takes 4 AA and eats them like candy.

Reviews.Title: Terrible, don't get duped
Reviews.Author: Daniel Night "Do to others as you would have ...
Reviews.Content: Pros:1) It's lite.2) It lets you turn off the sounds.3) It has multiple indicator sound types to choose from.Why I hate it:1) There was some sticky smudge in the corner of the LCD screen (and the screen isn't protected with a film which all cameras come with when new), and when I tried to clean it it made major smudging on the screen.2) The lens extends regardless of whether or not you are viewing images or not, so it sticks out for nothing, it seemed at one point to fully retract while it was on, but I couldn't reproduce that effect.3) The camera can catch massive purple fringing or looked really washed out if you don't give it about a second and a half to adjust. That's not as big deal as what I'm about to say next.4) After spending 30 minutes baking in the sun taking pictures, I find, to my disgust, a bunch of blank jpg files when I went to review my images. And there was with no explanation as to why. When I examined the sdhc card was a bunch of .thm files, which seem to be thumbnail files, but also no explanation what those were there for. I thought maybe I should format the card (big mistake I accidentally erased a ton of images on it from my fuji digital camera) and that still produced all blank files.5) The only pictures I managed to see were ones it was able to take which was from the internal built in memory.6) Examining pics on this thing is almost pointless since the lcd screen res is terrible.7) The camera seemed to be covered in unsightly marks on the plastic when I first examined it, but I decided that they were so numerous and fine that they must be there for gripping purposes, but they are so small and smooth that it ends up just being an unsightly mess, as if plastic got sprayed onto the camera by accident.7) There is no lens thread ,so forget about easy protection of the camera lens.8) Digital zoom is blah.9) It looks and feels like it's below the quality of a $110 pocket camera that you can usually find in Walmart. But, it has the look of a disposable camera, which might be a first for an imitation DSLR. Looks cheap in other words, cheap in an ugly way.Massively disgusted and going to return it. (Make that "did" return it).

Reviews.Title: Junk right out of the box
Reviews.Author: wisconsin wildman
Reviews.Content: ordered this and paid for two day shipping to get it quicker.  opened up the box and put in batteries and memory card.  took pictures.  looked at pictures on view screen.  verticle line down the middle.  load to computer-same line.  card is ok-camera not.  junk.  spent an extra $20 and bought a fujifilm finepix s3200 (24x opt zoom). i would not recommend this camera (GE x500) to anyone. junk.  waste of time and money.  don't want another one.  low quality product, plus it told me the batteries were dead when they weren't.  junk.  feels cheap-fuji feels very solid.  fuji much nicer-try it and you'll see the difference.  i used to shoot a lot of 35mm stuff using minolta bodies.  i know better quality stuff.  now only want an affordable bridge camera.  the fuji is a much better unit at just a little higher price.  my budget was to stay under $200 as i no longer shoot a lot of pictures.  my money would have been wasted if i kept this product.**update***i dumped the terrible fuji (bad low light, slow)and now am the proud owner of a KODAK Z990, for just a little more it is a way superior camera (just make sure you upgrade the firmware).  well worth the extra little bit of money spent!!  highly recommended!!!

Reviews.Title: Don't waste your money
Reviews.Author: the buzzard
Reviews.Content: I bought this camera a year ago and for one year it worked well. Eats up batteries in no time so have a lot handy. A couple of days ago I could not download my pictures or movie clips. I tried changing the cable to no good. So now what good is a camera that can't download. My little Kodak served me well for 5 years before it started to to the same thing.When you look at the mini ports that are used, it is no wonder why things like this happen.Anyway it's back to Walmart to pick up another $100.00 camera. I wonder how long this one will last. All this digital stuff is nice and fancy but unless you pay top dollar you are basically getting junk. I had my old fashioned Leica for twenty years.

Reviews.Title: This Camera Is A Piece Of Crap
Reviews.Author: Who Knew
Reviews.Content: I have owned many cameras over the years, I am 49 years old, I really enjoy taking pictures of all kinds of things, the wife & I both ride motorcycles & love shooting pictures of the mountains waterfalls & nature, but this camera really don't work worth a flip, batteries, yes we have used rechargeable & high dollar non chargeable one too, but that's not the issue, this camera just takes bad pictures, we will shoot 50 pictures, & only 10 might come out, we've tried everything, so be smart, don't buy this camera.  GE Power Pro X500-BK 16 MP with 15 x Optical Zoom Digital Camera, Black.

Reviews.Title: Having trouble with mine
Reviews.Author: Joe N.
Reviews.Content: it blinks red every few hours (kills the batteries within a couple hours) im no n00b when it comes to electronicsbut this just doesnt seem right to me especially when you just take pictures and do no video recording,contacted seller apparently they do no such thing as replacements or refunds i would drop the F bomb in this comment but im just going to say steer clear.

Reviews.Title: Batteries
Reviews.Author: Sam
Reviews.Content: I loved this camera. I'm not a professional, but I thought it took great pictures for my purposes. But we've only had it about a week, and I'm having to change the batteries every day. We have a battery tester and it's telling me GOOD batteries are BAD. That is unacceptable. I shudder to think how many batteries people who don't have a battery tester just throw away thanks to this camera. I did read a few reviews about the batteries not lasting long, but thought they were probably just being picky. They weren't. We're returning it. The camera search continues...

Reviews.Title: my trip to Disney Hollywood  yeaster day
Reviews.Author: ed
Reviews.Content: this was take my new GE X500 the batter  hold up vere good the camera rock  the GE is the best  i  place my older onmay 10 i got it on may12  then i test it yeaster day at Disney Hollywood  it work good not trouble  at all with my and the batter  hold up long time to

Reviews.Title: Love Love Love this Camera
Reviews.Author: C. Precourt
Reviews.Content: I received this camera about three weeks ago from a different seller; I had to have it in purple; at this point I must have taken more than a thousand pictures and am happy to report, I love this camera; I did read a lot of reviews before I purchased and have been trying so hard to find something wrong with this camera, but i can't; decided to buy a #10 speed memory card and the eneloop rechargable batteries right away also; batteries seem to last forever; it does have some shutter lag, but so did my Kodak EasyShare LS743 which I loved for ten years and was starting to finally get tired; hence the upgrade to this GE x500; the zoom is amazing; the pictures are so clear; I can't stop taking pictures and posting to facebook; the panorama mode is also fantastic; I usually just take the card and load the pictures into my computer by way of the card reader; if you use the windows photo program, you will get some information tag with each picture, which to me is useless, but if you use the Adope Photo Shop program, no more tags; I have not figured out how to upload with the ARC program that comes with the camera, but that does not take stars away from this product; my daughter just had me order one for her and a friend of mine just bought one herself, just from seeing how easy it is to use and how great my pictures come out; if you are a pleasure photographer like I am, do not hesitate to buy this camera; the price is fantastic for the value;

Reviews.Title: Great camera, except for one little detail..
Reviews.Author: C. Brothers
Reviews.Content: My wife and I bought this at K-mart because it seemed a great deal for such a feature packed unit. We agreed that it was the best SLR camera we've ever owned. The photos are excellent, and the interface is easy. 2 months and a week after purchase, it stopped working altogether, without warning. It was within the return policy of K-mart so we took it back and it was happily exchanged. We thought that was the end of that, but six months after the exchange, the second one had a failure in the lens motor. Considering the troubles, I'm not going to go with General Imaging again.

Reviews.Title: GE Power Pro X500-WH Camcer
Reviews.Author: cher
Reviews.Content: Camera takes wonderful pictures.  The only thing negative is the cap that covers the lens is useless.  It will not stay on, so there is really no point in having it there.  Otherwise the camera is wonderful.  Takes close up pictures very clear across a football field.

Reviews.Title: Good camera for the price, could use some improvements
Reviews.Author: almosthappy
Reviews.Content: This camera has a lot of advanced features for the price.  It's certainly a strong contender for people who want a camera that has many features but is still relatively easy to use for an amateur.  My experience so far has been that the picture quality is mixed, but generally good.  The anti-shake feature works well.  It also has impressive battery life.That said, there are some drawbacks.  The design of the camera is wide like a SLR.  This of course allows the camera to have some better features, but the average person (myself included) is probably going to prefer to carry around something smaller that can fit in a pocket or small bag.  The camera also doesn't have an optical view option, which would be helpful in some situations.  The small window you can use on most cameras to view your target directly is actually an LCD display.  The lens cover is also irritatingly loose.Ultimately, if you are looking for advanced features without the price, this camera is a fine choice.  If you are looking for a camera that you can carry around everywhere and rely on for consistently good quality, you may want to shop around.

Reviews.Title: Bridge over troubled water
Reviews.Author: xkydivr
Reviews.Content: My biggest surprise with the camera is that it is made by GE. Evidently I've been out of the loop too long because I didn't even know GE MADE cameras.The GE power pro X500 is a "bridge camera". The phrase was coined in the 80s to designate a camera that bridges the gap between point-and-shoot cameras and the more advanced SLR cameras with multiple interchangeable lenses mostly used by professionals.I'm no expert. As a matter of fact ,in my youth ,I was famous for taking pictures with the lens cap on. This camera has a gentle press-fit lens cap which falls off when you turn the camera on and the lens  pops out. I also forget to open the flash and my indoor pictures still turn out great. LOVE the panorama feature. Just take the first picture, turn the camera until the circle and square line up and the camera does the rest! So far I haven't had a bad picture or video. I use the 8GB class 6 SDHC card.  If you want a camera that does it all for you this one does or you have a lot of manual setting if that's your preference.I use the google picasa software because it was already installed on my computer and I'm familiar with it. It works great for downloading and cataloging your pictures. I can't vouch for the GE software because I haven't used it.The manual is on the CD so I don't find it very convenient. Of course you always know where it is but it is a hassle scrolling through to find what you need to know. It is a PDF file so I guess you could print it out if you wanted.... 85 pages. I tried to print specific pages but couldn't get it to work.To sum it up I think the camera is great for the price... works great for the amateur and should satisfy the more advanced photographer. Oh yeah, also comes in refrigerator white.

Reviews.Title: NO Printed Manual
Reviews.Author: DAVID A. ZIMMERMAN
Reviews.Content: Great Camera so far, but you don't get a printed manual with it.I can't carry my computer around with me, so not having a manual to carry with the camera forces me to either use less options or print out one myself.89 pages, a bit much.Come on GE, the CD comes with about 20 different language manuals on it, if you are going to sell in the USA print an English manual to put with it.Camera is made in China, the CD is fairly good but reads as though it was also made there at times.

Reviews.Title: SIMPLY THE BEST
Reviews.Author: BiG-SaVeR "Nazrett"

} } } Length:: 0:39 MinsI am commenting on GE 14.1MP which I purchased on Amazon.I bought this camera after trying a GE web cam few years a go, GE simply makes the best electronic ever, I have seen some other brands including CANON EOS D51, but I really love my GE handy digital camera the only thing I did not like is that I can not take clear shoot of earth surface while flying over 40,000' my CANON can take clear shoot but with a large lens, I was able to take clear shoot of an air plain flying over Amsterdam while I was flying in different KLM plain, more than anything else this camera takes the best quality videos from every distance it can see, my new born baby pictures and video clips are a good examples.What I love about GE is not only their cameras, simply let us look at medical machines such as x-ray machine and MRI machines in almost every medical facility in the USA, I buy their product not only because of they make the best but also such a company who make their product for success of consumers deserve to keep running. I love their product and I enjoy it as well.

Reviews.Title: I love this camera!!!
Reviews.Author: lindajs
Reviews.Content: I purchased this camera when it was on sale at K-Mart for $119.99.  (I did a lot of research before purchasing.) I LOVE it.  The zoom it wonderful and I, too, love the panarmic feature.  My husband and I just returned from a week at Panama City Beach and I used it the entire time, snapping close to five hundred photos (you may be wondering, just how many pictures can you take of the ocean, sand and gulls...let me tell you, a lot!), as well as doing numerous video clips.
