The batteries (Energizer Ultimate Lithium),  are not rechargeable but they lasted and are still going.  The Sd card I use is Kodak and I have had no problem with it.I take many indoor pictures because I am the proud grandmother of 6, I repeat, 6 beautiful girls, ages 10, 7, 5-1/2, 5, 4 & 3.  I have not had any problems with the pictures.  They have turned out for the most part great, although sometimes you do have to work with the lighting.I guess the only complaint I have is with the flash and that's probably because I have not had the time to really read through the ownert's manuel (although I have had the camera for about a month.)  I need to just take the time to read it thoroughly.  (If all else fails, reads instructions! lol)Bottom line, I would recommend this camera to anyone because it is very easy to use, has wonderful features and it very reasonably priced.  So, go ahead! purchase and enjoy!

Reviews.Title: Great camera
Reviews.Author: Craig Stevenson
Reviews.Content: I was not sure about this camera but after reading a lot of reviews I decided to give it a try.  For the price it is a great camera.  Everything works and the features are good and there are a lot of them especially for the price of the camera.  Of course you can get better cameras, but for the price on this one you get your money's worth and then some.

Reviews.Title: not a bad little camera
Reviews.Author: abatemember
Reviews.Content: finaly got away from the film. This is a nice little camera, at the time of purchase we had grand kids number two and three on the way. With the cost of developing firm not getting a ny cheaper, I figured it was time for the digital move. The camera is easy enough to get figured out with lots of different settings, that at fiirst seemed like over kill. I would recemend a tri-pod for shot that have any distance.

Reviews.Title: Great Camera
Reviews.Author: Linda R "Linda"
Reviews.Content: I have used smaller camera in the past but wanted to step up to a nicer and more powerful one.  This one meets all my requirements.

Reviews.Title: I like it for everyday use
Reviews.Author: Marek
Reviews.Content: Good price, good large images, and zoom, a good camera, but not for fast shooting. I like it for everyday use, but not suitable for the unique photos

Reviews.Title: Got this for my fiance.
Reviews.Author: Susan John "Suzi"
Reviews.Content: He loves this camera. It works well as a general camera for the digital images he uses for creating cards and postcards.

Reviews.Title: Really great for beginners
Reviews.Author: iMinkis
Reviews.Content: i bought it and it was really great, until i went to something more advanced then gifted it! and they loved it too!

Reviews.Title: I wish I kept it
Reviews.Author: Ly Hoang
Reviews.Content: I was going to use this for my photography class but it turned out I needed a DSLR that can remove it's lens so I had to return.But from when I did use it, it was so fun! I haven't had a working camera for like a year and a half, I forgot how much I loved taking pictures. I played around with it as much as possible!I can't say I ran into problems nor can I say that it was THE BEST camera, but it was pretty decent. And I would totally resell my DSLR to have this again.

Reviews.Title: Best Buy for the Money
Reviews.Author: Dante
Reviews.Content: Best Camera I ever had, Love all the  auto. photos setting and  the wide angel auto is great. I have used it just to check it out looks, all looks good will have photos  printed this week.I am retired and anti shake mode should help in telephoto mode.I think it a great buy.

Reviews.Title: Great
Reviews.Author: Kaylan Brett
Reviews.Content: Great camera as far as point-and-shoots go...definitely gives you the feel of a high tech piece of equipment without the price or the responsibility.

Reviews.Title: Great Prodcut
Reviews.Author: S. Schmeckpeper
Reviews.Content: This is exactly what I was expecting, great that it takes AA batteries and not a charging pack easy to use on the go. You will not get studio quality pictures but they will be great quality and the size is right and the price is right and the camera is all around right.Don't wait get yours!

Reviews.Title: Buy a point and shoot instead.
Reviews.Author: thetwoofusshop
Reviews.Content: This thing is clunky and takes mediocre pictures compared to most point and shoots or high end cell phones. Ya dig?

Reviews.Title: took a chance
Reviews.Author: jamfre71
Reviews.Content: I wanted a camera to take with me to the Philippines. It performed great I even help a friend get one. great cross over camera.

Reviews.Title: Okay camera
Reviews.Author: Lisa A. Lunde
Reviews.Content: Easy to use and does the job and is okay for the average picture taker like me as I was not looking for anything too high tech or elaborate.

Reviews.Title: Lost in cyberville!!!
Reviews.Author: Charlie Manning
Reviews.Content: The GE is great.  But, I cannot figure out how to transfer my pictures to my computer!  I have followed the instruction manual exactly using the CD and can't seem to get it.I have an ordinary HP PC using Windows XP.  Please send me step by step instructions to ctmanning@juno.com.

Reviews.Title: Great product for the price!!
Reviews.Author: Moriah
Reviews.Content: The only bad thing I have to say about this camera, is after a few months of use the zoom nob gets stuck and is hard to get the proper zoom in our zoom out that I want.  I don't know if this was a defect that has happened to all of them, but that is the only reason I did not give it 5 stars.  The rest of it is great and takes immaculate pictures!

Reviews.Title: x500 camera
Reviews.Author: perry
Reviews.Content: the camera is grate takes grate shots only thing the battery's  were junk did not take any pictures didn't even turn on camera once got new batters it worked grate thanks Perry.

Reviews.Title: The price was right.
Reviews.Author: Daniel F. Cole
Reviews.Content: For the features that I wanted with great range and quality of pictures, this was the camera for my wife.  She especially wanted the eye viewer with lcd screen option.  She is a point and shoot casual photographer and has been satisfied with the camera especially since the price was right.

Reviews.Title: Great camera
Reviews.Author: Riley K.
Reviews.Content: I have owned this camera for about a year and a half and I've loved it. At the time I had very, very little money but wanted to  get into photography so I purchased this camera. I have used it from then and is my go to digital camera. If you are youth and want to get into photography but have very little money I highly recommend this camera. The 15x zoom is very versatile and image quality is good. Very good for a camera of the price. I dose have a CCD sensor witch is good but know that this camera has horrible high ISO and low light performance. And it is to be said that this camera and it's lens are not very sharp. All of this said I would buy it again and am very pleased. I have some images of Fine Art America shoot with this camera. Very impressed.[...][...]

Reviews.Title: Excellent portable zoom digital camera
Reviews.Author: Camera newbie
Reviews.Content: Third purchase of GE Pro digital zoom cameras.  Keep losing them to family and friends.  Three features to improve:  Ac adaptor to recharge batteries, better sensitivity to low light (maybe that's just me), and a safety switch to keep camera OFF when packed in a tight suit case.  That's just me.  A go-to digital camera with lots of excellent features.

Reviews.Title: Fun Camera
Reviews.Author: Kelly
Reviews.Content: The price was a little high but it takes some good photos.  I am now looking for an SLR that would give me more options.  But this is a good started if you want only a few functions.

Reviews.Title: Good Deal
Reviews.Author: Cher T.
Reviews.Content: My last camera was an Olympus and it was very good until my son dropped it. That was 3 yrs. ago. When I saw this deal with the camera, especially a GE brand I was skeptical (GE making cameras??!!!!). Anyway after checking out the specs I was convinced that it could be a good camera. I was not disappointed. The pictures are clear and the function of the camera is easy. Some camers give a blur when the zoom is used, but this one is just wonderful. Great buy!

Reviews.Title: GE Digital CameraWorks great,
Reviews.Author: Richard Cioto
Reviews.Content: Took it on vacation to Macinack Island. Spectacular pictures of  all we took Poster picture quality of the Falls in Canada. The key is to practice the features and get them down pat.

Reviews.Title: Bought as a gift. Giftee very happy with it.
Reviews.Author: GiantChickenOfDoom
Reviews.Content: Bought as a gift for my sister-in-law, who fancies herself an amateur photographer. She loves it, and has particularly mentioned favorably the depth of zoom. She even won 2nd place in a local nature photography contest, with a picture of a bird on a tree branch.

Reviews.Title: Good
Reviews.Author: ambrozini007
Reviews.Content: Very good photo camera. Nice and comfortable. Arrived on time. I use more than 2 years. Night shoot in a bit of trouble. Need a tripod. However, all the apparatus, it is difficult night .. The price comparison tool was good. Workers. Thank you.

Reviews.Title: Liked it but...
Reviews.Author: elaloha
Reviews.Content: It was a too little automatic for me. I needed to shoot pieces of jewelry and couldn't get the close ups I needed. So it didn't fit my needs.However I gave it to a friend who is enjoying it enormously.

Reviews.Title: Nice camera
Reviews.Author: Laurie B. Wilburn
Reviews.Content: Goes through batteries really fast though.  Have taken some pictures that show up right after you snap the picture but then go back later and have a white screen.  Not sure what that's a bout.  Have had other digitalis that didn't do that.  Good quality pictures

Reviews.Title: camera
Reviews.Author: connie murphy
Reviews.Content: My daughter picked this out for its style and features. She was very pleased and became a picture fanatic. I would definitely recommend this product.

Reviews.Title: Exceptional Camera
Reviews.Author: Peg Picone
Reviews.Content: I take close-up pictures of my porcelain paintings during each phase of firing in addition to using the camera for studies of plants, animals and scenery.  It is easy to use and does so many functions.  I'm not a camera expert and this fits my needs exactly.  I've learned to take panorama shots and to use the various functions without having to be a PH.D in photography.  This is an excellent camera at an excellent price.  I highly recommend this camera.  BTW, I also bought the Transcend 16GB Class 10 SDHC Flash Memory Card.

Reviews.Title: wish I knew there was no lens cap
Reviews.Author: KATHIE
Reviews.Content: No lens cap. Having hard time finding one. But camera is in good working order for a beginning teen photographer.

Reviews.Title: best camera i have ever had!!
Reviews.Author: Tjs
Reviews.Content: this camera has been everything i could have ever hoped for. i like it so much. the zoom is just perfect!!!

Reviews.Title: Really liked this camera.
Reviews.Author: kerilr
Reviews.Content: Exactly what I was looking for.  Easy controls, easy to use, and reliable when I need it.  Image quality is very nice.

Reviews.Title: I'm no expert
Reviews.Author: CO GIRL
Reviews.Content: I'm no expert but I was very interested in improving my ability to use zoom for landscape photos. Living in beautiful Colorado that's a must.  This camera seemed like an economical alternative to the big brand names and so I tried it.  I'm so impressed.  The instructional CD that came with it is excellent.  I have begun to take practice shots and find that they are beautiful. The weight balance of the camera is perfect, it fits in my hand perfectly.  The camera seems to be better already. I would certainly recommend this camera.  My ex husband is a pro and I have had the opportunity to look through the many expensive lenses that he used.  It seems to me that this camera can almost duplicate the effects of these lenses for an amateur without all the fuss.

Reviews.Title: Okay
Reviews.Author: Fred R. Benford
Reviews.Content: The camera is to bulky for me.  Worked great for the price but it did break down after a year or so and I replaced it with a pocket Nikon which was a much better unit and easier to use.

Reviews.Title: Great litle camera
Reviews.Author: Dennis E Lee
Reviews.Content: I really like this product. Not many things to say about it. I'm sure there are much better, sharper cameras out there but this is a nice little first "real " camera" beyond our usual point and shoot purchases. GE is not listed on the Consumer reports but i found I like this one any ways.

Reviews.Title: its ok
Reviews.Author: Coco
Reviews.Content: This camera is nice but I could not see through the view hold as though it was blocked on one end, don't quiet understand that though.  The flash works good.  but the pictures are not very clear from far.  Strange as my smaller camera takes better pics.

Reviews.Title: Great camera
Reviews.Author: Chelle
Reviews.Content: Amateur photographer, not a professional. Really easy to use camera has several automatic settings as well as manual. It also records. Pictures look nice. No complaints.

Reviews.Title: Save your money
Reviews.Author: Thomas A. Renick "OGC5"
Reviews.Content: This Camera has 16 Pixel resolution vs.7.1 of my old small Cannon. The Cannon takes a sharper image and is much easier to just put into a pocket.

Reviews.Title: Modest camera, modest features, modest price.
Reviews.Author: Michelle Fonda
Reviews.Content: Bought this camera as my first quality digital camera and I have to say it works very nicely. It serves my purposes of taking nice pictures with minimal effort, but allows me the opportunity to dabble into some more complicated photography. It's pretty easy to use, but I haven't delved into the more complicated functions very seriously yet.It fits well in the hand and takes quality pictures without feeling like you're lugging around some huge thing, like some other DSLR cameras can.Serves my purposes perfectly, and so I'm very happy with this camera.My one complaint is that the lens cap is crap. It doesn't stay on at all, as it just snaps/pops on, and so comes off very easily. Invest in a new one.

Reviews.Title: Good photos
Reviews.Author: Tuckamore "Tuck"
Reviews.Content: GE offers a good camera. In my opinion it can't compare to a Nikon or Cannon but you get what you pay for! The photos are chrisp and clear as long as you don't try to crop to any degree. The photos lose their clarity when cropped or the zoom is fully extended. I used it as a second camera for a few months than gave it to my senior Uncle, he loves it. I tend to shoot a lot of photos at a time, usually well over a hundred. The battery life wasn't as long as I like..... meaning usually after two sessions I'd have to replace the batteries. I take photos several times a week so replacing batteries irritates me! My Uncle is more of a novice photographer and he has absolutely no complaints about this camera, none. He uses it about twice a month. In summary and of course in my opinion, your level of satisfaction will depend on how you are going this camera, what you expect it to do and your level of photography experience!  In my Uncle's case it's perfect for him!

Reviews.Title: Not worth it
Reviews.Author: guy seide
Reviews.Content: doesnt respond to most memory cards , and after such a short time of having it ...I regret it all together . I never use it anymore , because I never know when it wont respond to my memory card.

Reviews.Title: Not that great
Reviews.Author: driller409
Reviews.Content: I have this camera if you use indoors with a zoom on it you cant get a clear pic..Outside works great.  I tried everything to get a clear pic of our grand kids in cheerleading .Got rid of it and bought a Nikon  that cost me $ 124.00 with a 16x zoom  and it kicks a==Cheep camera but looks good that's about it

Reviews.Title: pleasantly surprised
Reviews.Author: Joe Kroninger
Reviews.Content: Pleasantly surprised bought the camera to go to Yosemite  It took great pictures in all different kinds of Light.  It is very easy to use.  View finder was helpful to make sure we didn't miss the shot.  Can't wait to take it on our next vacation.

Reviews.Title: Great Starter Camera
Reviews.Author: lucynix
Reviews.Content: A great starter camera, super clear pics thanks to the 16 mp, great to bring subjects up closer. Fairly easy to use. Would recommend it. Great to take panorama shots!!!

Reviews.Title: Use your Cell camera instead.
Reviews.Author: Anna Grabill "book woman"
Reviews.Content: Garbage.  Hasn't work right since 'day one', and has finally died after eating multiple batteries.  NOT worth whatever you'll pay for it.  Too complicated for the 'average' user.  Finally died today even WITH new batteries.  Total and complete waste of money.

Reviews.Title: I have seen better cameras compared to this one!!
Reviews.Author: Stormy1
Reviews.Content: I recently purchased this GE X500 digital camera to replace the GE X5 digital camera I got several years ago. That X5 digital camera worked very well for 3 or 4 years and not a problem til I dropped it by mistake at a mud run. So, I got this X500 to replace it and it was on sale, looked identical to the X5 and had decent reviews on it. Yes, this newer upgraded digital camera is identical to the X5, takes decent photos and videos like the X5 and overall easy to use like the X5, but that's where the similarities ends. The X500 is basically no good and it's so slow to take pictures [shutter lag], produces a "THM" file with every picture I have to delete every single time I go thru my SD card in that camera. This camera is easy to use, takes a decent photo and video and is identical in looks to my old GE X5 digital camera....but this newer X500 simply does not live up to my expectations. It is horribly slow to take a photo and it does not matter if the batteries are fresh or not. Batteries are 4 "AA" batteries, a nice thing. It's a decently-made camera and feels tough, but I already got a compact digital camera to replace this one. 2 of 5 stars for this camera.

Reviews.Title: Cheap, breaks easily
Reviews.Author: Wendy
Reviews.Content: Broke or I guess the better description would be "stopped working well" not almost immediately after the return period ended. Very disappointed with this purchase

Reviews.Title: Love this camera
Reviews.Author: TyBee
Reviews.Content: Easy to use, and to understand the different settings.  Small enough I can take anywhere and easy takes good quality pictures

Reviews.Title: great product
Reviews.Author: Srinivas Jonnalagadda
Reviews.Content: was a gift to my wife's sisters family. They love it. takes great photos and works well in anyone's hands.

Reviews.Title: Power pro LCD screen does not work
Reviews.Author: Anthony L.
Reviews.Content: After purchasing the GE camera I brought it with me overseas to take pictures while working on assignment for the next few months. When I first took my camera to use it I was surprised and disappointed to find that the LCD screen was not working. It does not show the picture you are going to take, and you can only see it on view finder. I have to return it but need to know how I can contact the supplier Electronic Deals since they provided an 800 number that I can not reach them and they did not supply an e mail contact with the camera.

Reviews.Title: Good Camera
Reviews.Author: SJJ
Reviews.Content: The pictures are fantastic but there I'm having problems getting objects in focus and on the screen when I zoom in on them. But, when I do get them in focus, the pictures look amazing!!!

Reviews.Title: Not bad!!
Reviews.Author: andrea davenport
Reviews.Content: Im a beginner photographer and I think that this is a great buy for a beginner.  Im excited to try it for the first time on this weekend!1

Reviews.Title: An excellent camera for the novice.
Reviews.Author: Ralph E. Kelley "Novawatcher"
Reviews.Content: The Camera is a very good one. I got excellant photo's right out the gate. If I was able to in this review then I would post a couple.  ;->You do need to read the users booklet and play with it until you understand all the features.General Features: Pan-Capture Panorama, Face Detection, Auto Scene Detection, Optical Image Stabilization, Blink Detection, In-Camera Red-Eye Removal, Smile Detection, High Dynamic RangeSpecifications: Megapixels: 14.1 megapixels, Recording Media: Internal Memory: 18MB, SD/SDHC Card (up to 16G support), Optical Zoom: 15X, AF Method: Single AF, Multi-AF (TTL 9-point), Face-Detection+Face AE, AF Assist Light (On/Off), Digital Zoom: 5.7X, Output Jacks: USB2.0/AV-OUT (Integrated Proprietary Connector), LCD Size: 2.7 inch TFT color, LCD (230,400 pixels) ISO Sensitivity: Auto, ISO 80/100/200/400/800/1600/3200, Shooting Modes: Auto, Manual, ASCN, Movie, Scene (Sport, Children, Indoor, Leaf, Snow, Sunset, Fireworks, Glass, Museum, Landscape, Night Landscape, Night Portrait), Portrait, Panorama.Other Features: PictBridge, ExifPrint Support, Multi-language Support, High Dynamic Range, File Format, Power - 4 x AA Alkaline Battery or 4AA NiMH Battery, Weight - 13.4 oz. (Approx. 382g) (Body only), Dimensions - 4.02 inch Width x 2.87 inch Height x 2.68 inch Depth, Audio: G.711 [monaural], Audio: WAVE [monaural] (Max 60 seconds).Focusing Range : Normal- (Wide) 60cm ~8 (Tele) 200cm ~8, Macro- (Wide) 5cm ~8 (Tele) 200cm ~8, Focal Length: 4.9mm (Wide) ? 73.5mm (Tele), 35mm Equivalent: 27mm (Wide) - 405mm (Tele), F Number-  f/3.0 (Wide) - f/5.2 (Tele), Still Movie: Exif2.2 (JPEG) QuickTime Motion JPEG.

Reviews.Title: Professional pictures!
Reviews.Author: Mo
Reviews.Content: I purchased this camera for my son last year for Christmas.  He wanted something he could take with him on his railroad inspection job.  He is very happy with it.  It takes really nice pictures of landscape, animals and people.  He took some pictures of my granddaughter sitting in a field that looks absolutely professional.  I was a little unsure whether to buy it or not since it wasn't the typical camera name brands.  However, I am glad I did the quality of the camera and the pictures are awesome!  Great camera at a reasonable price.

Reviews.Title: new camera
Reviews.Author: JuJu
Reviews.Content: Needed a new camera and glad I bought this one...just need to figure out all the bells and whistles!! Wanted a good camera without the BIG price...this was it!!

Reviews.Title: Good camera for the price
Reviews.Author: I. Gerasimenko
Reviews.Content: The quality of the photos is high and good for the price regular point and shoot cameras usually go at.

Reviews.Title: Amazing camera
Reviews.Author: Jitender Semwal
Reviews.Content: AmaIng look amaIng pixtures awesome zoom i dont think so you will find these qualities in any other camera in that range.

Reviews.Title: It's okay
Reviews.Author: PianoTeacher "Jer"
Reviews.Content: Some doohickey in the camera broke about 6 months after owning it.  You can still use it, but it doesn't work at 100 percent and who wants to go get it fixed when it wasn't that expensive. Camera was very plasticy.

Reviews.Title: Love it!
Reviews.Author: Kelly
Reviews.Content: This camera is perfect for new people like me to camera's. It's got all the features I could ask for. Recommended for anyone

Reviews.Title: good camera but not enough for a photography class
Reviews.Author: Francis B. Hicks
Reviews.Content: great for all around photography but lacks the sophistication for certain shots required in photography class. ok for the novice.

Reviews.Title: x500
Reviews.Author: chris
Reviews.Content: I've owned the x500 for 1 year now I have enjoyed owning the x500 quite a bit. The manual controls make it feel right at home with the GE x500. It gives very sharp images and beautifully detailed pictures up to ISO 800. I will tell you that the video mode does leave much to be desired. but all in all this camera, for the price, has an amazing lens and I truly love this little camera. The reason I gave this camera 4 out of 5 stars is as it does not age very well. It does work very well over all but the auto focus is going but this is no reason not to buy this product. One year ago this camera was $120 and I see this as a very good investment.

Reviews.Title: to lazy to learn this camera.
Reviews.Author: S.Cools
Reviews.Content: This is not a solid review based on other reviews i got this camera. Its a good camera the display is not that great. But i was told the pic looks really good after you plug the camera to the computer or you print them. (since I am notorious for  keeping  pics on my camera for ever without doing anything to them) I have done neither. I used the camera a  for a week while on vacation  and have not used it since it did the job,but i will have to one day really learn the in and outs of what seems like it can be a really good camera.

Reviews.Title: Love this camera
Reviews.Author: QStick
Reviews.Content: I really love this camera. I have taken some quality photos with this. I know this is just a starter camera, but you can take some amazing photos with it. This is a new hobby for me and this camera has me wanting to take the next step in photography.

Reviews.Title: Great price great product
Reviews.Author: Cockadoodledoo
Reviews.Content: I got this on amazon for 100 $ and its worth every pennie, because it's really cheap.  For my birthday, I got a zink PoGo portable printer and it works great with this camera. I've had this camera for 6 months and have shot over 1500 pictures with it. Not to fast but fast enough.

Reviews.Title: I hate this camera I'm lucky if it captures anything
Reviews.Author: 1cscheid "rtscas"
Reviews.Content: I bought this camera for the use of doing Painting Youtube tutorials, figured thequality would be better.I've tried several SD cards, which I have no problem with my Fuji camera, but withthis camera I always get memory card full when it's empty and formated, or only has 10minutes worth of recording. I use 16 to 32GB cards. Half the time when I'm done recordinga 10 minute video, it couldn't encrypt it, so I have to re-shoot my videos, orre-take pictures that don't come out.Thank God I got it at HSN for $129. I hate this camera, I'm going back to a Canon.

Reviews.Title: Learning Curve
Reviews.Author: Gwyd
Reviews.Content: The "Camera" setting makes it easy to point & shoot, although you need to activate the anti-shake.There are a LOT of settings including movie mode. Read the manual & play with it! See what makes perfect pictures before you need that one of a kind, one time only shot & blow it.Again, normal camera mode will do just fine, but there are so many wonderful automatic settings & options you will find this camera will do everything! {even fireworks shots}I found this to be the best value in it's price range with more options than most & 16MP.

Reviews.Title: its all about light
Reviews.Author: alex schlough
Reviews.Content: The setup is nice and shoots great in the day light, but not good indoors unless you have plenty of light.

Reviews.Title: Great beginning camera
Reviews.Author: Theresa
Reviews.Content: I bought this camera right before a trip overseas. It was a great idea! This camera is great for beginners, is durable, and works well. The only problems are that it does not use a rechargeable battery and sometimes it would momentarily get fuzzy. It also uses normal batteries up really quickly, so pack a lot if you are going on a trip! Overall a good buy for beginners or people who want to just document experiences.

Reviews.Title: LOVE. LOVE. LOVE
Reviews.Author: Victoria Richardson
Reviews.Content: I absolutely LOVE this camera. It's my first "professional" camera and I'm in love with it. I cant wait to use it for filming for my documentary series. Best product I've purchased from Amazon.

Reviews.Title: amazing
Reviews.Author: Rice family
Reviews.Content: I love how wonderful this camera is. It takes amazing pictures and is so simple to use. This is by far the best camera I have ever owned. The price was amazing.

Reviews.Title: I love it!!
Reviews.Author: Meridith Preston
Reviews.Content: I bought this camera for my daughter and it is fabulous.  its easy to use takes really nice photos, its just a great little camera.

Reviews.Title: Sturdy, versatile, very good photos, many features, very good value
Reviews.Author: Ira P. Weiss "Ira"
Reviews.Content: Significantly better quality than I expected given the price and the complaints in some reviews.  Takes great photos under various light conditions. Pretty much gave up on it after it was hit head-on by a large wave that swamped the boat I was piloting.  It stopped working and the screen gave a lens obstruction error message. But.after drying out for 2 days, it resumed working perfectly. Took night scene of moon over St Lawrence river, indoor photos, bright sunlight photos and indoor photos.  Some lens glare evident  in moon at night photos, but overall better results than I expected. I suspect those people who complained about blur in low light must have used long exposure without a tripod. That will produce a blurred photo even with most expensive camera.  Several people complained about photos coming out white, with no picture.  I think they must have used manual  mode and not set a reasonable exposure time and lens aperture. If you take a photo in sunlight with a 1 second shutter speed and f3.0 aperture it will come out blank white. One has to know how to use any camera. The automatic setting and the scene settings work quite well for a variety of conditions for those who don't  want to deal with "film speed", lens apertures and shutter speeds.  For those who do wish to adjust photo properties themselves, the shutter priority, aperture priority and full manual settings are available.  Movie mode is handy for simple moderate resolution videos, and the ability to use zoom in movie mode is a bonus.

Reviews.Title: Blurry pictures
Reviews.Author: K. Bramwell "parent"
Reviews.Content: This is the worst camera I've had.  At least 50% of the pictures are blurry, even when I switch it to sports mode.  It does badly indoors and at night.  The only good pictures I get are outside in good light (as long as no one is moving).  It also takes a long time to take a picture after you power it on.  Often, it takes up to 30 seconds - 1 minute to take a picture, which is a pain if you have people waiting for their picture to be taken.  I would not recommend this camera at all.

Reviews.Title: Do No Buy
Reviews.Author: Richard Brock
Reviews.Content: I bought this camera not even a year ago and within the first month It started messing up. First the camera wouldnt stay on. Then the lens would extend all the way on its own then shut off and finally it shut down all together and will not turn on. Save your money and buy an expensive, decent camera and not this. I also called GE and the person on the line told me to send it back to amazon even though it is supposed to come with a 1 year warranty through GE.

Reviews.Title: Difficult to use
Reviews.Author: NLSC
Reviews.Content: I have used a lot of different cameras over the years and think this is by far the hardest to use. The settings are not intuitive and I get as many blurry pictures as clear ones.  I cannot take a decent motion picture no matter what settings I try.I also don't like the video on the camera.  The sound is not good and you cannot quickly transition from pictures to video.If I had to do it over I would NOT buy this camera.

Reviews.Title: GE Power Pro X500-BK 16 MP with 15 x Optical Zoom Digital Camera, Black
Reviews.Author: Brian Birmingham
Reviews.Content: GE Power Pro X500-BK 16 MP with 15 x Optical Zoom Digital Camera, Black is a great camera for the person used to an SLR and a viewfinder eyepiece rather than just a screen very good deal

Reviews.Title: Great camera
Reviews.Author: Debbie
Reviews.Content: This camera takes great pictures.  We use it quite a bit.  There are a lot of different settings and features, too many to list and have not tried very many of them, but for the most part, good basic camera for every day pictures at a great price.

Reviews.Title: AMAZON has the best return policy on the internet! No questions and gave me back my money !
Reviews.Author: Terence Pratt
Reviews.Content: The camera had a mechanical defect and I was never able to use it, it would not power up after batteries were inserted. I have read the reviews and I am going to repurchase the camera, the features versus the price and from advice from my son, a professional photographer who has used it has convinced me that this was a fluke. I have given it two stars only because the product I received did not work.

Reviews.Title: GE CAMERA
Reviews.Author: D.R.Foster
Reviews.Content: THIS IS A VERY EASY CAMERA TO USE. I BOUGHT IT TO TAKE PICTURES AT MY FAMILY REUNION AND RELATIVES COULD NOT BELIEVE THE QUALITY OF THE PICTUES IT TOOK.  IF YOU ARE LOOKING FOR AN INEXPENSIVE AND EASY CAMERMA TO BUY THAN I WOULD RECOMMEND THIS ONE.

Reviews.Title: Too Complicated To Use
Reviews.Author: Jarrod Earnheart "jarrod01"
Reviews.Content: Wife loves it, it's her camera anyways.  But I just don't see why it takes so many buttons & combinations of keystrokes just to take a picture.  I specifically wasn't fond of transferring the pictures to the pc, I simply remove the SD card because mine didn't come with any software (i'm used to the Kodak easyshare software with automatic transfer) and during the process of xfer almost everything on the card has a duplicate, dunno what purpose it's for but it's there, messy to clean up.

Reviews.Title: It's a good camera, but...
Reviews.Author: Emily
Reviews.Content: This is a good camera, but, unfortunately, some of the settings don't work. I bought a refurbished camera, so I'm sure that's why. I still am slightly disappointed that they don't all work. I tried taking a picture on a few different settings, while the auto setting works, many others do not. I wold try to take a picture, and the picture would just show up white. As long as you use a different setting, it is fine though.

Reviews.Title: A wonderful point&shoot; bridge camera for the best price!
Reviews.Author: Arinka
Reviews.Content: I always wanted a professional camera - along with the skill of a pro photographer, which I'm currently lacking. So when i finally decided to buy a camera I've set my mind on a non-pro one, a little more functional than a usual digital camera but nothing fancy like Nikon/Canon. I stumbled upon GE Power Pro X500 by chance and got carried away. This little buddy had it all for only a hundred bucks that I paid for it! ($109 to be precise). 15x optical zoom, image stabilization, advanced manual settings for HQ shooting, numerous presets for any environment out there + cool look and a couple nice features like pop-up flash and a view-finder! (albeit an electronic one). It's not heavy, not huge, you can easily take pictures with one hand holding your ice-cream in the other, and it's a sheer pleasure to carry this beauty around. It turns on really quickly (takes about 1.5-2 sec), shutter speed is also good i believe (considering that i shoot on standard presets, auto mode). The only downside is the quality of the digital screen (3 out of 5, not so many colors, low res) but thankfully it doesn't affect the picture quality :) An the other annoying thing is the lens cap - it doesn't fit tightly, keeps falling off when you shake the camera too much.All in all, th best choice for an amateur in photography who doesn't want to bother with a professional camera but may want to tweak a thing or two here and there just to add an edge to his daily shooting.

Reviews.Title: Get what you pay for..
Reviews.Author: Lookitsashhole
Reviews.Content: The camera is exactly what you pay for. The panorama feature is pretty cool. I'm not sure if I got a defective product, or if it just drains batteries like crazy, but I got exhausted battery warnings after less than 20 photos. I'd open the case and adjust the batteries, turn it on, and it would say full battery. Not sure. I'm going to buy a couple sets of rechargeable batteries. The last thing I need is to take a picture and camera won't turn on. We'll see! In the mean time, saving up for a dslr..

Reviews.Title: GE power pro X500-bk 16 mp
Reviews.Author: louis
Reviews.Content: the camera very nice but i would of liked a manual with it,the camera has lots of different settings not sure how to adjust thanks louis

Reviews.Title: had better expectatives.
Reviews.Author: Bertha Gallegos
Reviews.Content: i thought this camera would shoot faster, but it doesn't. focus is also kinda hard to get used to. but over all it's a good cam for the price, and quality pictures.

Reviews.Title: Great camera for the price!
Reviews.Author: John M. Radziewski
Reviews.Content: Pros-A lot of camera for the price. A lot of special effects to utilize.Cons- Sophisticated to use. A little heavy with 4 batteries in it.

Reviews.Title: great christmas gift
Reviews.Author: john harding
Reviews.Content: I think my daughter really liked her christmas gift.  As far as I know it works great.  I haven't heard of any complaints from her so It must have been four stars.

Reviews.Title: what a steal
Reviews.Author: Tamara N.
Reviews.Content: I'm still learning how to use this, but was used at a wedding I went to and the picture are priceless

Reviews.Title: Very nice!
Reviews.Author: Jessa Bri
Reviews.Content: I do love my camera! It takes beautiful pictures. But I've noticed that it "eats" batteries; I have to change them quite often. Other than that, this camera is a win-win!

Reviews.Title: Amazing camera!!
Reviews.Author: Krystal
Reviews.Content: This camera is amazing!! It takes great photos. Sometimes I feel a little too good. lol. It is worth the price if you want something better then the other smaller cameras. This one has so many settings you can choose. We always set the settings ourselves but you can let the camera do it automatically. Anyways, its a great camera so if you want and awesome camera get this one. You will not be disappointed!

Reviews.Title: Second one we've purchased.
Reviews.Author: taylor
Reviews.Content: I purchase this camera for both of our kids... my girl love it because she can make videos and take photos, she love the panoramic feature and I do to... is a great little camera.

Reviews.Title: Can't beat this camera for the price
Reviews.Author: David M.
Reviews.Content: I have taken various types of photos with auto settings and manual setting changes. In my opinion this camera cannot be beat at this price. We have a Fujifilm Finepix SRL that was 3 times the cost and I would put them on the same performance level. I know GE is not known for cameras, but this one should put them on the map.

Reviews.Title: Great camera for the money
Reviews.Author: Denise Howard
Reviews.Content: I don't even claim to be a photographer, but for my use personal pictures such as birthdays and holidays this is a great piece of equipment.

Reviews.Title: GE digital camera
Reviews.Author: JAH
Reviews.Content: The pictures from the camera are really good, I just need to get used to the size (which is bigger than I'm used to) and take the time to learn how to take advantage of the many additional selections offered.

Reviews.Title: great product
Reviews.Author: paul
Reviews.Content: for the money this is a great little camera and it meets all my requirements.i would by another if i needed to.

Reviews.Title: lousy close up pictures
Reviews.Author: Shirley
Reviews.Content: I really can't say much bad about this camera. It is as described. Light weight, easy to handle and takes great pictures EXCEPT....close-ups. I mean really close up. I'm a little disappointed in my close-up pictures. I have a small Samsung that has a 5X zoom and I can use it for really close close-ups but I was hoping I wouldn't have to carry two cameras. All other pictures are wonderful with this camera. I love the view finder and that is one of the main reasons I bought it. I have 15X zoom Nikon that works great but it doesn't have a view finder and I find it is necessary in the bright sun. I bought this camera because it appeared to have everything my Nikon had with the addition of the view finder. It takes pictures just as good as my Nikon and I paid 1/3 of what I paid for my Nikon.I ended up returning the camera for a full refund. I could not deal with the bad close up pictures. It really did take BAD close-ups.

Reviews.Title: Just what I wanted
Reviews.Author: M. Falk
Reviews.Content: I was not sure about this camera I didn't even know GE made cameras.  I read some of the reviews and decided to give it a try.  I am so glad I did.  I love it.  It is easy to use, has a great zoom and the pictures are amazing.  It arrived just before I had to take my grandsons to their first soccer game so I didn't even have time to read the manual or anything.  I just put in the batteries and my SD card and left.  It was so easy to figure out how to use.  Also I have arthritis and the smaller cameras were hard for me to hold onto.  This one with it's molded hand grip was a joy to use.  As stated in another review the lens cover doesn't stay on very well but I took some rubber cement on a q-tip and rubbed it around the inside of the cover and let it dry completely and now it works just fine.  I also found out that Duracel copper top batteries won't work in it.  When the batteries that came with it died I put in the Duracel and it wouldn't turn on.  I tried the Energizer batteries and it turned on.  So I don't know what was up with that but I have not had any problems with the Energizer batteries.

Reviews.Title: 5 stars
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: I love this camera and would recommend it to others.  I'm just starting out and good started camera for photography.

Reviews.Title: camera works great
Reviews.Author: Darrell Faulkner
Reviews.Content: it was easy to setup and takes great pictures. I have different camera and the pictures are not as clear and sharp as they are with the GE Power prothanks

Reviews.Title: I Love It
Reviews.Author: jng1985
Reviews.Content: I ordered this camera because I wanted tk take better photos of my children then a point and shoot. You can't beat the price.  I also enjoy taking photos of nature and that is now my favorite part of thos camera. This camera is high quality,  very easy to store and handle,  and light.  I still have no idea how to use all the functions but I am completely thrilled with my choice on getting this camera. My only issue would be it takes a moment to shoot and with young children I miss some good shots. I rate it 5 star and for the price and the quality it earns 5 stars

Reviews.Title: Potential if worked
Reviews.Author: Roman
Reviews.Content: I purchased this camera just to have an extra camera to shoot when I do photoshoots. The quality of the camera wasn't so bad but didn't work out the box. The battery kept dying and the camera would shut off. I changed batteries same thing again..so I sent It back for refund and will just be purchasing the Fujifilm hs30exr instead. I'd rather spend a little more for better quality.

Reviews.Title: great camera. great price
Reviews.Author: trudy
Reviews.Content: Takes good pictures. Has a nice zoom. Old camera broke day before vacation, I ordered this the day before i left and had it shipped to my niece the next day in Myrtle beach, our destination, It arrived early that day and i used it the entire trip. Bought a tripod and took pictures including myself. Worked great. nice features. my daughter wants one now for christmas.

Reviews.Title: Takes Awesome Pictures for one heck of a price!
Reviews.Author: Richard Lewis
Reviews.Content: Pros: Only takes Double A batteriesTakes fantastic picturesCons: Only 1 con really... The LCD display on the camera isn't that high quality, makes you think the pictures are bad when you first take them, only other thing I didn't like about it (wasn't a CON really) was the EVF is a display SCREEN, not sure if most cameras are doing that now but it threw me off that I had to switch from EVF to LCD

Reviews.Title: Great Camera
Reviews.Author: Mark Hinson
Reviews.Content: This is a great camera. The picture quality is fantastic and the price of the camera is very reasonable !  Love it!

Reviews.Title: Price
Reviews.Author: Craig Burns
Reviews.Content: You can't beat it for the price. It takes quality pictures. I would recommend it to a friend. In addition, I bought a 16 GB memory card to go with it.

Reviews.Title: Everything I expected!
Reviews.Author: Tad McDole
Reviews.Content: Awsome value for the money! Battery life was less than I hoped for though, but this was my only issue.

Reviews.Title: A good buy!
Reviews.Author: Richard Sentieri
Reviews.Content: It's compact, sporty-looking, and easy to use.  A good choice.  I'm sure I will use it for a long time.

Reviews.Title: Solidly built camera
Reviews.Author: Darren M. Allen
Reviews.Content: I am in a developing nation in the Pacific teaching college and wanted a camera that (#1)  took standard AA batteries (available everywhere around the world AND I can use over the counter rechargeables) and (#2) was sturdy.  For the price, I am very happy with this camera.  Make no mistake, it is heavy (has a metal body, NOT plastic) and requires 4 AA's (not a hardship because I can recharge them).  I guess you might find one lighter that uses AA's or AAA's, but this works for me.  The one caveat I guess is that though it comes with a USB cable... I don't know why.  It didn't come with software (just a manual on CD) and when I connected it to my computer, it was not detected as a USB drive.  I bought a 16GB SD Card with it and my laptop has an SD card slot, so I can download my pictures and videos... but if you don't have an SD card slot, I don't know what you would do.  Oh... one more thing.. though the camera takes great pictures and videos, the mike is on the side and does NOT record sound as well as other cameras I have used.  If sound is important for your purposes, I don't think I would recommend this camera.

Reviews.Title: This camera was worth it
Reviews.Author: Geirvaldr
Reviews.Content: First of all, if you are looking for a full-fledged SLR this camera is not for you. You most likely will never find one for the price of this camera. That being said- for the price this camera is a good camera. It is also a good bridge to an SLR type. Think of it as SLR training wheels. There are several features of this camera that I liked and very few that I didn't.The pros: there are a lot of things this camera is capable of and it is packed with options and functionality. There are MANY different modes this camera can shoot in. It also has a view finder and function. For those of you who like to visually line up the photo this is a nice bonus.  Another thing that I liked was the HDR option although it is good, it is not great, The 16mp is standard for most newer cameras and there is nothing too special about it- it does take pictures that look 16mp. The 15x zoom is nice even though half of it is digital. The camera feels good in the hands and has some heft to it. (Some might not like this, but I feel sentimental about the older cameras, this camera is very reminiscent of those).  Another thing that some people might not like but does not bother me is that the camera uses 4 AA batteries. If you are the kind of person that prefers lithium Ion this camera is not for you.  I like being able to pick up batteries where ever I am at any gas station.The Cons: The cameras stabilization could be better. Although it works it could use some improvement.  The lens cap could have been made better, it does not to stay on as well as it should.  The Gui on the camera could use some work, although there is a whole lot of options on this camera some of them are hard to find.  The images are clear in doors but they could be slightly better. (images outdoors seem to turn out very nice)The bottom line: For the price paid, this camera was worth it. It is a good camera, and a great stepping stone to a SLR camera. For about $109.00 there are few cameras that do better. I will give a couple of heads ups: It is slightly larger and will require a larger carrying case. The upper limit on the card size is 16 gb (so don’t by a 32 gb for this camera).  DO NOT GET ONE OF THESE FROM WALMART. They do carry this camera, but if you are not paying attention you will get the "DIET" version of this camera for about 128.00$, it will be a 14 mp camera with half the options and half the durability. In the end I would say I like this camera just as much as the cannon point and click I have and the Samsung I have (both cost a lot more and do not have the quality of picture)

Reviews.Title: great for the price
Reviews.Author: Jay and Rachel Sims
Reviews.Content: Good camera, nice zoom with good quality, seems to be a little fragile, the screen on one of ours went white on us, but got it exchanged and the new one is fine.  It has a good weight and feel, pretty small too. it's odd the the eyepiece is connected to another lcd screen instead of the actual lens but this camera performs well and makes you look like you know what you are doing haha, and has nice options for your custom picture. Glad I bought it.

Reviews.Title: Decent Camera
Reviews.Author: Chuckdrinksbeer
Reviews.Content: Little smaller than I expected, and takes good pictures & videos. Looks good in white, replacing the batteries is a pain and adds some weight to this thing. I hate the software that came with this, but I use adobe so I might be biased. Worth the price if you plan on recording memories and want good shots. Would suggest this to novice photographers and someone who wants a decent camera for short money.

Reviews.Title: Lens Cap
Reviews.Author: D. Cochren "EqVet"
Reviews.Content: The camera is great quality, but a CARDBOARD LENS CAP????????????????????  Give me a break.  Keeps it very hard to protect the lens, as the "cap" is worthless.

Reviews.Title: great camera
Reviews.Author: kevin
Reviews.Content: Out the box easy to use,works well. Video is good.....the camera for the money can't be beat. It feels good in your hands great little camera.

Reviews.Title: Absolutely Love It
Reviews.Author: Cruenta
Reviews.Content: This camera was everything i hoped for. It came on time it was packaged well, the camera itself works great I have had this camera less than 2 full days and have already taken over 300+ pictures everything from Family to landscape, I would highly recommend this camera for people.

Reviews.Title: love this camera
Reviews.Author: sheila farris
Reviews.Content: I've always wanted a camera like this but could not afford it so when i saw this one for 99 dollars i could not pass it up!So thank you so much I LOVE IT

Reviews.Title: Adoro mi Camara GE
Reviews.Author: Luis Lopez Mesa
Reviews.Content: Es un excelente producto, puedo recomendarsela a cualquiera, buena nitidez, buen contraste en las fotos, y facil de manejar y cargar.Solo espero recuperar la pistola que pedí.-

Reviews.Title: i love it
Reviews.Author: Tina Edwards
Reviews.Content: i give is a 5 it is very easy to use and takes very good pics any one can use it

Reviews.Title: AWESOME
Reviews.Author: denise switzer
Reviews.Content: This camera is amazing, it does so much, as in red eye, focus, and many other features. The price was perfect for my budget, the photos itself comes out so clear...I plan on ordering another one for a gift..thank you

Reviews.Title: Very good
Reviews.Author: Ledif Alberto Morales del Castillo
Reviews.Content: Excellent, I am very happy with these purchases...!  Thanks to all great service! continue so... isn't there any gift?  XD

Reviews.Title: A Value, esp. with a VIEWFINDER, but plagued with DEFECTS
Reviews.Author: CA Yooper Guy "t_lon"
Reviews.Content: Updated Mar '14, after three years of use:  Highly ANNOYING DEFECT in this camera >the power management system sucks.  If it sits more than a couple of weeks, the batteries are "dead" despite being new alkaline type.  After throwing out a couple dozen "dead" batteries, it occurred to me that this just couldn't be happening.  So, I put a meter on the next set.  Turns out they were at least 90% of new.  They lasted just as long as new ones when put in other stuff [flashlights, etc]. Next time they went 'dead' I just rotated them - and - magically, the camera came to life immediately and worked perfectly.  RIDICULOUS !!!  No excuse for such performance.  A real pain in the bum.  Wouldn't have bought the thing with this defect.FURTHER, the 'sleep' function is not adjustable, so the thing is shutting itself down between shots and making you wait for the next one.  And, the night metering isn't the best - you have to 'fool' the system to get some shots or the flash wipes them out. But, then, it is a cheap deal.= = = =  Original Review  = = = = = = =My only other camera is the original Minolta auto which takes great film pics, except for low-light situations.  I looked around a LOT for a starter-level digital __that had a VIEWFINDER__, which is really necessary for outdoor shooting where you can't see the screen and I find quite a bit easier and faster to frame shots with.  The digital viewfinder is not as good a TTL one, but it makes the camera so much easier to work with that I'm surprised they don't charge a premium for the feature.  I find it very easy to use and especially like the broad zoom range.  Works exceptionally well in low light.  Could have just a slightly larger grip area for big hands, but it's still adaptable.  Would not hesitate to buy it again.Very pleased.

Reviews.Title: A LOT OF CAMERA
Reviews.Author: Earl R. Young
Reviews.Content: The pictures have been great.  The camera is sturdy.  It's very easy to use, yet it has every device that I will ever need.

Reviews.Title: GE X500  White
Reviews.Author: Sally Heller
Reviews.Content: i needed a better camera.  This one does all that I need.  Cost was very much the actual reason to buy.  Paying more for an everyday camera wouldn't make sense.

Reviews.Title: Nice camera for the price
Reviews.Author: thomas wilson
Reviews.Content: For the price of this camera, it is excellent. It tries VERY hard to be a DSLR but falls just short. Play with the settings a little to get the look you want and this camera can be great.

Reviews.Title: Awesome
Reviews.Author: allen diamond
Reviews.Content: Really great camera, love the 16 mp. Enjoy the zoom, just wish the digital zoom would clean up before you took the picture so you know what it is that you are getting.

Reviews.Title: Good camera for the price!
Reviews.Author: Angela
Reviews.Content: I haven't had the camera long and haven't gotten into all the features, but so far I like it.  I've boughten other cameras around this price and I like the zoom feature on this one the best.  I read others reviews and I think the lens cover stays on fine, no it doesn't snap on but it slides on secure enough to stay.

Reviews.Title: great!
Reviews.Author: Kirah
Reviews.Content: best camera ive ever had its amazing has awesome settings great mega pixels has a lot of different settings i love it so much its my new best friend!

Reviews.Title: You get what you pay for...
Reviews.Author: BoBo
Reviews.Content: The camera is low priced and is pretty comparable to a high cell phone camera. You get what you pay for...Overall not a bad purchase...

Reviews.Title: Great little camera
Reviews.Author: Christina Witkowski
Reviews.Content: I was really skeptical about a camera this cheap but I was pleasantly surprised at how great it is. It has a lot of fun little features that make it a good bridge camera. Currently the panorama option is my favorite, but as spring rolls around, I'm sure that will change. Picture quality is very good-not quite DSLR quality BUT it isn't a DSLR so it's not to be expected. A few cons (minor inconveniences more than anything) It kills batteries. I have taken to bringing a second set of batteries with me anytime I am going to take more than ten or fifteen pictures-it is to be expected as it takes a lot of power to take such large pictures. The flash is puny for indoor pics, extra light is a good thing. One hint-attach your lens cap to your neck strap or you'll lose it.Overall this is a really good camera for someone who is beyond point and click but isn't quite ready to invest the money or time that a DSLR camera requires.

Reviews.Title: Terrible pictures
Reviews.Author: Clifford Carabetta "Cliff"
Reviews.Content: This is the second point and shoot camera I have had. I had a Canon but dropped and damaged. I tried the GE, unfortunately, must return. The picture quality is awful. It is difficult to handle and it would take several tries to put the flash on auto. Hopefully, I will find something in this price range of better quality.

Reviews.Title: Buy one every year
Reviews.Author: W. Parks "sparksmex"
Reviews.Content: Buy one every year because thats about how long it will last.  Just bought another set of batteries thinking that was the problem.  Nope, the camera is dead.  Bought it a little over a year ago.  Oh well it was cheap

Reviews.Title: Very good gift
Reviews.Author: Latoya Brown
Reviews.Content: I gave this as a gift and they loved it. It is still in use and takes great pictures. Now that they are used to this camera they are now ready to move on to something more advanced with a better lens. BUT this did the job very well.

Reviews.Title: Gr8
Reviews.Author: Maria Virginia Espitia
Reviews.Content: This is a great product basic camera but really good . . . . . . . . . .

Reviews.Title: Returned this
Reviews.Author: Sharon K. May "Sharon K. May"
Reviews.Content: This wasn't quite the camera I wanted so I returned it.  So here we go again I have to add more words - such a pain.

Reviews.Title: EXCELLENT CAMERA
Reviews.Author: Lauren Gibson
Reviews.Content: Amazing camera. I've paid a lot more for much less quality and performance. I am a jiggler and I tried to jiggle the camera while I was taking a photo. It was an excellent photo. NO BLURRING! This camera is extremely easy to use and I am going to tell all my friends about it. I prefer a viewfinder to take photos, especially outdoors on a sunny day where you can't tell what you are aiming at without a viewfinder. I love it!

Reviews.Title: Okay
Reviews.Author: orlandodawg
Reviews.Content: Most appealing thing about this camera was the price...we were looking for an inexpensive option that would allow some decent zoom...seems to be kind of hit and miss with it's abilities...sometimes it will auto focus well, sometimes not...even when you are basically taking the same picture you did right before...and the opening and closing of the flash is annoying...seems like they could have just placed it on the front in the open position to allow for easier operation

Reviews.Title: Amazing Camera!
Reviews.Author: Kenyon Ray
Reviews.Content: Got this camera as a gift for my mother and she loves it. The quality of GE speaks for itself!

Reviews.Title: Love my Camera
Reviews.Author: Lorine Burse
Reviews.Content: I love my camera and the pictures that it produce. What I hated was, after taking all the pictures and after installing the program on my computer to download the pictures. It took me for ever to figure out how to get the pictures to download only because the directions wasn't really clear - I went by the direction, but they didn't work. The directions didn't tell what you can do if following the directions failed - need more directions.Thanks

Reviews.Title: Excellent product
Reviews.Author: EUNICE GARZON
Reviews.Content: Arrive at time. The pictures are greats! Muy husband and I enjoyed the time and now we can take pictures, beautiful pictures!!!!

Reviews.Title: Great
Reviews.Author: Benjamin P. Willett
Reviews.Content: Camera is wonderful. No problems with delivery or product. Iwould order again from this seller, no doubt. Thanks very much.

Reviews.Title: Very nice DSLR
Reviews.Author: Ron
Reviews.Content: I bought this DSLR for my daughter as a Christmas gift. She was interested in photography so for the price and all the functions I bought this one as an entry level camera. Wanted to be sure her interest was a lasting one before I sunk money into a more expensive camera. Both her and I are very satisfied with the camera and I feel I made a good decision in purchasing this camera. I give it four stars only because it is not a top of the line DSLR but it is an awesome buy because of all the functions and capabilities of the unit. Like any camera of this type,it loves eating batteries. I would suggest that you also purchase some rechargeable batteries along with it.

Reviews.Title: Slow
Reviews.Author: Lannes
Reviews.Content: Very good zoom. Very slow. Repeat: very slow. One more time: VERY SLOW. And it drains the battery badly too!

Reviews.Title: GE X500
Reviews.Author: russie
Reviews.Content: Excellent camera with many features at a very good price.  It does eat up batteries so it is a good idea to go with rechargeables and have back-up

Reviews.Title: In Love!
Reviews.Author: Martha
Reviews.Content: I just love my Camera, i just Adore the way it looks! I still don't know how to use it very well, but the pictures ive made, are great! Im still learning a lot about it and its beautiful. Perfect size (not as big as other cams, not as small as a simple point and shoot), perfect weight. I just find difficult to find the perfect case for it...instead of that, Im totally happy. PS: GO for the white, you will fall in love!

Reviews.Title: Awesome Product!!!
Reviews.Author: M. Boyd "el libro pecho"
Reviews.Content: GE Products and Great known product that has been around for many years & many more to come.I'm glad to say I own an American camera!.....made in China!..lol!

Reviews.Title: Good for the $$$
Reviews.Author: R. Miller
Reviews.Content: As i am not a professonial, so far camera works fine. Only used a few time for personal use(birthdays/hollidays). Seems to be a nice littlie camera. No complaints so far. Will update if needed.

Reviews.Title: FANTASTIC !!!
Reviews.Author: Kathryn
Reviews.Content: I don't have such a detailed review as the others do, but I can tell you this much. This camera is absolutely amazing ! I know nothing at all about cameras other than turn it on, zoom it if needed, click and shoot but this camera is literally " me " proof! I've had it about a year now, and I couldn't be happier and I have a lot of friends with 600.00 or more cameras and they love mine. You can't beat the "feel". It feels sturdy, strong and not flimsy at all. It's easy to hold and shoot one handed and the digital display that can come on every time you power up, to let you choose what type of picture you are taking, is ingenious! I love, love, love this thing and can't recommend it enough.

Reviews.Title: Great Christmas Gift
Reviews.Author: Guardian Of Truth
Reviews.Content: I read the reviews for this camera and was kinda skeptical at first until my teenager got this as a gift for Christmas and he LOVES it!!!  Great camera for someone starting out as an amateur photog.  Thanks Amazon for the drop in price also.  Can't go wrong with this one.  Fast service too.  Takes great pics too even without the flash.

Reviews.Title: Great Camera
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer "Victor Jones"
Reviews.Content: This camera is great. The zoom abilities is better than my on Canon Rebel XS. It doesn't do too good with taking photos of stuff like twinkling lights but everything else about this camera is wonderful. I would highly recommend this camera to anyone interested in a start up camera to get more familiar with photography.

Reviews.Title: I love this camera
Reviews.Author: Terra Land
Reviews.Content: I am not a professional photog at all, but this has come in handy for so many events where I need nice pictures. I am still learning to use all of the features, but I am happy, overall, with the images that I have been able to get.

Reviews.Title: The first & the second
Reviews.Author: camerageeksquad
Reviews.Content: ok.. the first camera i got was refurbished becuase it was scoch taped closed and it had errors and it said lens obstruction re-start camera witch i did about 15 teen times so i returned it and then i got a new won for free and it work's 100%

Reviews.Title: great camera
Reviews.Author: Mo
Reviews.Content: just not user friendly. I have to read the booklet every time I need to take a  picture. quality ok

Reviews.Title: It's great when it actually focuses.
Reviews.Author: 4estGimp
Reviews.Content: I bought the camera for taking picks while working on mechanical projects.  Photos can show how items go back together when the mind does not remember.  This camera just what I was looking for EXCEPT it can't focus about 1/2 the time.  It's the most horribly frustrating camera I've owned.

Reviews.Title: My first digital camera, and I love it!
Reviews.Author: Sara Hester
Reviews.Content: I read many of the reviews on different cameras before deciding on this one, and I haven't been disappointed! The pictures are beautiful, and menu is easy to navigate. There are so many different features, but the best one is ASCN, which figures out which kind of picture you want to take (lighting, background, people are all taken into account automatically! Great for a person like me who has never owned a camera and needs to learn.The only problem I have with this camera is the delay between pushing the button and the actual taking of the picture. A few of the reviews mention this, so I know I'm not the only one.

Reviews.Title: Love it for the price
Reviews.Author: lisa
Reviews.Content: Takes great pictures. The screen is a bit blurry but when you load the pics to the computer they are fabulous.

Reviews.Title: Excellent camera. I highly recommend it.
Reviews.Author: Mr. KIKIN
Reviews.Content: I purchased this camera not expecting much in quality. General Electric is not a brand allot of people brag about. I was impressed with the specifications and decided to go with it. I'm not much of a tech geek or a photographer so I'm not going to bore you with a bunch of technical BS. I bought this camera because I was going to nicaragua on a vacation. When the camera arrived I was impressed on how sturdy and well built this camera was. I was expecting a cheap, plasiticky, and fagile product. This camera has a very solid construction. I was able to take some AMAZING pictures with this camera. When I came back and posted my pictures on facebook everyone was asking what kind of camera I used. The color of the pictures was just simply amazing, the sunsets at the beach were breath taking, I photographed some butterflies upclose and the pictures came out with amazing detail. The battery life also lasts  a very long time. I took over 500 photographs, played with the zoom constantly, and it only drained 50% of the battery life in the 2 weeks I was there.The quality of the pictures like I said are amazing but this camera is not great for moving objects. It takes a whole second for it to shoot the picture. You cant really point and shoot when driving. You can't capture a flying bird. If they make a version of this camera that could shoot photos a lil faster, atleast 3 to 5 photos per second it would be one of the best cameras out there for the price.I ended up giving my camera away to some nice people while on vacation. When I returned in december a few weeks later I recieved a NIKON coolpix p510 for xmas. I was in shock when I opened up the camera and it had the cheap, fagile, plasticky, constuction I thought the GE would have. When I was on vacation I dropped my camera a few times and it didn't phase it. I am afraid that if I ever drop my nikon it will be all over. General Electric is doing an awsome thing here with these cameras. As soon as a new version of the power pro comes out I'm buying it. I'm not saying that my nikon doesn't work, I'm just saying that General Electric is kicking @$$ with these products and I'm a big fan of picture quality, efficiency, and a durable solid construction. I highly recommend this product from an average person's point of view.

Reviews.Title: OPTICAL ZOOM DIGITAL CAMERA
Reviews.Author: Winnie
Reviews.Content: Great item & price.  Love the powerful zoom.Camera had in the past only zoomed in to a 4 or 5X.  This new one is 15!!

Reviews.Title: camera
Reviews.Author: brandi kuch
Reviews.Content: takes wonderful outdoor pics...the indoor ones are terrible. Flash is too bright...without the flash everything is really yellow looking and dull.

Reviews.Title: Great
Reviews.Author: Sabrina Baptiste
Reviews.Content: I love it thanks great product!My daughter loves it great for her photography class I will recommend this product to all my friends and family thanks amazon

Reviews.Title: Real good camera
Reviews.Author: Melissa  LaFlam
Reviews.Content: I really like this camera, Its easy to use and takes good pitures. I found the writing on the dial a little hard to read, But i'm pretty blind anyway. ( not the cameras fault ) But a real good camera for your average person. And better priced at Amazon then at our local retail store.

Reviews.Title: Great camera
Reviews.Author: LMassa
Reviews.Content: This a great step up camera. I'm enjoying all the easy to use features. Great indoor & outdoor pictures. And the optional white color makes you stand out.

Reviews.Title: Doesn't work
Reviews.Author: Daisiemae
Reviews.Content: I can't turn the camera on.  The on button does not work.  Unfortunately, it's too late to return it.  Due to severe medical issues that occurred the same day the camera arrived, I didn't get a chance to try it out.  Now I'm just stuck with it.So from my point of view, it's a useless piece of junk.

Reviews.Title: Good camera.
Reviews.Author: Gary H.
Reviews.Content: The camera takes great pictures. Just wish it had a rechargeable battery instead of the double A's. It's easy to download to your computer or take the stick to a booth like at Walgreen's.

Reviews.Title: Don't buy it
Reviews.Author: melissa kouf
Reviews.Content: This is the crappiest camera ever !!! The pictures are blurry takes forever to actually take a picture.. The thing broke after 6 months of use .. I wish I never bought it!

Reviews.Title: WOW
Reviews.Author: Darren W. Dickens "sabidoo"
Reviews.Content: A really nice point and shoot.  Has more features than the average Joe will ever need, plus the zoom is fantastic.  I bought this as a gift for my girlfriend and she LOVED it.  Several of our friends have the super expensive DSLR cameras and they usually get jealous of hers, because it is so lightweight and simple to use.HIGHLY RECOMMENDED!!!

Reviews.Title: Best for the $
Reviews.Author: SydeShow "MGS~MAS"
Reviews.Content: This camera has all the bells and whistles of its more expensive counterparts and in some cases even takes better pics!LOL no but seriously, I have taken upwards of 1000 pics w this already and I have been booked for weddings and parties already...Im just an amateur photog but i guess the bug got me due to this lovely little cam! This think is DEF worth the money, esp if your thinking of buying junior his first cam or just getting one for vaca pics but not spending a ton of money! Def worth it!

Reviews.Title: good looking camera
Reviews.Author: tj
Reviews.Content: beatyful camera ,looks awsome. just not the camera im use to - but not the same money eather.. all in all a good camera.,

Reviews.Title: Fantastic Bridge Camera
Reviews.Author: Lilbear
Reviews.Content: I absolutely adore this camera. It gives you the effects, style and settings of a DSLR camera but is as simple to figure out as a point and shoot. Picture quality is great aswell. Best part is it's only about the size of a point and shoot. Just a thicker body to it. Highly recommened buying this camera! It's a small price for a good camera. Only bad thing is the manual is on a CD. Other than that, love it.

Reviews.Title: Excellent Camera.
Reviews.Author: Justin
Reviews.Content: I bought this camera back in August and have been using since then, it takes excellent pictures, is easy to use, and a great value for the money. On disposable batteries I only got about 30 photos, but on rechargeable batteries I have yet to have it die on me with having taken 200 photos in one day. Worth it alone for not having to carry around extra batteries.This camera is worth the price, I almost think its priced too low...lol

Reviews.Title: Great Camera.
Reviews.Author: BearPup
Reviews.Content: I was looking for a camera with excellent zoom, and this camera fits that nicely - I rarely use the full optical zoom and never use the digital zoom, and still get excellent results. Besides the zoom feature, this camera is packed with options for taking pictures, and even when you let the camera set exposure and lighting, the results are quite good.My previous camera (an Olympus) required me to 'photoshop' pictures to get really good results; with the GE, just a few minor tweaks are all that are needed to get quality results. This is going to be my main camera for many years to come.

Reviews.Title: Slightly less cool than the pic.
Reviews.Author: david9660
Reviews.Content: Disconcerting to see the large objective lens "flower" onto a pretty skinny stalk every time you turn this camera on. Decent camera but hard to believe 16 MP. Love the hand grip, size, and feel. SD card makes transferring a snap. Takes video good enough to post to YouTube. A somewhat glorified instamatic. Worth the money, you'll probably want a more serious camera for your inner artiste.

Reviews.Title: Great Investment
Reviews.Author: Abdalla
Reviews.Content: The only reason I would give it a four-stars instead of 5 is that it doesn't quite meet my expectations for battery life, a lot less than 300 pics and it dies.Other than that, great picture quality and an even better zoom for that price are what makes it a good investment .

Reviews.Title: GE Power Pro X500-BK 16 MP with 15 x Optical Zoom Digital Camera
Reviews.Author: Debra McTaggert
Reviews.Content: This is a great camera for a beginner like me. Easy to use and easy to understand. It takes wonderful pictures and the price is great too! It has settings for tons of applications like nighttime, portrait, panorama, too much light, too little light, etc. The list goes on and on. The only thing I don't like is the manual which is on a disc to view on your computer etc. I like paper manual books personally.  So I found myself printing out the pages I needed to study better. Overall though a fantastic camera!

Reviews.Title: amazing
Reviews.Author: American Express "Tea Shanshiashvili"
Reviews.Content: i just love it! its really for me and exellnet for price :)) its a small lovely camera takes beautiful photos...i exactly what i wanted

Reviews.Title: GREAT!
Reviews.Author: trucker22658
Reviews.Content: Amazing camera for the price! Eats batteries so I bought some rechargable ones. I took over 5,000 pics in 2 weeks and it worked amazingly!

Reviews.Title: Great camera
Reviews.Author: Colleen Sebastian
Reviews.Content: We were initially worried since we had never heard of GE cameras, but this is a great camera. Well worth the price!

Reviews.Title: Amazing quality!
Reviews.Author: Rebekah Callahan
Reviews.Content: I do art photography for a living, so about 90% of my product is about the editing after the photo, but this camera takes such beautiful photos, it cuts about half an hour off of my editing because there's so much clarity in the photos. They come out SO vivd and just lovely! There's a setting for pretty much any kind of lighting or set, and the zoom quality is amazing! A good photographer friend of mine owns a $2,600 camera, and says the images she's seen from this camera are just as good as the ones that come from hers! I HIGHLY reccomend it! People are blown away when I tell them how little it cost!! Be sure to also get an SD card as theres not much of an internal memory, and I also suggest ordering a case as well. I found one on her for about $9, and it's perfect for this camera. I couldn't be happier!

Reviews.Title: GE Poere Pro X500-BK 16 MP with 15 X Zoom
Reviews.Author: Jan
Reviews.Content: This camera took me a while to learn it since I had a Sony Camera prior to this.  Now, I love this little camera.  Takes fantastic pictures, lightweight, easy to carry with you and always ready to go..(rechargeable batteries).  I love the 15-X Zoom, and the color clarity is absolutely beautiful.  What a great camera for the price.  I paid twice as much for my Sony, and this camera does the exact same thing.  Love, love, loveit.Jan B.

Reviews.Title: Ok
Reviews.Author: M. Heisler "Red Cycle"
Reviews.Content: This is just an OK camera. I bought it for a wedding. Some picture came out great and others not so great. Also it goes thru batteries very quickly even when the power is off.

Reviews.Title: My new camera
Reviews.Author: mainbd11
Reviews.Content: This camera is exactly what I wanted. I have seen this camera for sale in other places and I think I paid the best price ever

Reviews.Title: Zoom goes very very far...SO CLEAR wether zoomed in or not.
Reviews.Author: Ismael Reyes
Reviews.Content: I love this camera! It's small. It's amazing. The zoom goes very very far. The picture is SO CLEAR wether zoomed in or not. The recording is awesome. The one bad thing is the batteries over heat easily for me. & I have leave the camera alone for like 10 minutes. Another than that, everything else is amazing!

Reviews.Title: Great product
Reviews.Author: Mike
Reviews.Content: I purchased this camera based on price and features. I used this during my vacation and I am very happy with the quality of pictures taken.

Reviews.Title: Not a dependable camera
Reviews.Author: FREDA CAROL
Reviews.Content: I purchased this camera to get family photos but it is not very reliable. You can use up to 3 change of batteries a day. About every 10 or 12 pictures batteries need to be changed. It has a very slow reaction time so you miss more pictures than you get. I would not recommend this camera to anyone.

Reviews.Title: Ge X 500 or 550
Reviews.Author: Albert  Abrantes
Reviews.Content: The camera is great for macro and panoramic photos.It's when you take close up zoom photos of small subjects like snails and flowers that the zoom and focus issues arise.A right equidistance from the subjects is required for zoom and focus to work properly.Otherwise just do a close up photo without the zoom.It's software is excellent you can do a lot of enhancements and manipulations to your photos.And sketching and drawing photo only this camera is capable of such with it's setting.On taking photos of the moon.Once I got the right photo with focus and white balance the moon came out in detail with no over light glare.But I can't seem to repeat it again.That's all I can say. Next time I might get a GE X600 with 26x zoom or a Fuji finepix S4200 with 24X zoom.

Reviews.Title: great for the price
Reviews.Author: Miguel Menendez "miguel"
Reviews.Content: lost of pixels and zoom. It takes good pictues not so good for night pictures, you won't see a thing except a big black screen. Panoramic pictures are not the best but is good.

Reviews.Title: I have mix feelings, its ok
Reviews.Author: Jazzcitla
Reviews.Content: for $100 you cant ask more. its ok it takes some what ok pictures but nothing special. good for teen
