Reviews.Title: My new GE Pro 500 digital camera from Amazon.com
Reviews.Author: mimik
Reviews.Content: I'm still making friends with my new GE camera, but so far it has performed admirably. I am taking a photography class and still learning how to use the "manual" settings for more artistic control but the auto ones I have taken look great! I am happy that I purchased the GE Pro 500 camera. It was one of three recommended by my teacher as a good "starting" cameras.I had checked the usual sources available to me (Radio Shack, Walmart etc) looking for the best prices and Amazon.com not only beat their prices but blew them away even after shipping was included! It arrived in 2 days!

Reviews.Title: Love it!
Reviews.Author: Cory
Reviews.Content: I love this camera! I purchased the bundle, which came with a cleaning kit, 16g SD card, four inch tripod, carrying strap, and carrying bag. I am a total amateur, but wanted something just a step up from plain point and shoot cameras. Be warned, when you review the images taken on the cameras lcd screen, they can actually differ greatly from the actual image when reviewed on the computer. The camera saves a thumbnail image and I've been fooled by it a couple of times, when the image didn't turn out as great as the thumbnail looked. If you don't get the bundle, you really need to purchase a separate SD card, or you're only going to have room for 4 or 5 pictures. I'm very pleased with my camera.Update 2/25/13This camera is still awesome. I love all the different options and everyone raves about the pictures I take with it. Best camera I have ever had!

Reviews.Title: GE X500 Personal Review
Reviews.Author: JK IMAGES
Reviews.Content: I only gave the GE X500 three stars for the following reasons. Difficult to focus at advertised minimum distance, 30 second max shutter (no bulb setting), more camera shake/unsharpness even at 1/200(handheld) than it should have. This is still a wonderful camera for the price! I have blown up images to 20X30 with great results. Low light is difficult in some situations too. I found anything over 400ISO way too noisy for me. I shoot in manual mode most of the time and use a tripod. GE would do well to add/fix a few things and up the price a bit to really make this a contender. If your looking for an auto point and shoot only, I would have to suggest a different camera. However, if your know how to use the settings and have a good understanding of camera functions, this camera can shine! I retired my film SLR and didnt want/need the expense of a DSLR. The GE has done nicely for me but may not be for the newbie!

Reviews.Title: Best Order ever!!!
Reviews.Author: Preetha
Reviews.Content: This order was awesome. I was a bit finicky at first as I'm a first time buyer at Amazon and moreover I was pondering whether to buy a Canon or Nikon. Anyway, I had come across the GE Camera and I thought to myself that this was too good to be true so I bought it to check it out and it was the best order ever done so far in my experience with online shopping. I'm glad I bought this item and I love Amazon!

Reviews.Title: Great camera for the Price!
Reviews.Author: LukosX
Reviews.Content: This camera is great for a camera that is between a point and shoot and a more professional camera! It takes great photos. Quality was good when the photos were printed as well.

Reviews.Title: It Broke
Reviews.Author: Rilke "Rilke"
Reviews.Content: I am starting this 1 star review off by saying I loved this camera. I brought it June, 5th and began using it in mid-July after I got the rechargeable batteries and a memory card. I took a ton of beautiful pictures. And then right at the 3 month mark it broke. The software or whatever is in these things went crazy. It began switching rapidly from one program to the next and would not stay in one mode.  I stopped focus and when it did focus the colors severely skewed and the whole think just went crazy at once. I have sent it back to Amazon for a partial refund. I'm not stupid enough to attempt a manufacturer warranty. I think something like that would make me crazy. I liked the camera so much that I might just purchase another one and hope it lasts. I think if I purchase it at Wal-mart they will give me a full refund with in a year. I think? It was a nice camera, I miss it.

Reviews.Title: GE camera
Reviews.Author: steve
Reviews.Content: this GE camera shoots very good A+ quality still-photos ... better than my other cameras say, the sony cybershot ... let's award 5 stars to GE.

Reviews.Title: not as good as I thought
Reviews.Author: tu
Reviews.Content: I'm not a professional photographer.I really like this camera.The zoom is amazing ! it's a little big but I guess they were going for the pro camera look.If you take pictures right after another they are blurry and or the camera pauses or gets kind of frozen.The video picture is excellent but the sound stink's you cant hear anything but Muffled noise.The picture quality is fine.I'm happy enough with the camera and the price is what really sold me.

Reviews.Title: Amazing camera, especially for the price
Reviews.Author: Sarah Faidell
Reviews.Content: I researched cameras on here before ordering this, and I bought this one based on the price and it seemed to have a lot of 5 star reviews. I bought the white one and I LOVE how it looks and it works even better. This is my first camera that is a little more than just a point-and-shoot, and while its very easy to use it does have so many settings and effects that make it what I guess you'd call a bridge-camera. Basically I'm obsessed with it, the quality of the pictures is great, the price is unheard of, and the camera works well for taking pictures for my college newspaper.

Reviews.Title: Good Camera
Reviews.Author: Melody McKibbin
Reviews.Content: I purchased this Camera to replace my point-and-shoot cameras.Setup is easy.The mass amount of features and manual settings are overwhelming. I would sit and look through the user manual page by page, and maybe find some good photography tips. So far I have only dabbled with the Manual settings, as they are complicated and intimidating. That being said- I think this camera has massive potential.I am by no means a professional photographer, but like to take good pictures.Overall, this is a great camera with way too many good things and features to list in a review. You won't be disappointed with this purchase.Pros:Great PriceLightweightGood BrandLots of features & preset scenesGood zoomCons:Can't get attachable lenses such as telephoto.The beeping sound on each key press has to be manually turned off each time you turn the camera on.It comes with a set of 4 batteries but  no SD Card. I purchased the Transcend SDHC Card and it works great. I also purchased the Zeikos medium camera bag and it perfectly holds this camera as well as my other 15 MP point and shoot and my 4 MP Bridge.Conclusion:If you aren't worried about being a complete professional, but want to take professional type of shots- this camera is for you as long as you don't mind doing a little reading and/or taking some classes in photography.

Reviews.Title: I love it!
Reviews.Author: Fred J. Duffey
Reviews.Content: This little camera was a big surprise, it's everything the reviews said it was and more. I just love this camera.

Reviews.Title: Very good for the price
Reviews.Author: sperry1
Reviews.Content: Sharp, clear pictures well worth the price. I bought it primerly to photograph hummingbirds, did not work very well for that slow to zoom and focus, but for ordinary pictures it is excellent .

Reviews.Title: A Bargain for the Money
Reviews.Author: Torpedo los
Reviews.Content: January I bought my brother this camera for his birthday and was impressed with the all around quality and design. I needed a camera that was automated and could shoot good photos so I bought myself the same camera in white and am super satisfied. I went for the extra few bucks and bought the promotion deal with the bag and smart card.  Everyone thinks the camera cost a lot more money.  It has all the important features yet still is not a battery hog.  I would recomend this camera to everyone.

Reviews.Title: Great camera
Reviews.Author: Sinister8
Reviews.Content: This camera is everything and than sum....price is great, options on camera are great, picture quality is great, love the white color. Comes with pretty much everything you need to start snapping away....Only gripe: wish it came with a camera bag of some sort!Had to buy that and memory card sepretly!But I figure...if you can't afford to buy a memory card and a little cheap camera bag, than you can't afford this amazingly priced camera! :)

Reviews.Title: Love, Love, Love
Reviews.Author: Raigansmom
Reviews.Content: I love my camera!  No issues with batteries, or anything else.  I love the shape of the camera also.  At first I wasn't sure if I would but it turned out to be really great!  I would 100% recommend this camera!

Reviews.Title: Great camera for the price!
Reviews.Author: steve
Reviews.Content: I've had this camera for 1 year and am very satisfied with it's performance.The daytime pics are really crisp and clear.In low light conditions,I had to add some lighting,but pics were still fine.You get lots of functions and 16 megapixels for a great price.I would recommend this product! I bought this camera for 120 bucks on sale,on this same site.It's now 199 dollars.I'm really happy with the deal I got.

Reviews.Title: Just what I wanted
Reviews.Author: Daniel J. Miller
Reviews.Content: This camera is great.  It can do so many things and it's well worth the money  It seems like it should cost twice the price.

Reviews.Title: Great camera
Reviews.Author: Roberto P.
Reviews.Content: Great camera, now my kids pictures get just perfect, I can send to my parents and they picture a big picture for their living room. It's just awesome, nobody else on Brazil has one of these and my friends are so jealous.

Reviews.Title: Great!!!!!
Reviews.Author: Jason.scott541
Reviews.Content: This camera is pretty awesome for the price great pictures lots of settings ... Coolest thing is I took a shot of a tree from about 80-100 yards and was able to count the ripples in the bark like I said great camera

Reviews.Title: Amazin
Reviews.Author: Bster12
Reviews.Content: This camera is amazing. It takes great pictures, it has a long battery life, it is easy to use, and it is easy to upload pictures to a computer.

Reviews.Title: Decent camera for a very decent price.
Reviews.Author: cdale8 "cdale8"
Reviews.Content: I was attracted to this camera for the ability to change a lot of the settings manually, and after reading through the manual (which I did have to print out and carry with me for the first few outings) and a little practice I was content with the purchase.  It will function well as an automatic point-and-shoot-style camera (albeit one a bit bigger than is necessary), plus you can use it to learn all about photography settings in a hands-on manner.  The zoom is quite good for this level of camera.  Best of all, Amazon had a great deal on it, so I didn't feel like I was throwing away money just to play around with manual settings. The picture quality is as good as my older Canon point-and-shoot, and interfaced as a PnP device with iPhoto on first try.The caveat to buying this camera is that it is a cheap camera.  I've had it freeze up on me twice in a month of use (about 500 photos in that month).  I removed and replaced the batteries and it reset just fine, but I wasn't expecting freezes in the first week of use.  The shutter delay/lag is also pretty bad.  I took this out to a few of my kid's tee ball/coach pitch games to test out the zoom and shutter speed settings, and missed most of the action that I intended to get.  Even anticipating where things were going to be, I had a lot of difficulty getting the ball in the shot.  I had many shots with just a cleated foot at the edge of a bunch of diamond dirt.  I turned off the image stabilization function and didn't see any difference in the lag time (or, really, the crispness of the resulting photo).  The shutter delay seemed to be independent of most of the AF, stabilization, shutter speed, and aperture settings -- I was always at least a second or two behind what was going on.  It is fairly misleading, too, since the image initially frozen on the LCD screen at shutter press is not necessarily the image that is saved to disk.That said, if I wasn't trying to capture anything fast-moving, this is a perfectly fine camera for around a hundred bucks.  When my kids are standing still (which does happen occasionally, and sometimes even on request), the photos are just fine. The flash worked as expected, and indoor shots came out fine on auto settings and when using the right manual aperture/speed settings.  On auto-mode, it seems to do it's job, and the manual setting options let you learn all about controlling the various aspects of photography without needing a 3 thousand dollar DSLR setup.  I could zoom in at the ball fields and capture kids' expressions while out standing in the field, I just didn't get any action shots of them hitting or fielding the ball...

Reviews.Title: Present for Capturing Family Moments
Reviews.Author: Marquita "quito_24"
Reviews.Content: My brother, 35 years old, wanted a nice camera for his birthday since the last one he had was only a 5mp camera.  This one is great.  He has only had it for 2 weeks so there is a lot more to learn how to use.  However, he loves it.  Detailed picture and great price.  Very sturdy and looks very expensive.  He loves it and has not stopped taking pictures.  I would recommend this camera.  I am thinking of getting one for my family because I love to scrapbook.

Reviews.Title: its ok
Reviews.Author: Khayla
Reviews.Content: Image is very grainy on the screen but after you snap the shot it is clear. Kind of annoying though because you cant see it well when you zoom.  Good enough for the price though

Reviews.Title: Great Camera for the price
Reviews.Author: Joe B
Reviews.Content: We had an Easy Share Z915 that we inadvertently left at a baseball field one evening and unfortunately it was never seen again. I looked at various cameras and decided to give the GE X500 a try. It is a great camera and takes very good photos. If you have used an electronic camera before the controls are intuitive and you can take great pictures from the get go. You must purchase a flash memory card as the camera only has enough internal memory for about three or four picture. Battery  life is good. This camera has some weight if you carry it around for any amount of time and gets heavy. It has a very substantial feel to it. We recently took a cruise and I used all of the functions on the camera. The only thing it did not perform great on was the movie function. The audio became choppy after recording about 3 minutes. It was great on everything else, the panorama picture function was really nice and easy to use.

Reviews.Title: I LOVE my new GE Power Pro X500 Digital Camera!
Reviews.Author: Karen Gray
Reviews.Content: I was shopping for a new camera because my camera broke when I went to my niece's graduation - it was dissappointing because I wasn't able to get a single picture of her on this landmark day.  I use my camera a lot but it was a basic camera.  After shopping around and looking for something affordable, I found this camera on Amazon and it appeared to be much better than the one I was replacing.  It did not dissappoint!  I read all of the reviews and they were right on target.  I had paid more for the one I had but the pictures are much better on with this camera and this camera has so much more. I am still learning how to use some of the features but I am impressed so far. The only downside that I found was that there is a setting for fireworks that I used on the 4th of July and those pictures did not come out.  I am not a professional photographer and it could very well be that I was doing something wrong but I found the auto setting seemed to catch the fireworks much better.  With that being said, I am still very happy with my purchase and will keep practicing until I figure it out.

Reviews.Title: big value
Reviews.Author: charles
Reviews.Content: Nice all around camera--money well spent--perfect for my needs--quick shipping--A+ deal. Ideal for everyday use--camera has a nice feel and balance to it.

Reviews.Title: LOVE IT
Reviews.Author: alixandrea Carter
Reviews.Content: Great Camera, I love every aspect of it. My hiisband and I were looking for an upgrade for our camera and found it. Thank you great product and great seller.

Reviews.Title: Not pleased.  Update.  Pleased.
Reviews.Author: onewoman
Reviews.Content: I bought this camera to replace the Kodak Easyshare digital camera I purchased about six years ago.  I assumed it would be as easy to operate.  It hasn't been.  I've only had it about a month.  But I've taken it to San Diego for a weeks trip with my family and I've been trying to take alot of pictures of my children.  My son is going to Taiwan for several years and I wanted pictures of the places we were going before he left.  This camera is not working well.  My flash won't work.  It is on forced off and I cannot figure out how to change it.  I just took the last pictures my kids will have together.  They were standing against a wall, in the shade, the camera was set on auto.  I took the pictures.  I saw the display of the pictures.  They looked fine but when I got home and went to look at them on my computer, the pictures were almost completely white.  There were a few faint images.  I have no idea what happened but this is not the first time pictures have "disappeared".  Also, just taking basic pictures, they come out grainy.  When I try to crop pictures,  the result is not clear at all.  Maybe I don't understand the camera.  Since there is no instruction booklet included with the camera, I'll have to go on line and print my own.  I read the reviews but I think buying this camera was a mistake.UPDATE!  After reading the manual and contacting GE, I was still unable to turn my flash on.  They suggested I return the camera.  I did through Amazon.  My new camera arrived three days later.  It's working great!  No problems.  So maybe it was just the camera I received the first time.

Reviews.Title: GE x500
Reviews.Author: chris
Reviews.Content: great camera for the price, great optical zoom. too bad it takes a couple seconds in order for the camera to save the photo. otherwise it's great

Reviews.Title: you get what you pay for then some!
Reviews.Author: anoldpackardkeeper
Reviews.Content: GREETINGS...LOT'S OT TIME SPENT LOOKING,EVERY MODEL FROM $100 TO $400,ALL THE BRANDS...THEN THIS ONE CAME ALONG,BARGAINED PRICED,FULL OF USEFUL FEATURES AND DELIVERED IN 7 DAYS TO AUSTRALIA.UNPACKED TO FEEL WHAT IT WAS ALL ABOUT AND IT DOES FEEL GOOD,LOOK'S GOOD IN THE FLESH AND A DECENT WEIGHT...IT WAS NEEDED FOR A REASONABLE ZOOM LENGTH ALONG WITH CLEAR PICTURES,GET TO UNDERSTAND THIS LITTLE GEM AND IT PRODUCES EXCELLENT 6X4'S...WHAT MORE COULD YOU WANT FOR THE BARGAIN BASEMENT PRICING...RONALD.C.LEE-HARRIS.

Reviews.Title: Perfect for my needs
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: I just got this camera after spending several days looking at different brands and reading the customer reviews. Not only did this camera have the best reviews of the ones I looked at, but it was by far the best deal at less that $120. I have yet to use many of the functions (there are a lot of them to get used to) but I think Ive played with it enough to have the basics down pat. One of the featured I absolutely love is that is not only has a viewfinder, but that all the information that you see in the lcd screen display is transferred to the viewfinder when you push a button. We all know how hard it is to see a screen on a bright, sunny day.I added a class 10 16gb memory card to it and replaced the generic batteries it came with with batteries made for electronics. I look forward to taking this camera on vacation with me and really seeing what it can do.

Reviews.Title: Buy it. You will like. It.
Reviews.Author: Ivan
Reviews.Content: Ivan maldonado. From. Rochester. Newyork great camera. I allways liked ge. Since. The 70.s. A camera from ge. Is even better.

Reviews.Title: GE Camera
Reviews.Author: DoubtedHeavy
Reviews.Content: I am a little dissapointed in the picture quality of this camera if hand held but it takes really nice pictures if on a bipod. Decent price and i would recomend if needing a cheaper decent camera.

Reviews.Title: great product
Reviews.Author: cd3
Reviews.Content: I puchased this camera when my other one broke (won't say what brand name).  I have never owned a GE camera before, but have  a lot of other GE products.  So I thought "why not"?  I love it!  It's very easy to use, takes great pictures and gives me lots of options!  For the price I don't think I could have made a better choice.

Reviews.Title: promotion offer
Reviews.Author: frank
Reviews.Content: thus far the camera is a good buy, but the promotion for this camera offered me a free standard amazon 2gb sd card that i never received. I did call about this matter and was told that the sd card would be sent to me. I still haven't received my sd card for the camera i purchased. I am very disappointed with Amazon.com

Reviews.Title: Good one for the buy
Reviews.Author: a good set of price
Reviews.Content: This camera is good one and the description shows the features of this camera unbelievable.At a low price nothing beats this camera except for manual editing for the hdr I wish GE make it automaticHDR instead of manual but the rest of the features are excellent. The videos are good not bad for a DVD qualityVideo.

Reviews.Title: GE Camera ?
Reviews.Author: Mark Twain
Reviews.Content: Purchased for my granddaughter. Takes quality photos, videos not so good. It would have been nice if a memory card was included but was not.

Reviews.Title: A great "starter" camera
Reviews.Author: Lofatus
Reviews.Content: Purchased this camera for my daughter's birthday. It's a great starter camera.  It's been over a month now and she hasn't had any problems. It has good features and for the price, it's well worth it.

Reviews.Title: Suprise!
Reviews.Author: Nazer
Reviews.Content: When I first received the camera, I thought "ok this looks like a peace of Shi!!!!," but it is actually great. The stabilization is such a great feature, and it lets me take all of the best pictures. I used it yesterday for the firs time at the pool, and it was great!

Reviews.Title: Camera
Reviews.Author: Stiengel
Reviews.Content: This Camera wile not a Pro Camera is very good once u use the setting for the different shots. the Pix it takes are just perfect the colors the lighting all are just Prefect the contours of the camera also makes easy one hand use. All and all a good buy for the price. only problem is catching moving objects i guess the shutter speed is the blame.

Reviews.Title: I love my camera
Reviews.Author: Gkambira
Reviews.Content: Great camera, easy to use. Light in weight, easy to adjust. Overall I'm please with my purchase. I love color white-:)

Reviews.Title: love it
Reviews.Author: nae36
Reviews.Content: I am completely happy with this camera. I haven't finished playing with it yet but im making my family crazy.

Reviews.Title: best camera ever!
Reviews.Author: caitlin richkas
Reviews.Content: this camera is amazing ive gone through my share of cameras and i have to say this ones my faveorite the panerama mode is super easy to use and really cook the scene selections and options is really wide there are pleanty of options you can even choose sketch where it looks like somone drew the picture! the zoom is amazing its crazy what pictures you can capture! buy it!!!!!! you wont regret it!

Reviews.Title: GREAT camera for the money
Reviews.Author: chuck
Reviews.Content: Great camera. I'm not a pro by no means, easy to use and very affordable, look forward to using it many times.

Reviews.Title: great camera
Reviews.Author: someone who cares
Reviews.Content: I absolutely love this camera. I bought this because I recently started birdwatching and my point and shoot camera just wasn't able to capture the pictures with the amount of clarity that I needed. The zoom is amazing and let me capture birds in both rapid succession and at far distances. I'm definately no pro at taking pictures but I enjoy the different features and settings that this camera has. A couple of the pictures that I have taken however have come out blurry but I think once I have the opportunity to work with it more I may be able to elimaye this problem. I will let you know further down the line once I have had a chance to play with it a bit more =D

Reviews.Title: GE Camera X 500
Reviews.Author: Daniel Byers
Reviews.Content: I have owned this camera for over 2 months now, And after practicing with it in all the different modes.  I find it is one of the best cameras I have ever owned.  I can take crystal clear macro and zoom pictures. It takes wonderful panoramic pictures.  I am still on the same batteries after 300 pictures, The smile and facial recognition is tremendous.  For the price it is an excellent camera.  It has image stabilization which works great.  It has many options found on more expensive cameras.  Db.

Reviews.Title: Is it realy that hard?
Reviews.Author: Kenyatta
Reviews.Content: We have tried to get a good , yet inexpensive Camera for the last year.  No luck.  After reading the reviews here I took a chance.  This is a really decent unit at a low price.  Is it really that hard for camera makers to do what GE has done?  GE, when my wife heard the name she was concerned that the camera would not be any good.  They have well exceeded the " Big name" camera guys by leaps and bounds.  All for a "It fell of the truck" Price.  Well done GE, well done.

Reviews.Title: Nice camera and great price
Reviews.Author: Eric A. Bosarge
Reviews.Content: I got this for my birthday and it was really a nice surprise.  Very clear pictures and ease of use is awesome.  Light weight and easy to handle, this is a sweet camera and if you are a beginner or pro, this is something you might want to look at.

Reviews.Title: ge camera
Reviews.Author: Sheryl A. Bryant "sheryls"
Reviews.Content: i really like this litte camera.  it is compact and sturdy.  takes good pictures, but not as good as the kodak digital i used to have.  its a good value though.

Reviews.Title: Wonderful camera
Reviews.Author: hadarrow7
Reviews.Content: I am not a photographer, but needed a camera simple enough that gives quality pictures. This was it. Great camera, easy to maneuver through the options, small enough to fit in tight storage places. Great camera.

Reviews.Title: great camera
Reviews.Author: alden mom
Reviews.Content: Great camera for the small purchase price. Not complicated to get started. Received camera sooner than expected which was competely unexpected but nice. I would purchase again from seller.

Reviews.Title: AWESOME
Reviews.Author: dels
Reviews.Content: Very happy with purchase and it was pretty fast shipping.  Like the fact that there are still responsible sellers out there and what they promise is what you get.

Reviews.Title: Decent for beginner
Reviews.Author: heathercollins612
Reviews.Content: I purchased it and had high expectations unfortunately the battery sucks! I am a photographer and by the end of my session my batterys were dead! Also not as fast as I would like but overall decent for a first camera!

Reviews.Title: GE Power Pro X500-BK 16 MP with 15 x Optical Zoom Digital Camera, Black
Reviews.Author: Jeffrey Trigueros
Reviews.Content: Very nice product... I found the UI a little complicated, maybe cause I was so used to my old camera, who knows? anyways... The one thing I do not like is that for some reason it saves THM files (thumbnails) in the SD card consuming space that can be used with more photos. Other than that... We love this camera so far!

Reviews.Title: Great Product
Reviews.Author: Rafael
Reviews.Content: Really good product for the cost. I resolved the problem with dark photos, this camara has the ISO up to 3,200 and any photo in dark area now is perfect.

Reviews.Title: Great features but misses on the basics
Reviews.Author: Steve
Reviews.Content: I've had this X500 for several months and used all the features.  It has a lot to offer by way of customizations and such but the focusing system is hit or miss (a deal breaker).  If you touch the zoom after focusing to compose the pic a bit more the focus goes out.  Between two feet and ten feet the pics are nearly always fuzzy.  You are better off to stand WAY back and zoom in then focus, or use the macro zoomed all the way out for close shots.  Outdoors this is no problem: indoors is frustrating.  Nearly all indoor shots are between five and ten feet so it's a coin toss to get a sharp picture, since you can't back off to twenty feet.  A brightly lit room is better, because the "F" stop is larger and the "in focus" range is greater.The zoom is very powerful, and the battery saving features (switching to eyepiece from LCD screen) is top notch.The lens cap does pop off all the time with slightest jarring......I put it on a short leather strip attached to the bottom of the lens body.....it holds better and still jumps off if I turn the camera on with the lens cap on.  If you can remember to stand off you will have decent pics, but the frustration of finding out later that some are blurry cost this camera two stars.

Reviews.Title: GE Power Pro X500
Reviews.Author: Insurance Sales Rep
Reviews.Content: To this point, I have not really put the camera to a test.  It does not seem to focus as clearly as my wife's Canon DSLR does nor produce the color saturation I would like.  However, I did not expect a $128 camera to match up all that well.  I will use it mainly to record job site activities and it should do that well.  It is much easier to use than the DSLR is.

Reviews.Title: GE Power Pro X500 Review
Reviews.Author: Lbh642
Reviews.Content: This camera has exceeded my expectations. The picture quality is beautiful and captures color vividly. But the only down side is that the LCD makes things burly.

Reviews.Title: Excellent Camera
Reviews.Author: Alexander Balzan
Reviews.Content: I bought it in China, where is more expensive but it really worths. Zoom it's excellent, you can have panoramic photos very easy and images are high qualityIt has many options and easy to use.

Reviews.Title: About What I Expected
Reviews.Author: AnXRockStar
Reviews.Content: The bottom line at the top:  Excellent bang for the buck.  Some of the things you have to give up to get this price are speed, no mount for filters or zoom extenders and it has less than ½ the zoom of the longest bridge cameras.A couple of nits I'd like to pick, if I may...You get EVF or rear display, not both.  At least it would be nice if it remembered what you used last and turned on in that mode.  As is, if you hold it to your eye while turning on, you get nothing.  If there's something that I missed in the manual (PDF only)  that allows you to default to the EVF, feel free to post a comment, please and thank you.Operation seems like it could be made a little easier.  For example, to go to portrait mode, it's a position on the mode dial.  Unless it's night portrait, in which case it's one of the preset scenes.  Or a back-lit portrait, which is only available in the auto scene select mode.  What I'd like to see, although I doubt anybody does this, is that you set the basic scene type, (portrait, kids, action...) and then a sub-scene for condition, (daylight, back-light, snow...)  Setting ISO should be a quicker process than it is, too.Minor complaints, though.  To me, it doesn't make much sense to get an expensive P/S (unless you're talking an application specific device like for magazine layout) Even the best still have an EVF rather than a through-the-lens optical view finder, sensors that are too small, and with few exceptions, (e.g. the Fuji HS20) no manual zoom and near worthless "manual" focus.  If your main application is 4×6 prints to share with family and friends, the 16MP resolution makes the digital zoom actually usable.  If you really need 36× optical zoom, it's available for quite a bit more than the price of this camera, but if you're that serious about photography, an entry-level DSLR, especially if you can get a good deal on an older model, would be the way to go.***A quick update... check out the Fuji S2550.  They look an awful lot alike.  As if this was designed by Fuji to be the bottom of the S2000 series, but they decided there were just too many sacrifices.  Also, I'm getting some strange meta-data mistakes, mostly time and date taken.  I thought maybe the RTC chip was bad or something, but it does keep time correctly.

Reviews.Title: Camera review
Reviews.Author: Dan'l
Reviews.Content: I looked for days online to find a replacement for my 6MP camera,and I have another expensive SLR. This is one of the best deals on a bridge camera that takes beautiful clear and vibrant colored pictures. Great camera,great price,great pictures!

Reviews.Title: GE Power Pro Camera - Good value for the money.
Reviews.Author: Jim Meredith
Reviews.Content: We purchased the GE Power Pro prior to a vacation trip to Canada. We have had it now for slightly over one month and it has worked well for us. We have had only two problems, and even with them, we still give the product a 5-star score because of the excellent value.Problem 1 - nuisance type - the lens cap/cover does not fit tightly enough and as a result is more off than on while we are carrying the camera.Problem 2 - When doing extreme zooming, the view finder doesn't do a great job. The picture turns out well, but in my case, we were trying to photograph a particular individual (my son) in a group of kids walking, and we got excellent pictures of strangers because the resolution on the view finder was not good enough to tell who we were photographing at that distance.

Reviews.Title: GE Power Pro X500
Reviews.Author: Joyce Thornburg
Reviews.Content: So far I'm quite happy with this product. However, the four batteries that were sent with the camera only lasted for about 30 pictures. the camera came with GE alkaline batteries. Does anyone know of any other type of batteries I could use that may last longer?

Reviews.Title: Arrived safe a sound quickly from Amazon
Reviews.Author: W. Spies
Reviews.Content: This is a great camera for it's rather low price. It's worth more and comparable cameras cost considerably more. I took a few pics of the cat and the images are top notch on par with a professional instrument.

Reviews.Title: CAMERA
Reviews.Author: E. T. SULLIVAN
Reviews.Content: GREAT CAMERA/GREAT PRICEMANY FEATURES. A PLUS FOR THS BEAUTY IS THE EXTRA ZOOMAND EASE OF SHOOTING. EXCELLENT BUY. RECOMMEND TO ALL WHO DESIRE AN ALL AROUND CAMERA.BRAVO G.E. !

Reviews.Title: Great camera for the price!
Reviews.Author: Joel
Reviews.Content: I really enjoy using this camera. I am still learning how to use some of the features, but the book helps with that. This is a great camera for the novice to middle learner.

Reviews.Title: Love It
Reviews.Author: Nightpriss
Reviews.Content: I take photos for fun. Got this camera because I needed a new one. I can not believe how great the pictures are. Sure like all people I will get a bad shot but that is me not the camera. I feel you can not go wrong with this camera. I have put up 3 pics I took with the GE Power Pro X500-BK 16 MP with 15 x Optical Zoom Digital Camera. 1 of our dog 1 of the flag and 1 of flowers.

Reviews.Title: Excellent! Best Camera I've Ever Owned at That Price!
Reviews.Author: mattocchi
Reviews.Content: *It was shipped out and received very quickly.*The camera looks great.*The picture quality is VERY good. I seen a lot of reviews before I bought it saying the camera takes blurry pictures. Well this camera has a large number of different modes. If one would take some time and go through the manual one might actually learn how the camera functions. It takes great photos in all modes.*I love it. For the price and quality this is the best camera I've ever owned.

Reviews.Title: CAN'T BEAT IT FOR THE PRICE
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: GREAT CAMERA FOR THE PRICE. I WAS SURPRISED I COULD GET ONE WITH SO MANY MP AND X'S ZOOM FOR LESS THAN $150. IT IS TRUE THAT IT MAKES MORE NOISE THAN I AM USED TO AND THE SCREEN IS RATHER PIXELATED BUT WHEN IT COMES DOWN TO IT THEY HAD TO CUT SOME CORNERS TO MAKE IT SO REASONABLY PRICED. JUST BECAUSE THE SCREEN ISN'T SUPER CLEAR DOESN'T MEAN THE PICTURES AREN'T. AS SOON AS YOU BRING THEM UP ON YOUR COMPUTER YOU CAN SEE HOW CRISP THE PICTURES ARE. I SUPPOSE I AM WILLING TO TAKE THE GOOD WITH THE BAD BECAUSE I WOULD RATHER UPGRADE CAMERAS MORE OFTEN AND SPEND ALOT LESS FOR EACH ONE THAN SPEND A FORTUNE ON ONE AND BE STUCK WITH IT LONGER. THESE THINGS GET BETTER SO QUICKLY THAT SPENDING A BUNCH FOR ONE DOESN'T MAKE SENSE TO ME.

Reviews.Title: GE enters a very crowded market
Reviews.Author: Scott FS
Reviews.Content: I'm not sure why GE wants to get into this very crowded, low-margin business of consumer digital cameras.  Maybe they have some stunning new option that instantly sets them apart from the rest of the players.  Or maybe they have a compelling price or product offering.But they have.  Sometimes business decisions are beyond me, because the GE camera seems to be a very run-of-the-mill camera.At first heft, this is a very attractive camera, with a fully functioning LCD/menu system that looks good and handles well.  But, nothing new here.  It's about the same as, or perhaps a touch less functional, than a Canon camera of roughly the same price.Ultimately, the picture quality tells the tale.  And here's the puzzle: the camera doesn't take that great of photographs.  They are OK, but the image quality to my eye isn't as good as your basic Nikon, Canon, Sony, Kodak, or Olympus.  It's a shade off, a little fuzzy, not a sharp as I'd expect.As I've said, business decisions are sometimes beyond me.  Why would British Petroleum, after the debacle in the Gulf, go back to drilling with the same technology that had the company on the front page of very newspaper, leading the airwaves with the same, tragic images of apparently disposable sea creatures, doomed to die terrible deaths.Maybe GE bought some bit Chinese camera maker, and thinks that slapping the fine GE brand name will sell lots of cameras (I must confess it did attract me).  Perhaps they got a lot of 1 million cameras at a terrific discount, and wanted to move a lot of cameras by putting their name on it.I certainly don't see this as a serious move by GE into the huge consumer digital camera business.  I can see them do a specialty camera, since GE sells $1 million MRI machines and CT scanners.  They have an excellent reputation.  But why dilute the brand name with a so-so camera?You can do better for the money, in my opinion.

Reviews.Title: It doesn't do it for the detailed shots
Reviews.Author: M. Norton "peggy n"
Reviews.Content: I was looking for something inexpensive to replace my sony and after reading all the reviews I thought this would make a great camera at a very low price, so I bought it! Big mistake, doesn't not have the abilities I need in a camera. While trying to take a nice still shot all I was able to get is a blur it took over twenty shots before I got something halfway decent to use. I need something that will take detailed shots like the shoes on a flea or a lady bugs lips. This camera just doesn't cut it for a good detailed shot and so I'm back to finding another sony to replace the one that broke.

Reviews.Title: Excellent buy for its price
Reviews.Author: Fernando Martinez
Reviews.Content: I love my camera! I had a Pentax K1000 reflex 35mm camera, and it was an excellent camera. However, since the electronic photography took on, I was craving for another similar camera but without a big investment, since I'm just a photography amateur. Well, the GE camera was not only a bargain but also a device full of good features for those who, like me, understand a little photography and want to take good pictures occasionally.Regarding the good pictures, I have used it for just a week, and I still have some things to tame this camera for, so I may update this review later but, for the time being, I am just happy with it.

Reviews.Title: Not as great as expected
Reviews.Author: K.D
Reviews.Content: I bought this camera because of the reasonable price, and the fact that most reviewers said It's a good beginner camera. In the past, I've only had polaroids, and a point and shoot digital (sony cybershot). I go to a lot of concerts, so I wanted a camera with a good zoom so that I could take decent band pictures.I was so frustrated when I started using this camera. Outside, it was pretty decent, except the images weren't as sharp as expected. However, inside, there was constantly noise, even when using a low ISO. In addition to that, you couldn't even zoom up to the halfway point without the image being really blurry. The focus seems to be really useless. I guess if you used this camera for a basic point and shoot (without using the zoom), it takes fairly clear images, and in that case It's good value for its price. I was just expecting so much more, and was really disappointed. However, yesterday I was fiddling around with it and discovered that if you put it into shutter speed mode, and use a fairly high shutter speed (I have it on 1/60 I think) and a flash, it seems to take pretty clear pictures with the zoom!! I'm going to a concert this Friday and will test it out then, so hopefully it will work out as hoped.

Reviews.Title: Not worth it
Reviews.Author: Kiananotbombs
Reviews.Content: I intended this camera to be a gift for my son for his seventh birthday. Our family goes on photography dates and he borrows my DSLR camera. I thought this would be a great camera before I invest in a SLR camera for him. This camera was not even suitable for a seven year old. I would hope I had a defective camera because it would not make any sense for a camera such as the GE Power Pro X500-BK to even be made with how it functioned. If you feel like you would like to purchase this camera I would advise you to go check it out in person first.

Reviews.Title: ruined vacation pictures
Reviews.Author: connie
Reviews.Content: Took alot of pictures on a special day most turned out all white no picture at all..I bought this camera in June and save it to take on our vacation in August, now its to late to return it!! I would not recommend this camera for a dependable outcome. Poor video quality, blurred pics when some did show up!! Wasted a lot of money and very unhappy with product.

Reviews.Title: Great Camera but .....
Reviews.Author: submom "Madeline"
Reviews.Content: I bought this camera to take prom pictures. It took great pictures but the camera kept shutting off. Then it would come on. I replaced the batteries and it lasted for a few shots and back off it went. Replaced the batteries again, this time it wouldn't come back on. I was going to return it but my 30 days expired. I called the GE company and it was going to take 21 days for them to look at the camera and let me know what was wrong with it. It doesn't take 21 days to know it doesn't work. Well I wasn't happy waiting that long so I took the camera apart. Theres not much to it but then I didn't know what I was looking at anyway. I will buy this camera again but I will buy it locally so I can take it back to a store if it doesn't work. I only had this camera for a week when it started acting up.

Reviews.Title: Missing cord + blank CD!
Reviews.Author: myLady
Reviews.Content: Ordering this camera has just created work for me, because the USB cord for uploading photos wasn't sent with the camera. In addition, the CD that has (presumably) complete instructions is blank! All you see is "No data on disk."This is beyond carelessness; it's just unacceptable.

Reviews.Title: Good camera, but has limitations
Reviews.Author: KimD
Reviews.Content: The camera takes awesome pictures outdoors, but isn't all that good for taking indoor pictures where lighting conditions are low. Large 16Mp gives crystal clear images each time, every time. Indoor pictures need a special manual adjustment without which the image appears blurry and grainy. It may be the high noise level, but I am not certain. In any event, I will be using this outdoors, so no sweat.

Reviews.Title: OUTSTANDING
Reviews.Author: e. reed
Reviews.Content: My 11 year old son saved up his money over several months to buy this camera. The day it arrived, he was so excited and began taking pictures of everything. Lots of features for a first camera but I'm sure he will enjoy every minute he uses it. Good stepping stone to some of the nicer more pricier cameras. If you like to take casual pictures or think one of your youngsters has a budding desire for photography, this is a great camera!

Reviews.Title: Great little camera
Reviews.Author: Kristen Kramer
Reviews.Content: It's not my dream DSLR camera, but since I can't afford my dream camera without taking out a massive loan from my bank, I got this one, and I am LOVING it.  It does everything I need and then some, including what I want it to do.  I've managed to get some excellent shots, and being able to see and preview them on the screen helps me to decide which ones to keep and which to drop, something I couldn't do with my traditional SLR.  As an amateur photographer who does Decorative Art Photography currently only for family and friends, this has been a great investment, and will help me advance and branch out in my work.

Reviews.Content: This camera is great. It is easy to set up and use. It includes: zoom, special framing features, different types of scenes, such as certain scenes that can be used for taking pictures with snow, sunsets, indoors, outdoors, etc. Great, professional camera!

Reviews.Title: Amateur's Proceed with Caution!
Reviews.Author: smithgu
Reviews.Content: Buyers, this is not a point and shot camera!! We knew that it was a DSLR; however we thought we would have to do minimal to take a picture. Instead, we found the icon settings to be cumbersome and not user friendly, but we are truly amateur photographers. Day pictures were easy to take; night pictures were the problem. We found it more difficult to take night pictures because we could never find the proper setting.  The camera seems to have all of the functions necessary to take quality pictures, but you would need a cheat sheet to remember all of them when you are transitioning from day to night. You cannot use one setting for all night pictures, it fluctuates depending on the scenery (an amateur would not know this); this was too technical for us (we just wanted to take a picture). You will need to review the tutorial more than once and create a cheat sheet to carry around to remember the entire setting criterion. The camera lens is very sensitive, windy days will distort the picture making it blurry if you do not know how to hold it very very still. Overall, the person buying or operating this camera need to be more than a novice to operate it efficiently and must remember it will not function as a point and shot!  Amateurs Proceed with Caution! It is best used by an middle to expert level photographer.

Reviews.Title: Images weren't very sharp, even in experienced hands and of still objects...
Reviews.Author: Pen Name
Reviews.Content: My young son loves photography, which I, a longtime hobby photographer, was happy to see.  When I say young, I mean very young, but he did a great job all summer with my fancier cameras, so I wanted to see him with a camera of his own, not too expensive, a good size for small hands, but could produce dependably quality shots.  It was his first camera, so raving excellence wasn't crucial, but I wanted something that would do well by him.  This one had decent reviews, so I took him with his birthday and allowance money, and slid the cash across the table for one of these.His pictures were nearly all coming out out of focus, which I first wrote off as him not managaging the camera properly, probably not being prudent to hold it still or something.  To help, I upped the shutter speed quite a ridiculous bit, flipped on the flash, and gave him a reminder about keeing the camera steady, which iritated him, because he insisted he was.  I then watched him shoot some; he was indeed holding the camera steady.  I checked the pictures.  There was some improvement at this point, but none were sharp, or realy even allthat close to being sharp.  I borrowed his camera for awhile and composed some shots of my own.  As a serious photography hobbist, I can take crisp photos.  I know what I'm doing. I know how to aim autofocuses.  I tested several shots on some objects hat I trusted would be really still, not apt to move in the breeze or wiggle: our picket fence, the beams on our porch, siding, sturdy tree trunks, my napping husband. Then some pics of higher motion stuff: our pet rats, the kids playing, windy leaves and grass.  The ONLY picture that turned out crisp for me was the sleeping husband one.  Most of the others I could tell weren't in focus before I even moved them off of the camera screen and onto the computer.  Remember, additionally, that I had the shutter speed substantially high.  I then apologized to my son fo accusing him of camera wiggle and human error.In short, I'm returning the camera.  I think the autofocus is calculating really poorly.  After some heavy research at home of reviews for cameras in his price range,  think I've found a better quality option for him.  I'm not sure if our particular camera was out of whack out of the box, or if thi is a common problem.  Sorry I couldn't give this a better review, but this really wasn't up to snuff for us.  I dd like theease of functions; it's easy to learn your way around the camera, which would've been great for my kid, as he's he's too young for something that requires much fuss.  I loved the look and feel of the camera for his little hands.  He loved that the shape mimicks an SLR, 'real cameras,' as he calls them, but it wasn't heavy or clunky in his hands, or too big to easily reach the shutter while grippin the camera (a problem he had previously had with my own larger ones).  For the price, if it had functioned decently, it would've made an awesome starter camera for a kid who really loves following in Mom's camera-happy footsteps.  As it was, though, I just couln't justify letting him spend every last penny on a camera--his first big purchase--that wouldn't consistanly output shots he could be proud of.

Reviews.Title: Not a pretty picture
Reviews.Author: wogan
Reviews.Content: I was quite excited to get this camera, since I do love to take pictures and have used several different brands of cameras and was anxious to try this one. It was a disappointment.First I put in a memory card I had purchased for it and it said it was not formatted and the card was defective. I returned the card and got a new one and it did the same thing. I put it in my other camera and it formatted the card, I put it back in this camera and it said the same thing. I took another memory card that I have been using, put it in and it finally accepted that one. Then on to taking pictures. I have used this for over 2 months, trying to give it a fair chance, but after comparing pictures taken at the same time, with the lenses cleaned the same, this one is definitely not as clear, especially on indoor shots. (The other camera is a Panasonic Lumix which retails for $20 more than this one and is a third the size and has a much better zoom).The funny thing is, that, with the lens on this - as it goes out, it has been very off-putting to several people, they comment on how weird it looks. One even compared it to an old sci-fi movie with the edging it has on the sides of the lens. I also have had trouble with the lens cap staying on...So I'm really sorry that this hasn't been a better product for me.
